99a2(mdo): ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun gsha ya dwa ti li bu khyod ni rgan rabs thu lo mchog yin gyis/ btsur ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig// gnas rtan gyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i
99a3(mdo): dngos pos ma tsho yang thob par myi 'gyur ro// mngos par rtogs par gyi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de nyid zhes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dperan/ rdo rje ngamangon
99a4(mdo): kyis kyang ring ba chen po rnam par 'jig go// rigs kyi/ de bzhin du khyod kyi sku'i khrung bu gcigan/ shes rab 'dun/ pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta/ bu la sems can tshul tha rab kyi
99a5(mdo): rnal snyed rnams la myed do// rigs kyi bu don de nyid zhe sa par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bal glang glang po che shin tu myi bzad pa
99a6(mdo): chen po de yang / myi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyim chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu
99a7(mdo): byed sa nas/ nas pacom ldan 'das la gangs dag pan ti'i bu 'di ga kyis gzis // bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ phyi dbus la ba khyim thal
99b1(mdo): long lta bu dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag mi di tsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sdod du ma gyurd te/ da mi bgyir yang la mchims
99b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsa pa/ sha ra dwa til bu de skad ma zer cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems can ci snyed cig la reg pa de
99b3(mdo): da khams cang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sol pa yin no// a rba drA ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni tong nge 'dzin da ma'alasas zhing / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa lol pa yin no// bcos ldan 'das
99b4(mdo): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ swa dang myo'o/ skye dku las sems can dgu khro nyos stong gis chos mngon/ par rtogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpalam
99b5(mdo): kyi blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i tong nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la skyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
99b6(mdo): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing / stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol panas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
99b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhi spyod zag 'i rjes tha rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ zhes mngon par bsta te/ sangs rgyas panam ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan na rnaMm sna pa'o zhes bya bar bats+tsha/ 
99b8(mdo): par sha stag go// phyogs cig mi lte bar phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka'asaHlang to// chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chu
100a1(mdo): sems dpa'i tong nge 'dzin sbyor ba mthal yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snad
100a2(mdo): mdzang 'di nyid sdom gyi smomalas dang / sngon gyi byin kyi rmings dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i mthas nye ba brtan pa'is/ 'di sa ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
100a3(mdo): shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par grol ba dang / chags pa'i ye shes
100a4(mdo): la 'jug ci chung bar bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba/ dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhye dad pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams
100a5(mdo): cad la sgrib pa myed par bya ba dang / tus gsum thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos bstand pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs sa sa
100a6(mdo): sa kyini stong bcwa chu par rab tu chus byed pa sa yang skams pa zu pa di dag mams ca byad kyis gas kyi bu 'dasas/ byang chub sems dpa na
100a7(mdo): pa brgyalas thoms s+ho/ sangs rgyas kyis bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyod kyis rlabs kyis/ chos bstan pa 'dim gribs pa med so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ nga
100a8(mdo): sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa byed pa dang / chod pa myed pa dang / brjod pa byed pa chos nyid dang / ma dang pa byed pa'i ye shes dang / khan ma 'o babye
100b1(mdo): grwa dang / thime kyis kyi chen pa myed pa dang / zhum pa byed pa dang / 'phrogs pa myed pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'o phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin pa/ 
100b2(mdo): 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa 'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi go la byug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom
100b3(mdo): ldan 'das de dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de nas ting nge 'dzid pa las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub
100b4(mdo): sems dpal rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis brnyas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gdugs pas rgya che ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ltar
100b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 2nges pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
100b6(mdo): sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba lams dag kangapa dag 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i
100b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi gang yin/ gang las bsams te de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba 'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chupa sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu
100b8(mdo): po de dag ga yin pa de shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpal chos kyi blo gros kyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sos/ 
101a1(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni brgya po 'di dag ste/ de dag mi 'das pa dang / mabyon pa pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung so gsun
101a2(mdo): gsung bar 'gyur lo// bcu ge zhes/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dpa po pa dang / rnal 'byor dpyod pa dang / skye bar skye ba dang / skye bar phyun/ 
101a3(mdo): sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa bren sum tshogs pa dang / byir gyi ldog pa dang / gzho num gyu ra pa dang / rgyal tshab dang / dbang skur thob pa'i byang chub sems dpal rngam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag kya
101a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par ga pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / mabyo nad pa dang da ltar byub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs
101a5(mdo): so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras pa/ de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rngam pa/ ra gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems dpal
101a6(mdo): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong la lag tu gzugs 'bang 'a la9/ mdzes pa 'am/ 'atos pathang po rgyas pa/ rgya 9/ ga
101a7(mdo): 'a/ rdzu 'phrul gyirnas par 'phrul ba ma/ rjes kyi brnyan padzinas grang la gi sems pa sdug parnas pa yang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya ma/ 
101a8(mdo): rnas pa 'ams kyi pabyen pa'i mi shes 'ang ci thogs nyid na/ blan mong bas sa pabardzogs pa'i rtsi rgyab tusems btung // bams babyud pa lag tu de nyid kyis mabyur ba mngag ba'i gdas partsa ma/ 
101b1(mdo): su gzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa zhes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lta pa byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag pa ma grangs pazhes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro/ 
101b2(mdo): ba'i lam zhes pa dang / khams tum sna tshogs zhes pa dang / mos pa dang / rnam grol ba dri ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar da pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / 
101b3(mdo): snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyan mongs pa dang / snang pa thams cad zhes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i myig gi shes pa dang / bka pa zad pa'i zhes pa ste/ bsnyen par dkal ba'i gnas
101b4(mdo): po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras// dag 'di ni// sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems da/ pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag sems
101b5(mdo): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / 
101b6(mdo): mchog tu bya ba dang / b.lid kyis myi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa dang / zad la dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin da la rnal 'byor nga du bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i
101b7(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor pa dang / sems cad sdug bsngal ba la yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma zag pa de nyid kyis// shas chem sangs rgyas kyi
101b8(mdo): chos thams cad la sbyor zhi / gong tu gnas pa gang dag thos pa'i gnas pa de dag la yab dag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan ga dri myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sos/ 
102a1(mdo): 9/ dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhes/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di dag la las dpal pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na sems can rnams la sog ma nyi sems rnam pa brgya bskyed de/ rnam pa brgya ga zhen/ 
102a2(mdo): 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems dang / snying che ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu srung ba'i sems dang / 
102a3(mdo): snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te// sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni// las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
102a4(mdo): ngag las dang po pa'i bya chub sems dpa' de lung dod pa dang / kha tod la sbyang bar bya'o// mang du thos ngas/ rab tu dben pa des sbyar bar bya'o// rab byung len par gyur nas/ dge ba'i bzhes
102a5(mdo): gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la skyab par bya'o// dge ba'i ni sa gnyen la mngon par dga' nas/ bka' khro bde pa la sbyar ba ma bya'o// bka' gro bde bar gyur pa nas/ dus shes pa la sbyar
102a6(mdo): bar bya'o// dus zhes par gyur pa kyi gras lha gyur gyi krib gyur nas/ don shes pa la sbyar bar b.ram bya'o// don shes par gyur pa nas/ chos kyi rjes su 'breng ba la skur bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'breng hA/ 
102a7(mdo): gyur nas/ brjed pa myed pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs pa myed par gyur da nas/ chos rnam par dgod la la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis/ 
102a8(mdo): shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing // kong du gnas ka dag zos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi// gzhan gyi dri la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i/ 
102b1(mdo): phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor da bapyod pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 
102b2(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di la rnal 'byor da gyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dmyigs pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi rtag pa nyid tu rtogs
102b3(mdo): par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag byed pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba myed pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byind pa myed pa nyid dang / gnas myed pa nyid dang / rno bar
102b4(mdo): rtog pa myed pa nyid dang / thol ba myed pa nyid dang / mngon pa/ ra 'du byed pa myed pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi// rjes su 'breng bar gyur pa'i phyir/ sbyor bar yang myi byed// 
102b5(mdo): myi sbyor bar yang myi byed de// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di nanal 'byor dgyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag rnal 'byor pagyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' deni
102b6(mdo): sems can gi khams brtag pas sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams brtag pa la spyang par bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 
102b7(mdo): chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs byed pa'i khams brtag pa la sprum pa ma bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
102b8(mdo): 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la sdang ba 'jug cing kong bya gnas pa gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gi dri ngal gyi 'jog pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
103a1(mdo): ngag 'di mo rnal 'byor da gyod ba'i bya bachub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pas gzhag pag bzhin/ 
103a2(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'din yongs su byab pa byed pa bcus gsung bar 'phags par skyes pa san te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lce ste/ chos nyid pas
103a3(mdo): phyir gyi thog pa dang / sangs rgyas la gyi phyeng la ding pa mthar zhus par gyur pa pa yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems cad la rnam par dpyod pa dang / zhing la dam par dpyod par
103a4(mdo): 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par phyo/ da pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'khor depa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnamapa
103a5(mdo): dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong par byed pa bcu po de dag/ gis gsung rabs 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ 
103a6(mdo): kye tshul po'i sras dag skye bam skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpal de mi 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma khyim pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyin
103a7(mdo): rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da lta gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la
103a8(mdo): sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sku
103b1(mdo): par bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyam par bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub 'jam par dpyad ba la sbyar/ 
103b2(mdo): bar bya'o// 'das pa'o sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma khyod pa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
103b3(mdo): par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dbyang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su
103b4(mdo): 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar ba / bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes cher byas ka/ sum mnyam pa nyid su rtogs par byed cing // kong phyu gnas
103b5(mdo): pa ka po dag thos pa'i gnas pa de dag la/ yab bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dro la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems
103b6(mdo): dpal rnam khar gzhag pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sbyor ba
103b7(mdo): pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i las gang ni rtsom yang de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / 
103b8(mdo): sems can thams cad la bde bar sprur pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu tha da par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod par gyi bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dras par bya ba dang / 
104a1(mdo): sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gtul ba dang / sems cad thams cad yong su mya ngan las pazla ba'i phyir com ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun/ 
104a2(mdo): sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu la bdag par brjod pam bya ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sems ca
104a3(mdo): mtha' yas pa dang / sems cam dpag tu myed pa dang / sems can grangs myed pa dang / sems can bsam kyis myi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs pa byed pa dang / sems can gzhal du byed pa dang / 
104a4(mdo): sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems cad g.yo ba myed pa nyi dra dang / sems can byed pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin byed pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de shas chos
104a5(mdo): mngon par zhem pa myed pa la sems 'jog cing / gong du/ gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid skyo ra gyi// gzhan gyi dro nga la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ 
104a6(mdo): kye rgyal ba 'i sras dag 'di ni spyo pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bsam pa phur sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
104a7(mdo): rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen// kyi rgyas pa'i sras dag 'dis bsam pa sram bu ma tshogs pa'i bya chub sems dpa' da chos bcums pa 'a/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te// n+d+ha/ 
104a8(mdo): kang zhes 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags la ma mam pa 'chad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa mtshan/ 
104b1(mdo): pa 'chad kyang rung // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang drung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yon/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyod sa bsngags pa na// 
104b2(mdo): bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa 'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che ba 'am/ sems cad kyi khams kun
104b3(mdo): nas nyon mongs pa cad zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams gtul sla zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings chub
104b4(mdo): zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe 'am/ 'jig rten gi khams// ngag 'jig rten 'jig ce'am/ myi 'jig ce 'am// chos kyi/ dbyings yod ce 'am// chos kyi dbyings myed ces 'chad kyang rung
104b5(mdo): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bsam
104b6(mdo): pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe ra/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa nyid du yang dag
104b7(mdo): par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa nyid dang / byed pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu
104b8(mdo): nyid dang / phyi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa nyid su yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de myi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par
105a1(mdo): sa pa chos na / kau tu gnas gang dag sos pa'i gnas dgas sa bad ny-id nga / kA kyi ming kyi 'dzin pa rnam pa pa'i te/ sa pa'i ma pa/ 
105a2(mdo): 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag del phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal pa'i sras ngas/ 
105a3(mdo): 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmyigs pa bcu thos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir ldog ste/ bcu gang zhes/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe 'am/ myed do zhes thos kyang sa da
105a4(mdo): rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir gyi ldog pa dang / chos yod do// 'am/ myed do zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpal so dado zhe 'am/ myed do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gyod
105a5(mdo): pa yod do zhe 'am/ myed do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhenges par myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs par// 
105a6(mdo): 'das so zhe 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag ma byon to zhe laM/ ma byom pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o/ de'om/ da ltar byung ba
105a7(mdo): ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'ag/ ma zad do zhes bya ba dang / rgyas gsum po ngag mtshan nyid gcig ce 'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no// zhes thos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
105a8(mdo): las phyim gyi ldog pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'din phyo kyi log pa'i byang chul sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i mas pa phyim kyi sdug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lachos kyi rgyan 'argyal ba dag pa 'arjod
105b1(mdo): bar bya ba dang ldan pa ste/ bcu ga zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kacig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod lnga b+ha'o// mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang / yi ke la don sgro btags pa dang / don/ 
105b2(mdo): sgo'i yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po myed pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po myed pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma myed par sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma byed pas mtshan ma spro btags
105b3(mdo): pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid myed pa sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su sbyin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhi pa/ gong
105b4(mdo): gnas gapa dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid spyor/ kyi gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa 'thob pa'i phyir ste/ kye rgyal ba/ 'i sras ngag 'dzin gyim gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnam
105b5(mdo): bar gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gno gyur pa'i byam rgya semams dpa' rngas par gzhag pa gang zhe kyi rgyal ba'i mas dag 'di la ka'o nur gyur pa pa'i byang rgyal mams
105b6(mdo): dpa' du chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu ga pa zhem/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin// ngag kyi las 'bras bu song ba dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang
105b7(mdo): ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par bsgrub la yin/ sems cas gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi bsam pa zhes par byed cing / mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can
105b8(mdo): gyi khams pa dang pa rab tu shes pa yin// 'dod pa'i khams pa dad pa pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la dang par rab tu shes pa yin// gzugs myed pa'i khams la dang pa rab tu zhes pa
106a1(mdo): yin/ dus 'i lta bu bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyi mngon par shes pa gyul pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba 'i sras ngag 'di ni gan dur gyur pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'din
106a2(mdo): gzho nur gyur pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngos par bsgrub pa/ bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhib rab tu shes par bya ba dang / sangs/ 
106a3(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i byin gyis bslabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi bo rnam par dpyad ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
106a4(mdo): myed par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs myed par dri ba dang / dad kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad dad pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed
106a5(mdo): ba yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par brjod bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par bsgrub pa ma khas pa la sbyor zhing / gong phyu ga nas kang dag thos pa'i gan
106a6(mdo): de dag la yapa bdag nyid skyon gyi/ gzhan gyi dpal gyi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyis te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ gzho tshur gyur pa pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba
106a7(mdo): sras ngag de la rgyal chub kyi byang chub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ma 'i sras dag 'di la rgyal tshab gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' na chos rtogs pam bya ba rgyal ma
106a8(mdo): ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ste ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya bas mkhas pa yin// nyon mongs pargyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin// bag chags kyi 'tshams spyon
106b1(mdo): brtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bapyod yul la spyos la togs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin// chos nyid rtogs pam bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar khyang pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas/ 
106b2(mdo): pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'byed pa rtogs par bya ba mkhas pa yin// sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin// 
106b3(mdo): kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtog pa rtogs par bya ba mkhas pa yini/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub seMs
106b4(mdo): dpa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byeb/ chub sems dpal de la/ gnas bcu yang dag par brjod/ par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho
106b5(mdo): pra 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho bra ba 'khor lha kun tu spyad pa dang / rgyas po'i brang 'khor du gnas pa dang / rgyal po'i phro brab 'khor du d+ha/ 
106b6(mdo): pa dang / rgyal po la po blang 'khor chu ngam par dbyad pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal po'i da'ang bskur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po pha royang gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal
106b7(mdo): 'iganas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de tsa la phyir bzhen/ 'di khyer de'i sems shas che chos thams cad la spri'i byed pa la/ 'jug cing gong byu gnas gang dag thos
106b8(mdo): ba'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi/ gzhan ka dri nga la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// 
107a1(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba 'i sras dag 'di la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub
107a2(mdo): sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu dang ldan te// / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa yang ba yin
107a3(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa'i byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang pa yin/ 'jig rter gi khams
107a4(mdo): grangs myed pa yongs su sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yim/ sems can grangs myed pa'i sems sems cig gis rnam par rig par byed pa yang mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gi
107a5(mdo): khams grangs myed pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs myed pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rngam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa yin sems
107a6(mdo): can grangs myed pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs myed pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs myed pa rnam pa thams cad
107a7(mdo): mkhye rang ba nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no// kye rgyas pa'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyis sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mam chang gang gis kya ba dbang bskur ba thob pa'i
107a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpal de'i lus kyi las shes par myi nus/ ngag gi las shes par myi nus/ yid kyi las shes par myi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par myi nus/ rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba shes/ 
107b1(mdo): bar gyi rus// 'das pa'i dus la rnam par lta ba zhes par myi nus/ zhib mngon par 'du byed pa zhes par gyi nus/ thos rnam par lta ba zhes par gyi nus// sems kyi yul zhes par tshu ma/ 
107b2(mdo): ye shes kyi myod yus shes par phyi nus te// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di mi 'ang bskur pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dbang bskur ba thob pa'i bya chul
107b3(mdo): sems dpa' de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod pa mdzad de/ bcu gang zhem/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / 
107b4(mdo): chos kyi dbyings shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dbus myed pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rgyas pa/ napa bkang ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad snang ba
107b5(mdo): byed pa dang / 'jig rten ga khams thams cad byid gyis brlabs dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
107b6(mdo): ye shes mtha' dag brjod par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyer ba nyid la sems 'jug pa'i byor te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba tho
107b7(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa / 
107b8(mdo): bshad ma zag tu// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re ra yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rtul snyed kyi 'jig rten ga khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ 
108a1(mdo): rab tu gsos// kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ 'gus rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'grus pa to// ldeg rab tu rdze// kum tu rab tu ldeg go// 'ur zhum rab tu zhu ma 'um/ kun tu rab tu lda lun
108a2(mdo): ro/ ches chem// rab tu ches ches// kun tu rab tu chem chem lo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chas nyid thob pas/ lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char
108a3(mdo): yang mngon par bal po// lha'i 'dug pa'i smon gi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi cher yang mngon par bab po// lha'i bye ma'i sprin kyi che dang / lha'i 'breng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / 
108a4(mdo): lha'i gos kyi sprin gi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i spro gi che rad/ dawA li pad ma'i smon gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan 'breng kyi sprin gyis/ der dang / lha'i rkyen gyi sprin gyi char dang / mngon par bapa po/ 
108a5(mdo): lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma bkrol bar sgra byung ngo // g+ha snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo // lhaling po ya bkrag ko// gr-ing zan pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtsi o lha'i dbang po'i khab par ji lta ba bzhin
108a6(mdo): tu 'jig rtemago khams thams cad tu yang chos bstand pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste/ lhag chad myed do// tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phras
108a7(mdo): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed 'jig rten go khams rnams kyi pha rol nas// byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhong stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas/ 'di skad
108a8(mdo): ces 'dze rad to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so// legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag cag kyang pyid chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste
108b1(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshad chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba zhe stag gi khang nas 'dam phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag zan
108b2(mdo): cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di 'byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu 'di dag gi ring du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis dod 'di nyid ston te/ lhag ca med do// kye rgyal pa'i sras ngas bdag cag ni khyod kyo ba du gyu ra te/ sangs
108b3(mdo): rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gi khams 'dir phyi nang to// bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gi khams 'dir phyi nad pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtem gi khams thams cad kyi grong bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse
108b4(mdo): mor lha'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpal sangs rgya/ nas kyi zhong stong phrag rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyi nad par gyur to// // / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems
108b5(mdo): dpal chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dpa/ chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas ras/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
108b6(mdo): rang 'byung shi ring tu rnam dag bro mnga' ba// mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa// bsnyen dkal mtshan gis brgya rang pa mthong gyur na/ byang chub do gyu gtan pa sems 'jog byed// don zla byed pa'i/ 
108b7(mdo): rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun rdzob kha' pa dang rjes su bstand pa dang // sdug bsngal zad bachas 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// yom tam kun kyi 'byung nas de bzhi
108b8(mdo): gshegs// kun tu bzab po'i yom tan thos byur danas// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba myed pal+li// byang chub don tu brtam pa sems 'jog byed/ gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dadang // rang bzhi gnas/ 
109a1(mdo): pa'i gnas rnams gzham dag kyang // gzhan phyi dngos por rnam par rtog bya phyir// byang chub dod du btam pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dkam// dge dang phyi dgems/ 
109a2(mdo): nams gapa yod pa// de dag rgya rnams rtogs pam gyi bya ba'i phyi// byang chub don rdzu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// ti 'dzind pas ma gtan rnam par spyod pa da // de bzhin rnams 'jug rnam dag sas su/ 
109a3(mdo): pa// de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtam pa'i sems ni 'jog/ 'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dab dbang po rnams// ci 'dra ni 'dra de'i de dang deng // rim pa de dag to/ 
109a4(mdo): par bya ba'i phyim// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jodabyed// 'jig rten kun gyi zam pa mi 'dra dang // lhag pa'i ba/ sam pa tha nga rnam gsum nas// bstam chos tu ma rtogs pa
109a5(mdo): bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog ngarnam pa lnga tshogs rnam pa tu ma'i khams// gang dag 'dzinarten gsum 'dir ya dkus kyi// khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par
109a6(mdo): ba'i phyis// byang pa dang tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// chos 'dim thas kyi 'gro ba ra sa gyu pa 'aM// dge pa 'dug sa gang sa nga ba 'jug pa// yang dgas zhing rtog paras bya ba'i phyir// byang chub ngaH
109a7(mdo): brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ zhi rnams thams cad ji ltar byung ba dang // sems cad ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags myed byig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/ byang rgya 'do rtswa brtan pa sems 'jag
109a8(mdo): byed// 'das pa'i dus dang pa ltam byang chus na sems camadrongs mtshan nyid gabasod dang// sngon gyi gnas rnams mchos par bya ba'i phyir// byang rgya la don tu brtan pa'i sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rtems sa
109b1(mdo): tha snyad kab btags dang // ngag lam sngags tshul myod pa gang yod pa// pad 'i 'den pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub dom tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du myed
109b2(mdo): pa ste// / stong pa myi g.yo rang bzhin po bo nyid// don dam bden pa brtag par bya ba 'i phyim// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams dag tus g.yos bstanang ba dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang
109b3(mdo): rnam par 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu phan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer che mo de las 'o zer rnams// de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu
109b4(mdo): rab tu 'gyed// de dag 'od cig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// / de dag 'od cig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu/ brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing yang bsam gyis myi khyab gang // 
109b5(mdo): yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te// sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhi rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// 
109b6(mdo): gnod pa myed par lag pa'i 'phel bzhag rnams// chos rnams srog myed rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub dod tu brten pa sems 'di 'jog/ rgyamatsho rnams na ji snyed tu yong pa// skra'i rtse mo'i nang du 'dzin
109b7(mdo): par byed// ma lus mang krug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu btam pa'i sems 'di 'jo// / zhing rnams sun pa 'tha' ba rdul gyi bka/ gang yod de dgral lus bgrang byed cing / 
109b8(mdo): rdul grangs byed cing bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten 'di ni 'das dang de bzhin du// ma 'ongs bsregs pa'i skal pas 'jig pa rnams/ skal pa/ rtogs// 
110a1(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtam sems 'di 'jog/ dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin
110a2(mdo): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// sgra'is bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// dngos po'i rang bzhin
110a3(mdo): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'khor sug ri bo bsam gyis myi khyab pa// sgra'i bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// rags dang tha ba rtogs par bya
110a4(mdo): pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtand pa sems 'di 'dzu ga/ lus pa myed pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// skad cig cig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag/ 
110a5(mdo): dag pa bstar nga ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brten pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten kun kyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba// skad cig cig la skad cig brjod byed cing // zhi ba'i rang bzhin
110a6(mdo): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes// lce yongs rgya
110a7(mdo): chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jig byed// ni rnams kun tu brjod par bya ba ma yang // skad cig cig la lta gyur nga sel bar byed// nas rtog chos rnams
110a8(mdo): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni 'o ba rnams thams cad ma lus par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhing rang byung mo// chos rnams skad kyi/ 
110b1(mdo): cig la rtogs bya'i khyim// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul tham pa dang lta zu 'jig rten khams// rnam pa kum bya mngon par sprul byed cing // yid las byung ba dag
110b2(mdo): rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma byod sangs rgyas rnams// ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog/ sems kyi skad cig cig
110b3(mdo): la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// tshig cig brjod kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i// skal ma zad kyi de la nyams pa myed// tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par
110b4(mdo): bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jo// / phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 2gro ba mi 'dra ldog pa mi 'dra ba// sems kyi rtog pa skad cin
110b5(mdo): cig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sem sa 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam// / ngag gam yid kyis gang du yang chags pa myed// dus
110b6(mdo): gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtas pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub sems mo 'o ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas skalang bar phyogs su rku byed cing // sangs rgyas
110b7(mdo): spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes/ 'din rtsa ldog rnams kyi bsta da pa yin// phyogs bcu dag go 'jig rten tha dang bar// 'jig rten bdag po rgyal ba'i sras kyu ra pa ma// gang yang rung ba
110b8(mdo): pa spogs par byed// 'di'i gyi thog rnams kyos sa dang pa 'di/ byang chub don du sring par kyang khyod tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa// de'i bsngags pa rtag tu brjod par byed/ 
111a1(mdo): dan mo ga rnams kyi bstan / thams cag cas ra yul tu byed pa sa/ byang pa mas sa pa byed ga so ga/ de byang chub sems 'anamasas
111a2(mdo): 'di ni bye ldog rnams kyi ston pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pal+li// che nyid 'di ma yod kyi gzhan byed pa// de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed// 'di ni myo ldog rnams kyi
111a3(mdo): bstand pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul du phyind pa dang // khyad par 'phags chos bla myed gang yod pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston nga// 'di ni myo ldog rnams kyi bstand pa yin// 
111a4(mdo): yom tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa'i// che nyid 'di ma de yod kyi gzhan byed pa// de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar/ byed// 'di ni myi ldog rnams kyi bstand pa yin// / tshad myed
111a5(mdo): gzhal yas bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas rnasas dang phrang gyur pakyi ga/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ston pa rabyed// 'din myo ldog rnams kyi bsta nad pa yin// ti
111a6(mdo): 'dzi dkang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// de dag pa der gshegs zas la brjod par byed// 'di ni mye ldog rnams kyi bsta nga ba yin// 'khor ba yin/ 
111a7(mdo): lo rnam par zlog pa dang // dam kha'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// 'jig rten kun kyis rtag tu ma bskor pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya// shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten
111a8(mdo): thams cad dang // ngan songs rnams dag tu gnon gyur pa'i// gnas dang skabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub don tu sems 'jo/ 
111b1(mdo): pa de ni dang po 'i byang chub sems dpar bstan da/ bsral ba'i gdams ngag ji bzhin ngas byas pa// ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de'i yin// nad bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun
111b2(mdo): la pham pa bya ba'i phyir// de ltar thogs su zhig sems bskyed pa// 'di mo gnyis ste dang po 'i las can no// phan pa thob byed sems dpa' btang bde// mnyes dang sdug dang de bzhin sdug pa'i sems can
111b3(mdo): tu srung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang snyoms par stond pa'i sems// de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyurd pa de// lu pa gnod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya// ma pud+ma thos
111b4(mdo): nas dgon par gnas su gzhug/ dbes par gyur pa nas dge ba/ de shes pasnyes du gzhug// dge bshes rnams la bka' khro bde ba ra bya// dus tshong shes la zhes bzhin ldan par bya// dus chod
111b5(mdo): shes mnas can maldan pa kyi/ dus shes byung nganas gang tu rigs kyid bya// 'jigs pa byed nas don la martson pas bya/ don zhes gyur ba nas de banani chos brjod bya// chos rnams ca
111b6(mdo): rmongs sur nga byed par bya// rmongs pa byed par gyur nas rgyas pa'i sras// legs par 'thungs 'tshams la gdas par bya// 'di na dang ba mas can 'arjod pa ste/ AN+Da zhugs pa'i bya tu thasems dpa
111b7(mdo): 'di mi gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste// 'di ni su rmo ba de ni sangs rgyas sras// byang chub sems dpal gsum pa ga pa yin pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan la rab tu sbyor// phyi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang / bangs
111b8(mdo): myed pa dang gso ba byed pa dang // de bzhin nas 'disems cad bdag phyis dang / mngon par 'du byed myed dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa byed yis pa dbya chub sems dpal de ltar rtog par byed/ se
112a1(mdo): can khams dang chos kyi dbyings lal pa// brtag par bya ba phyim de mi gzengs pa bstod// 'jig rten khams mi mtha la mas su myed ces// de sa de ni dpyod rgya gzhug par bgyi// 'di/ 
112a2(mdo): nas sa dang mya dang de bzhin ye// rlung dang de bzhin ji snyed yod pa dang // phyogs ma 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs byed pa// de dag rnams la de ni dpyod tu gzhug/ rgyal chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi// 
112a3(mdo): rang bzhin sa lus mthar thug btag par bya// de mi sangs rgyas sras so lhor byed la// phas par bya byid rjes su bsta rapa pa yin// byang chub sems dpal skye ba ga bskyes pa// bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo
112a4(mdo): ldan de ni dngos myed dngos po rtogs// dam chos gnas su skyes da te legs par skyes// de ni rang gi sa las yong myi ldog/ sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'jidad par skye// rtag tu chos la nges par
112a5(mdo): sems la ldan// sems can rang bzhin ji 'dra rnam par 'byon pa/ las dpa'ajig rtem ngag dang zhi rnams dang // rnam par sbyin dang kho pa mya ngas 'das// rnam pa pa dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis zhes/ 
112a6(mdo): de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen dang 'das rang byu rnams dang // ma khyom dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas// grub dpag pa yang legs dang mthar thug dang // rang 'byung rnams kyi grub pa'i 'ja
112a7(mdo): pa// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni// dus gsum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pas zhes// nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed kyi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad byed pam 'jug/ gang ki phan yom rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/ 
112a8(mdo): de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste// 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub ngo thu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod/ 
112b1(mdo): pa yin// thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste// bsod nams las dag pa thams las mthar gyidang byed// de lta ba bsod nams las ngag ci byed kyang 'jig rten lus kyi rten tu gyur ba dang // phan par 'dod dang
112b2(mdo): bde ba thob byed dang // snying 'gye ba dang skye dgu dkrol 'gyur te// 'jig rten kanod gyur pa gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dres pa khyed ci pa rab tu dang bar byed// sems can mang po thams cad gtul 'dod dang // mya ngan
112b3(mdo): 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang tshe// 'jig rten thams cad mthal ma myed pa dang // de bzhin dpag tu byed cing grangs myed pa dang // mtshungs myed bsam yas mnyam byed gzhal ba dang // stong pa gyi g.yo myed du
112b4(mdo): re ba bzhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ skyon de pa phun tshogs pan dang snying pa rtse ldan// de la rjes su bstanadu dpa 'di 'dra ste// don dam kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan// de ni
112b5(mdo): sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo nyid rmongs pa byed// shi nang tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog myed/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer gyi byed// sangs rgyas chos dang / 
112b6(mdo): byang chupa sems dpal dang // myod pa'i sngags dang sngags pa ma yin pa dang // sems cas chung ngam yang mche'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bas pa las nur ba myed// sems can nyon mongs can dam rnam dag
112b7(mdo): gam// gdul sla zhe'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am// chos dbyings chung zhe 'am ya pan rgya che 'am/ 'jig par 'gyur zhe'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe li// chos kyi dbyings yod ce'i myed ces thos gyur da kyang // 
112b8(mdo): dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpal de// nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma myed dang mtshan nyid myed pa dang / dngos myed// 
113a1(mdo): rang bzhis btsun zhing dben pa dang // sgra ma'i rang bzhin gyig yor 'dra ba la// chos mchog zhi pa 'di 'dra nyam par byed// de ltar gyi ldeg byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas chos
113a2(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / spyod pa yod dam myed ces nges par dpyod// 'byung ngam myi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir myi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe 9/ ma khyod che'am mkhyen ma yin
113a3(mdo): bya bangs ma byung zad dam myi zad dam// de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid byed// gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang // don dang tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos myed pa/ thams cad sgro
113a4(mdo): btags rnam par gzhan nyid du/ myi ldog byang chub sems// dpa' yid ces byed// mtshan ma myed dang mtshan ma yod pa/ dang / mtshan nyid myed dang mtshan gyis mchod pa dang // rnam
113a5(mdo): par phyel lam chus sbya ba rnams// zos nas 'di la ma tha ka 'jug par byed// gzhon nur gyur pa ba'i byang chub sems dpa' di// lus dngangs dang de bzhin yid kyis kya // 'bram
113a6(mdo): bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing / ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston da// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing // de dag rnams kyi bos par dpyod bar byed/ sems can 'apyod dang rjes su
113a7(mdo): mthun chos dang / zhing rnams 'jig dang chags pa rnams kyang shes/ ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur su mngon shes yob// phyogs rnams kun tu yi mi 'jug par byed/ bde gshegs pa sngags pa'i chos/ 
113a8(mdo): rnams thos nas kyang // de la de ni ru bar 'gyur ba byed// yongs su shes dang ni g.yo byed pa dag// de bzhin byis kyis rlab dang nas dpyad dang / ji ltar skad cig grangs myed 'gro 'gyur ba/ 
113b1(mdo): zhing du 'gro bad+ma bya ba brjod par bya/ de ni dri ba grangs myed 'dri bar bye// lus rnams ci 'dra yid kyi las kyang ston// de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byam klas dang // sems gcig la yangs da
113b2(mdo): rgyas grangs myed brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang / spyod yul gang
113b3(mdo): sbyor ba gang yin dang // ya dang chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang / 'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang // brda yi ba des dang don dam bden pa dang // ma lus rtogs par byal mkhas pa yin/ zo brang
113b4(mdo): 'khor la mkhas pa tshar phyir te/ der yang ji ltar kur/ tu spyod pa dang // gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba/ dang / pho bra 'khor mdzo 'brang dpyad pa dang // dam chos rgyal
113b5(mdo): po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang // byin gyis brlabs dang gzha na gnon mi 'dra dang // chos la 'jug dang bag lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal tshabs la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis ni
113b6(mdo): de'i mthar thug ste/ ji skad bstan bzhin du gyur pa myed// tshe'i 'du byed napa zhig 'dom pa ma tshul ldam rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon tu phyogs// dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras cig
113b7(mdo): ste// thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyind bdag nyid can// sgra migs cag kyis chu tshad bzung tu rung // 'di ni bsam pa bgrang bas rtogs pa yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi myod pa 'di 'dra ste// 'di na
113b8(mdo): sems can la las zhib rnams kung// pra rab rtul du chags nas ma lus bkra // grangs kyid 'di skad cig ces brjod byed pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes// 'das dang de bzhinas
114a1(mdo): byam sangs rgyas dang // gang ga phyogs brgya dgas bzhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas dpa bzhin nyan thos kyi// ma bor gyur pa pa byang chub sems debye// thog mas byang chub sems shes
114a2(mdo): gang brjod pa// de ni ji lta'i tshul su'ang grangs byed de// 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur dam// de las gong tu brjod pa 'i zhig yod// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
114a3(mdo): pos// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
114a4(mdo): yos tan rnams ni bsam kyis kyi khyab ste// gang ga sos/ kyi nam grangs 'di'i phyi mams pa'i sems can de dag kyang // thams cad la khye nga pa nyid tu nye bar gyu pa yin na/ 
114a5(mdo): gang dag chos tshan sa thas 'dzi ba dang / 'chang ba dang/ bdang / kus chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyi dpas smos kyang rtsi dgas s+ho// de dag ni nges thams sa
114a6(mdo): rgyas su 'gyur ro// chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te// shes rab bab mo dang ldan pa de dag mi de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bsku
114a7(mdo): yis par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig girna las lnga 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag klag par gyur nga pa'i skyes bu ngas
114a8(mdo): pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin pa// chos kyi nam grangs 'di ga bdag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang mi dgos// de nas tshe dang ljon pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom
114b1(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te// 'di skad ches gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol// bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas// bdag mi dmus
114b2(mdo): lta bur gyur da pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig pu dmus long lta bur gyur par yang mabs kyi// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma zos pa de dag thos
114b3(mdo): cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHlang pa/ gnas gtan de de bzhin te// ji skad smras pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis pas
114b4(mdo): kyis myi khyab pa nyid bshad tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis bka' saHyang ba// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so la/ brkya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyo thams cad
114b5(mdo): skul cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs ci// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der sgrogs zhig// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
114b6(mdo): li bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos das// dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don kyi phyir yongs su bsgom pas brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa de dag la don 'di'i skabs brjod de// 
114b7(mdo): chos nyan pa thams cad 'bru bar gyis shika// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyum gyis// 'du bar gyis shig/ khyed phyis 'gyod pa
114b8(mdo): gyu ra da ta re// kye grogs po dag mdo ste rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig tu 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byidad dang // tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten slong ba thams cad 'dus nas
115a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pasgom pa byas te// bcom ldas 'das kyi khyad pas 'danas// zas sa sbyar nyi macom ldan 'das sa gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos mchog tam la'i/ 
115a2(mdo): gzungs bshad tug sol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cad kyi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// brgya byim dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong thathams cad kyis lam gnyis gsum rgyag sol pa 'as
115a3(mdo): na yang/ bcom ldan 'das car mi gsung bar gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'dapal tshe dang sngon bzham ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan ma mchog ta la la nas bya ba'i girgya
115a4(mdo): bshad du gsolang // bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// zhal nas ljags kyi dbab po/ phyung ste// rigs kyi bu ka pa la la / ngag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs
115a5(mdo): 'dud do kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa sa gso sa pa dang / sa sa mi thar byed pa ya bdag pa rdzogs 'i byeng rgyab las kyis kyi log par 'gyur ba sa thas
115a6(mdo): myod sa na na ma pag thags dang pas gyu zhan gas// kyis pa zlab sa
115a7(mdo): rgya g.yo bar 'dug ste// nyis bye ba zhas khrig brgyasto pas skrag pa'i ma ga nad po dang ldan pa'i 'ang gshegs pas/ brgya gyis dang / 'jig rten slob pa rnams kyis yongs su pasko ci mu
115b1(mdo): kyis ltas nas// 'dug par gyur da te// gseram gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne// lgang nger 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ma pA tili bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa
115b2(mdo): pa ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nang nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so// de nas 'dzam
115b3(mdo): dpal gzho nur gyur pas// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra pA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra pra ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di ka yin sha ra dwa ti'i bus spras pa/ rigs kyi bu
115b4(mdo): khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste// kho bo mo khyod dang 'byed kyi rus/ so 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// khyod snying las chung ngur 'dus/ shig dang // khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan
115b5(mdo): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan kyis khyod shong shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te// stong gsum gi stongab chen po
115b6(mdo): li 'jig rten go khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gi khams ma// gnas thapa ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og byin gyi bar gyis ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
115b7(mdo): thams cad 'dus par gyur pa to// rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dpa g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba dum dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa to// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang
115b8(mdo): 'dus par gyur to// lha'i bu mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang dge bsnyenas kyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khob dang / de bzhin du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi
116a1(mdo): 'khor dang // 'tha' bral gyi 'khor dang / dka' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lce'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og myin gyi/ 
116a2(mdo): par gyi ste'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur pa to// de bzhin tu nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tsho pa ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan
116a3(mdo): ba me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dpab sha ra mA ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa la 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus ches
116a4(mdo): po dang / tshed nga ldan pa lam tham bstad dang / medas kyi na sanas kyu dang / seM nga ldan pasu gra 'ad srung dang/ che / ldan pa sde rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i / 
116a5(mdo): kab po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma ga can zin dang / tshe ldan pa pa'ang skyong dang // tshe dang ldan pa drangs pa dang / nga ldan pa kun dka' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa de dag dang nyan
116a6(mdo): thos de dag dang / grags 'dzin da las thogs pa dge slong sa lnga 'amyal pa 'dus par gyur to// rnams kyi rgyal po dang stobs kyis 'kho lo spru ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur du te/ 
116a7(mdo): rigs dang / zas ze dang/ sa padag mngag kya 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pag man gyi'i nus bcom ldan 'das la yan gsum rnam pa byas te/ 'di skad kyis rnams
116a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltam 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags// de ji ltar 'tshal bar ba kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baN+Dal pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'din
116b1(mdo): dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog ta la la li gzungs nyan pas 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal
116b2(mdo): saHlad pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu song la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun rtswa bzang po la gsol ba pho bshig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra pra ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon gyur/ 
116b3(mdo): pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzind rin po bstand pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu/ dkon mchog
116b4(mdo): ta la la'i gzungs nyan par 'gyur ba su yin sha ra dwa ti'i// pus smras pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang / brgya// byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa rnams 'dus
116b5(mdo): pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur dakhas// gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas gartan
116b6(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa 'di dag/ sgyus byang bzha sta gan/ kho sa su la chos bshad/ nyan pa na su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyes bu das pa khyod kyis
116b7(mdo): shod cig/ kho bo nyan to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla gas yin smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni
116b8(mdo): stong pa nyid kyi chos bla rags so// smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin// smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni tshig byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal
117a1(mdo): @nadums pams pas bsta / da stan du da ma nga// 
117a2(mdo): kyis ji lta bu bstan pa de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa pa/ mtshas ma myed pa bstan pa/ sdom pa med pa bstan pa// dor ba byed pa bstand pa/ spros pa byed pa bstarang bzhen pa
117a3(mdo): pa bstan pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rter skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dka' nas// 'grim cig tu 'jam
117a4(mdo): dpal gzhom nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ma dwa ti'i/ pus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs pam banadang do// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin mo// de nas che ngag
117a5(mdo): ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis 'jas dpas gnosus gyur pa 'di skad ces smras so// 'angs dpal byang chub sems pas dgan mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar gzung
117a6(mdo): ga paraH/ kus rtsub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya ma yang dag par bshad par bya// 'jas dpas kyis smras pa/ rab 'byor da gzungs 'dos skye ba khyed pa ma yid largya'o// dza
117a7(mdo): pa med 'ang med 'a / sa pa me pa // da skyed par 'o// 'as dpas gan na/ sa
117b1(mdo): bya chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te// tha kos 'phrag bcig tu phams nas pas mo sbya rang te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
117b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sto rje chen po che 'dra ba zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yang pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems da
117b3(mdo): chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum po yongs su myi gtong ba ste// 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen
117b4(mdo): po yin no// gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs// su 'dzind pa de ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang shes rab// kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po
117b5(mdo): yin no// gapa sems can thams cad kyi don kyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang dod chags gyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang nga/ 
117b6(mdo): par brjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can stobs dang myi ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stong rje chen po yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan / 
117b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i sems su bya'o// 'dre ba myed pa mang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang
117b8(mdo): pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la smam pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la zhugs pa rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bam
118a1(mdo): 'gyur ba'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgom mchog ta sa la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol pa// sems can thams cad la sban pa dang / thugs pa me ba mngal pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lan/ 
118a2(mdo): phyug so yang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpal de dag la 'di skad ces bkal saHsang to// khyed kyin pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa 'am la ngas ma
118a3(mdo): chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yangabadag papa rab tu ston par spob su yod // de nas byang chub sems dpam kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa pa nga / byang chub sa
118a4(mdo): dpal kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang byang chub sems dpal sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po khro ba dang / byang chub sos
118a5(mdo): dpal ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' ldan gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chu sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / 
118a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bro gros kyi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' so gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rini cad me ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpal dam bu 'ong dang / byang chub sems pan
118a7(mdo): gtsug mno bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta dang / byang chub sems dpal bltar gyi mtho ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 
118a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal nor dpal dang / byang chub sems da / 
118b1(mdo): bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dam dpal dang / byang rgyal sems dpal tsam dan dpral dang / byang chub sems dpal chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpal bdud rtsi zla
118b2(mdo): gros dang / byang chub sems dpal bsam las blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpal bsod nams kyis brgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod gyis brgyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpal mtshan gyis/ 
118b3(mdo): brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpal rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dka' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse ze rdzob pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas pa dang / 
118b4(mdo): byab chub sems dpal rtag tu lag brgya pa dang / byang chub sem/ sa dpalas 'dzin da dang / byang chub sems dpal spobs depa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam pal li snying po dang / 
118b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems patha dris kyi pa'i snying po dang / bya chupa sems dpa' gnyi gtugs kyi
118b6(mdo): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngod 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' srul po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpal spobs pa dpal ba dang / 
118b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' cher lo byams pa dang / de dag las batshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zhag khrig brgya stong phrag drug rtsu ma gnyis kyis srim gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces gsos das
118b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe// bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang dag par bshad par spro/ 
119a1(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sanal dab/ rigs kyi bu ngag legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag ni dga' ba ste/ go cha 'di 'dra ba 'din shin tu bya dkal ba'o// 
119a2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces bka' baHlang to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba'i dkon
119a3(mdo): mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyon cig// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te// sngags bkalasaHla pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
119a4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal so// tad ya \u0f7f/ oM la/ b+hA rarbe/ b+ha ra Ne/ b+ha ma thA rA// b+ha ran ces pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das
119a5(mdo): kyis a la la chos// a la la chos zhes la gnyis man gsum tu chang du brjod pa chod du brjod par mdzad de// de sa bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kus rgya bzang
119a6(mdo): 'di skad ces gso yang to// chos chos shes bgyis 'di logazhi 'do da gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang la/ rigs kyi mu chos thams cad kyi gni myed pa'i dan to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi dor ni
119a7(mdo): dngos po byed pa'i gzhi 'dod to// chos thams cad kyi gzho'adon ni rnas ma kha'i gan 'dzin to// chas thams cad kyi ga mdon mi thang pa myed pa'i gna' dan to// chos thams cad kyi zhen mdin mdor bskyed pa'i don to// 
119a8(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang pos gsol la// bcom ldan 'das 'on ma'i slang du chos thams cad ces bgyi// bcom ldan gyis bka' brtsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni// byig
119b1(mdo): dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di na chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs/ 
119b2(mdo): kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod pa nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nu ba gyu da pas byang chub sems dpal kum tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
119b3(mdo): dkon mchog ta sa la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin
119b4(mdo): nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang // 'byung ba myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ni nyis // de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
119b5(mdo): ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyi da kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rig sa kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gsungs 'di gzung ba dang
119b6(mdo): kun tu bzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par grol la dang / rnam 'am dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ rikre
119b7(mdo): kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal kazho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras
119b8(mdo): so// 'jam dpal khyed chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig yod// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / 
120a1(mdo): gti mug yuna'i mi nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ya pra ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang / zhes pa dang / gti mug rnams ji med nas zhugs// 'jas dpas kyis smras
120a2(mdo): pa/ sha ya pra ti'i bu sa'i khams yun ji me nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra pra ta'i bus smras pa// rigs kyi gu sa'i khams yun ji srid nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ya dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang / 
120a3(mdo): ma rika pa yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra dwa ti'i khrus smras pa// rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun li srid nas zhugs// 'jag dpal gyis sbas pa/ sha ra dwa ta'o bu nas mkha'i khams
120a4(mdo): yun li sri nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ya dwa ti'i bus smras dpa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yum ji srid nas zhugades 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ya dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed/ 
120a5(mdo): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid nas zhugs smi do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus// 'jab dang / la gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes
120a6(mdo): bu dpa 'a 'dis bu dag dang gtas bya ba'i dus pa la ba lag la sod/ rigs kyi su 'di lta ste/ dper na kyi dang / khyil khams cad dang/ kharnams kyis kyang ri 'i rgyas po ri rib ga gig par myi ma
120a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyang thos pastan gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstar ba cig ga sa ba la yang rtogs par gyi rus na/ 'jas dpal gzhonur gyur pa'i bstan pa ci ma
120a8(mdo): de ras byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpas gan nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhud la// phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus pa/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzid pa chos sA hA/ 
120b1(mdo): de dag la kun tu bsrur ba dang / yongs su bskyad pa mdzad par de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa thob shi ka// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas rab kyi chos kyi stan las langs nas// bcom
120b2(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par stonang par bgyi ba chos/ 
120b3(mdo): smra ba de dag gi yon tan kyi khyad par rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHla pa/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurang pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa
120b4(mdo): chos smra ba 'di dag no de'i chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung bar/ 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyuradar ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// 
120b5(mdo): de dag la bdud dang / bad+had kyi ros kyi lha'i bu klakas lta ba rnams kyis grags myi rnyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol rtogs pa
120b6(mdo): gcig tsam srid cig myi khyams pa'i sems skyed pa de ni phyir 'gyur ba las kyang ring tu 'gyur ba yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lta smos kyang mi dgos// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang da// mdo/ 
120b7(mdo): sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzind pa'i dge slong rnams la la dad pa'i sems skyed pa de dag mis thags ngan par 'gyur// lce dang snga myed par 'gyur/ rka lag gyi phyogs su 'gyur/ lus dang bu cad tu 'gyur/ 
120b8(mdo): myig myed par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can tu 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni gti mug pa de dag gi skyon tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal mdor bshad/ 
121a1(mdo): na de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag kyi su'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa 'jug go// gal te phyir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long 'gyur/ 
121a2(mdo): lce myed par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze tsam du 'gyur// mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur// lus zhom par 'gyur
121a3(mdo): sus gcer bur 'gyur/ sus skam por 'gyur/ yi dgas 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yapa gyi gti mug de dag kang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi me zhes pas ma
121a4(mdo): kyis kyi khyab pas mkhyer pa to// 'jam dalal gzho nung gyur du bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grub bstan d+hA/ dasol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan dru gsol
121a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka lasaHla dpa/ 'jam dpal / rog de skad ma 'dri shika/ 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ sdang bar 'gyur/ 
121a6(mdo): rab tu spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gas mad pa// sems cad 'di dag gis 'di lta bu mos nas slar chad nas yang dam pa'i chos spong bam myi 'gyum pam bgyi ba'i srang bya/ zugs pa rtse bar/ 
121a7(mdo): dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba'i mying la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang / 
121a8(mdo): thig rab dang / kun tu 'bar ba dang / rab tu 'bam pa dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang / macu rnon dang / lcags kyi bu lum dang / lcags kyi be com dang / mun khud dang / mgo bstod dang / phyi'u tshugs dang / 
121b1(mdo): spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rapa'abs dang / rdul pa dang / rtag tu nga ba dang / rab 'jos dang / nges 'jos dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jas dpal gyi gti mug par dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can
121b2(mdo): dmyal ba ni 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom
121b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bkal sa tsal dpa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ches smra ga 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
121b4(mdo): pa spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig/ rten gi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpal kun nas mdzes pa sha
121b5(mdo): stag go// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bya 'a phrag bcu gnyis mngon tu 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'dor na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs myed dpag tu myed de// 
121b6(mdo): de dag yi skal ba stong dag kyis kyang brjod myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus ra// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong
121b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHla pa// kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni// pha
121b8(mdo): cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste// 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan ngags sbyar ba yin gyi// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yod no// 'di dag ni rab bzor byas pa yin te/ 
122a1(mdo): mdo sde 'di dag mi ston nam yang ma thos so// zhes 'dzem cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur lo// spangs nas kyang 'thol zhing 'chags pam gyi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas/ 
122a2(mdo): 'chi ba'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar ba myi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los myi gti mug pa de dag gi 'og bcad nas sa la lhung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar gyur nga nas
122a3(mdo): kyang bskal pa mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dka 'das nas myir skye bar gyur da nas tshe rabs thams cad dmus long
122a4(mdo): du 'gyur zhing / lce myed gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / deltag sgur dang / 'jing ba nul pa dang / rkang kyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus
122a5(mdo): skams pa dang / kha mnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong nga pa thos ma ya du myi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrim cig tu tshig smras pa
122a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba dag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba dag la khros pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das
122a7(mdo): bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltam rmongs par gyur da pa dang / ji ltar shes rab 'chal par gyurd pa dang / ji ltar blo chub par gyur pa rnams 'phags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
122a8(mdo): 'das rnams dgongs su gsol // de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyob pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
123a1(mdo): ti'i bus 'di skad ces / gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams la mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/ 'on te ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa ma pa pa/ 
123a2(mdo): ka nas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma smra shika/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams byed pa lnga po dka ni bla'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// 
123a3(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'tshams myed pa lnga byed pa ni/ 'tshams myed pa lnga po dag mur bya zad par byas nas phyir skye bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gangapa thag de ni nam la pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
123a4(mdo): rnams 'thob par myi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang bungal gzhan yapa phung par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan du zhing
123a5(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o/ ngamakha'i chos spo ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// las kyi sgra pa pa 'di lta bu dag bdag gis rmi lam ya yang mthong
123a6(mdo): bams gyur tshig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di ska pa ches bka' la to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam pa sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa
123a7(mdo): mi 'byung ba dang / bcas pa yin/ 'jig rten ni las bdag khyer bya ba/ rab kyi las kyi bgo skal la 'gyod pa/ rab kyi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rab kyi las rnam/ 
123a8(mdo): kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa myong gyi// de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ming ge legs su 'gro ba'i li bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa myed/ 
123b1(mdo): byas 'gro ba dang / mya ngam las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chib myed pa 'gro khru'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni sus kyis nyes pam khyad pa dang ldas/ ngag gis nye lam gyod
123b2(mdo): pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par pyod pa dang ldan zhing / 'phags pa rnams la bskur pa 'debs pa dang log par lta ste// log par lta ba'i las dang / chos log par blangs pa'i
123b3(mdo): des lus zhig nas shi ba 'i 'og tu ngan song ngam 'gro los par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// ka ra dwa ti'i bu sems can pas/ 
123b4(mdo): cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ras sems can/ cig gi don tu yang skal pa 'am/ skal pa las lhag par sem sa can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ 
123b5(mdo): sems can gcig po ni yongs su btang bar gyi bya'o snya/ ste/ sha yadwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po/ ni de 'dra'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na
123b6(mdo): mya zhig la bu cig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa/ khab dog bzang po// rgyas pa mchog dang / ldan pa zhog yod la de rkyen da 'gal zhig dang phrad nas 'chi pa'i dus
123b7(mdo): byas par gyur da na/ myi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde bar gyur te/ ngu zhing sme sngags 'don to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
123b8(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal la dag la bu cig pa bzhin tu dgongs pam mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyin mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig karma
124a1(mdo): pa ni ma yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i mong ba skan cig myi gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon
124a2(mdo): mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu myi gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan kyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs
124a3(mdo): chen po mngon par sprul te/ bya ba dag kyang ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na myi gnas/ phyogs na myi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags shing 'gag par myi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i
124a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams so/ dngas su smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang s+ho nang te/ mdzad pa stod kyang gyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// 
124a5(mdo): dper na nam mkha'i khams no rnam par rtog pa myed kyi spros pa myed pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'isku la yang rnam par rtog pa myed cing spros pa myed do// 'on kyang
124a6(mdo): sems can rnams dang mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go// 
124a7(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa myi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mkhye da pa myo mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel 'khyi ma pa'o// na ra dwa ti'i bu ni/ 
124a8(mdo): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzu bo dang / cho bo dang ba dang / mchog dang / phul dang / tha ma dang / bla ma myed pa dang / kong na myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / sha radwa ti'i bu tshig
124b1(mdo): smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o// rab tu byung ba 'am/ khyim pa yang rupa ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni/ sems can dmyal gI/ 
124b2(mdo): sdug bsngal ba 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
