189a6(mdo): sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin mo// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ 
189a7(mdo): lta ba nyams pa ma yin// cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par 'apyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
189a8(mdo): 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin mo// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul khams
189b1(mdo): cad dang / nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad pi la gyis gnond te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa mchog gi zi yid kyis gnon to// de 'dod na 'dzam bu'i grib sgra nyag ma
189b2(mdo): cig gi che mo la 'jug ko// de bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod nag pag
189b3(mdo): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdus phra rab gcig la 'jog go// de bzhin du gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi
189b4(mdo): bcu dang / lnga bcu nas/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du// myed pa'i ga pa ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kha/ mas rdul phra rapa gcig la 'jog kyang / rdul phra rapa de la
189b5(mdo): gang pa dang bri bkang pa de yang myi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khe mas de rnams kyangapa phan tshun du gdos par myi 'gyur/ sem sa can de rnams la gnod par yang myi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang
189b6(mdo): chub sems dpal rdzu 'phrul gyi stabs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na/ stong
189b7(mdo): sus kyi ban pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams rin po 'i lnga bdun gyis gang ba byid kyim rdzob bo// de 'dod na brjod du byed pa'i sa brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lar du riri ba'i nam
189b8(mdo): na nga chub sems sa sum pa// ma pa gangs kyi
190a1(mdo): ga pa yin zhe na/ 'dis byang chub sems dpal brjod tu myed pa yis pa brjod du myed pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig don ya dang padang / cig dang / 
190a2(mdo): sgom par byed de/ des pa bya chub sems dpa gsungs kyi stobs sum sum logs pa yin no// ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpal rnam par gyi 'khrugs pa'i rkyen gyi rlabs kyi stobs yun sum
190a3(mdo): tshogs pa yi ma zhen// me bzhin gshegs pa dkri ba nam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma rtogs pa// / byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs byid du rlabs pa sa/ 
190a4(mdo): gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par myi 'khrugs pa'i byir gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun su/ 
190a5(mdo): tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'o bka' myi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma rtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog
190a6(mdo): pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ros nas mthong ste// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal bka' myi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po/ de dang ldan na/ 
190a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpal stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yi shes phun sum tshogs pa dzas yin no// bcug pa zhen 'dis ga gang pa
190b1(mdo): bdag/ myed pams zhes phun sum tshogs pa rnams pa/ ma la bad/ skyed pa'i ye shes yum sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi ma ba ma yin pa'i mi zhes phur lus tshogs pa rnams yin/ taping 'dzid kyi phyir/ 
190b2(mdo): yul rgya ye zhes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yon/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// myi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams ya ma// sems can thams cad kyi phyor
190b3(mdo): ba rnam par lta ba 'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten
190b4(mdo): las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs dkyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal ga pa zag la bdag skye dad pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
190b5(mdo): 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag pa mtho / 'jig rtend pa/ 'gog pa yang yang dag par mtho ngo // des phung po skye ba rnams snying po myed pa dang / byed pa myed
190b6(mdo): pa dang / gsog tu yang yang bdag par mthong / phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yangab dag par mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag mi bdag myed pa// sems cad myed pa// srog myed pa// gso ba myed pa/ 
190b7(mdo): kang zag myed pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so sol skye bo'i bdag tu 'dzidad pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag cag ka phung po rnams bdag myed/ bdag cag ga phung po rnams la
190b8(mdo): bang / yod do// bdas cag gi bad sa phung po rnam pa yang ga/ khang cag gi ba ni phre pa po tshan mo snyam ste/ de bdag tu 'dzidzid pa sa mngan par shes pa pa de na nyid 'a cid do// de khon nyid 'ang
190'a1(mdo): 6/ mud pas 'gas pa'i 'khoms snyam la'ab lan 'byam mo snyam bu sems zhing / de thams cad kya byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa li la bzhini phur ba tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
190'a2(mdo): gang zag la bdag byed pa'i ye zhes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa' chos su spro 'dogs pa dang / 
190'a3(mdo): chos la skur pa yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu zhes te/ de 'di snyam du kro bum du byung ba'i chos la brtags pa'i myong btags te// chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin// yo ge dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi 'din myong tsam pa/ 
190'a4(mdo): tha snyad tsam tu byali// tha snyad / 'di la mngon par zhend par myi bya'o// glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du myed pa ma yin to// de kye dang / gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyend rnams kyis 'byung ni/ 
190'a5(mdo): rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod do// zhes de thams cad du// byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun du/ 
190'a6(mdo): tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal nyi tshe ma yin pa'i ye sheso phun sum tshogs pa yin zhes/ byang chub sems dpal nyi tshe ba'i ye zhes skad cig cig la 'jug cing / skad cig gnyis pa la gyi 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang / 
190'a7(mdo): chub sems dpa'i me shes ma tho mi skad cig thams cad la thogs pa skyed par 'jug ste/ de lta bar byang chu' sems dpal nyi tse ba la yini pa'i ye shes kun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' ti nge 'dzin dag myong
190'a8(mdo): yul kyi'igs sun sum chogs pa yin zhen/ 'di sa byang chub sems dpa' sa nyan mas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyapar 'a tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge la ning rnams su par 'atu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin na
190'b1(mdo): rab tu shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang rab tu shes so// des ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzid kyi khyod yul gang la nyan thos kyi myong ba de yapa rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin pa
190'b2(mdo): kyi gyod yul ga pa la rang sangs rgyas kyi myong pa de ya nga rab tu shes// ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi pyod yul gang la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin dka dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi
190'b3(mdo): spyod yul kang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes te/ rnam par sbyin pas grub kyi rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma
190'b4(mdo): yin no// ting nge 'dzind / kazhan rnams ni rnam par sbyin pas grub pa'i/ rung gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te// de ltar na byang chub sems dpal ting pe/ 'dzi na dag spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na
190'b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa/ yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlab// sa kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// rang sangs rgyas kyi byin
190'b6(mdo): kyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// byang chub sems dpa'i byin kyigyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhis shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhas dag gi lta cis te/ de ltar ma byang chub sems dpal byin kyi rlabs kyi
190'b7(mdo): ye shes pur sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal gyi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na// 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad
190'b8(mdo): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyi 'phrogs pa yin te// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gyi 'thogs pa'i ye zhes sum su la tshogs pa yi do// kAr sa byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gyong
190''a1(mdo): pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye zhes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i ye zhes yongs su dag pa// dang zhi'i rtog pa myed pas/ sems cas kyi khams la rnam par lta ste// des den/ 
190''a2(mdo): sems can las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang / las byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag dang / las byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs padag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la sa da
190''a3(mdo): po la gnas pa dag dang / la las bcu pa'i bam la gnas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dag dang / la la
190''a4(mdo): ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba dka'ang / la la ra sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba dag dang / del la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo // 
190''a5(mdo): de ltar sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na bya
190''a6(mdo): chub sems dpal lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes/ phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal pyod pa 'am/ 'greb pa 'am// 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'am// 'ong ba ma thun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung
190''a7(mdo): ste/ 'di lta ste dper na gyi gnyid kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rtsub pa dag spun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o// ye shes de yang thams cad du myi chags par
190''a8(mdo): 'dug ste/ da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji lta par byang chub sems dpa' tshes khams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyiyi zhes yum sum tshogs pa yin zhes/ 'dis byang chu
190''b1(mdo): sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs pa ras par ba tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig par yab rab tu shes// mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes// sgyu ma'i mtsham nyid du yang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa
190''b2(mdo): kun tu btags pa'i mtshan nyid du 'ang rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshas nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten las/ 
190''b3(mdo): 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe ra/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal zag pa myed pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal
190''b4(mdo): 'jig rten las 'das kha'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chul sems dpal ye shes phur sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
190''b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpalas dpa mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu / gang zhe na 'di lta ste yangs shing chad myed pa rnams yin/ sems/ can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur ba rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan dupa na
190''b6(mdo): 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi smon chen po kun zad pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin// rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin// kyi chen po'i sdod du gyur pa rnaMs sI
190''b7(mdo): myi bskul pa rnams yin/ myi sdang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chubag sems dpal sangs shing tshad myed pa yin zhe sa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper nas chen po na thams cad tu yangs zhi / 
190''b8(mdo): myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang 'di ste ste/ bsod nams dngapa ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing tshad myed la yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad byed pa rnams yi ro// rdzi
191a1(mdo): ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpems/ sa chen po ni 'di skor lo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gos// sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar
191a2(mdo): gyurd pa yin no// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / pa blon 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab las sortogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang / phan
191a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa pa yin te// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur ba yin no// ji ltar na
191a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpal gnod pa dang / lam du pa 'dogs pa dang / bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dper nas chen po na dganod pas kyang zhe 'dras par myi 'gyur/ phan pas kyang rjes
191a5(mdo): su gas par gyi 'gyur te/ de gnyis su 'dushes pa kyi ro de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dgasapan 'das par gyi 'gyur/ phan pa dag gis kyang rjes su
191a6(mdo): bar gyi 'gyur te/ de na sems can de dag la rjes su chags pa dang / khro mo ba yang phyi ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal gnang ba dang lan cu ba na 'dags pa dang bral pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang
191a7(mdo): chos kyi snyi cher po kun med pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dbar ngam tshan pa srid chen po las 'bab pa'i chu'i klu chen po kun byed de/ bzod cing kun 'dzid to// de bzhin du byang sa
191a8(mdo): sems dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po las rgyas kyi che pa chen po rab rtsung ba la kun zed cing / bzod la 'dzid te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun
191b1(mdo): bye pa yid do// ji ltar da byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur dpa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ste// dper na/ sachem ze rnamams cad thams cad 'gro ba dang // 
191b2(mdo): ba'i gnas su gyurd pa yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang sems cad thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar su byang chub sems
191b3(mdo): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur da pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal dge ba'i chos kyis khon gyi gzhir gyur da pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper mas pon thams cad
191b4(mdo): sa chen po gzhir gyur da pa las skye'o// de bzhin du sems can// thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chu/ sems dpa' gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub
191b5(mdo): sems dpal dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yi na zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste dper mas chen po ni rin po
191b6(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che snga chags kun snang ngo // de bzhin du bya du chub sems dpa' ya yon tan rin po sems pa sna tshogs kyi snang du byur dem yin zhe / byang chub sems dpa'/ 
191b7(mdo): sa yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun sdang ste/ de ltar dbyang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i ldeng du byung bam yin no// ji ltar dbya chub sems dpa' kyi chemamo'i snod du gyur pa yi'i zhen// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sted pa
191b8(mdo): ma mchen po gang dgan rnam pa sa tshogs zho sa byu pa dag kyangs chen po la gnas te/ 'jig rnyed ma sdang ngo // de bzhin yugang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i ding rnam pa lnga tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chol kyi chen
192a1(mdo): po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas zhib 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim na po'i sdong du gyur nga pa yin no// ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' kyi su
192a2(mdo): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// sa chen po ni 'di ltar sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi skul ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa'
192a3(mdo): yang 'ang lte ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyinapa gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi skul ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi skul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi snang ba
192a4(mdo): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po ni glang po che'i rgyal/ dpo dang / ri dgas kyi rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra/ thos kyang gyi skrag/ myi dedang / dngang bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang/ 
192a5(mdo): yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na/ myi skrag myo dngang dngang bar myi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi sdang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu go/ 
192a6(mdo): de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal sa chen po dang mtshungs nas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldas na/ byang chub sems dpal skya dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 
192a7(mdo): dge ba'i chos la gzhol pa rnams yin/ dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed la rnams yin/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin// nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul pa rnams yin/ 
192a8(mdo): dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yani/ 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing ga ti dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mthon dman 'gengs
192b1(mdo): pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na
192b2(mdo): rgyu ni gzhol bar gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal dge ba'i chos la gzhol
192b3(mdo): pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal dkar po'o chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// chun che dang / shing gyel ba dang / phyi dang nags tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnaMs
192b4(mdo): kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ya radwa ting nge 'dzin dgi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam pa ru skyed do// skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi shing
192b5(mdo): du gyur dkyi/ bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid kyi sha du gyur pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'chob
192b6(mdo): 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal dkar po'i chos thams cad skyod pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// 
192b7(mdo): chun kho bo nyid kyis gshes pa cam yin// gzhan yang gzhes par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang po ma nyid kyis dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshes pa cam yin te// sems can gzhan ya dkal ba dang / 
192b8(mdo): dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshes pa can byed do// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun sa rten pa'o// rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/ de lta na rgyang/ 
193a1(mdo): chub sems dpal dgal ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshes pa can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i mkha'i rgyun thams cad lus la yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dber/ 
193a2(mdo): gtsum shi ga rnam pa dang / ma'i rnam pa'i mayang // rgyun rnams yul lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la bsgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rgyun thams cad stsal date/ jiste nyan mangs pa'i
193a3(mdo): mkha'i rgyun 'di dag gi myi ba yang myi zhes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i drib pa'i bag chags kyang myed par 'gyur ba de lta bur stsal te/ de ltarar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i ya ba'i rgyun thams nad 'phrul pa pa yin no// 
193a4(mdo): ji ltar na dang zhinga'i rnyon pa myed de gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa myed de/ 
193a5(mdo): gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / bral bas na dpa'a'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gaN+Di muka dang bral bas na rnyog pa byed pa'o// dbang po rab tu dpabs na/ 
193a6(mdo): gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal dang zhi ba rnyog pa myed de gso la ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdub pa rab tu zhi bar byed cen// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// chu mis
193a7(mdo): chen pan byed kyi pas gdungs pa dang / delas gzhan yang sems can nam me pyid tshabs gdungs 'daras rab tuzhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems cad do
193a8(mdo): sems can gi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de// de ltar ma byang chub sems dpal nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog
193b1(mdo): pa yin zhe / rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste dperan// rkun snyom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi sgom pa rnam par zlog go// de bzhin su byang chub sems dpa' yang sus la sred pas/ nyen pa'i sems can
193b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dag la ga pagos sems cam bdag gi yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyub pa de lta bu'i chos kyi cher mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar ma byang chub sems dpal 'dod pa la sred pa la zlog par byed do// ji ltar/ 
193b3(mdo): me byang chub sems dpal zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhes/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu li 'jings ni zab cing rting dpag dkal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye zhes yang dag par grub par hA
193b4(mdo): 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad dang / mu stegs can thams cad kyis/ rting dpag rga zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
193b5(mdo): sems dpal mthon dman 'grengs pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// chu'i klung ni sa'i phyogs mthon dman 'gyengs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu'i rlung kyis
193b6(mdo): sems cad kyi khams mthon dman 'gyengs te/ ji ltar chus 'gyings pa ltar sems can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ sems can de rnams sa snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu'i glupa bebs
193b7(mdo): shing de dag la gnod par myi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
193b8(mdo): lta ste dper na/ chu 'di sa'i phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul pa thams cad sgrub par byed cing / rdul de dag zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems la pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la
194a1(mdo): gnas pa'i ting nge'i rje rnyed kyi chus sems sgrub par byed cing // sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpal nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad
194a2(mdo): rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal rtswa dang mtshungs pa rnams yon no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams
194a3(mdo): yin no// ban+ya gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dang khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su sbyin par byed/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skam/ 
194a4(mdo): par byed pas me'i phung po 'dra ba rnams yin// snang bar gyur pa pra rnams yin// skrag par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byinan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa pa rnams yin/ 
194a5(mdo): mchon par byed pa rnams yin/ myi brnyas pa rnams man rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon no// nges pa'i phyag ngar zhung thams cad/ sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
194a6(mdo): lta ste/ dper na me ni phyeg dang khung dang pa dang / shing dang / gel ba dang / mi dang / sdong po thams cad sreg go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang la shes rab kyis bka la nyas dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / 
194a7(mdo): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ti mug gi zhon mongs pa'i phyag dam gyi khyung thams cad mes ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dang khung thams cad sreg pa yon no// ji ste men byang chub
194a8(mdo): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mas thams cad yongs su sbyid par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa gas rab kyis nab kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'ang ltar 'jos pas
194b1(mdo): myi 'gyur ba de sa yongs su spyod par zeng ngo // degam na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su spyond par byed do// ji snya na byang chub sems dpa' tha yongs pa'i 'das thams cad rnam par byed cen/ rigs kyin/ 
194b2(mdo): dpa' nan mongs pa'i 'dum thams cad snyan par byed do// ji ltar dbyang chub sems dpa' bo'i byang po dang 'dra ba ya zhes/ rigs kyi 'di sa ste dper na sems cad kyang ba na kyis nyer ba
194b3(mdo): kyi grang ba myed par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i gleng ba'i nang dkyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i da/ 
194b4(mdo): myed par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sa gro bar byed de/ de/ ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' snang bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs
194b5(mdo): kyi bu 'di ste ste dper dgangs kyi rtse mo'us/ ri 'jigs byed rgya mo na me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad cig kho ra khor yug du snang bar byed/ dpag tshad gnyis khor khror yun dang / dpag tshad
194b6(mdo): gsum kho mkhar yug tu sdang bar byed de// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal ma pa ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du yang khyab par byed/ rang ga stong phrag brgya
194b7(mdo): yang khyab par byed pa nas/ 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas// sems cad thams cad la ye shes kyis sdang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba des phyi shes pa'i
195a1(mdo): mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par selang te/ de ltar bya ba chub sems dpal snang zar chu rang pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yi zhe nag/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
195a2(mdo): dper na ri shes khro bo 'am/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na// skrag cing dang pal dngangs par gyur da cing / 'di lta ste meli 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas/ de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring baspong
195a3(mdo): go gde bzhi de rje bdud rnamapas pag bdud kyi ngos kyi sgra rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong pa skrag cing dngangs dang bar gyur da tsapo/ 'di lta stega'i 'arji chung ba'i phyi gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyazas pagyi 'os na
195a4(mdo): mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar ring bas kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpal skrag par byed pa yin no// ji ltar mu byang chub sems dpal dbugs 'byind pa yin zhen// rigs kyi bu 'di
195a5(mdo): lta ste dpe dag/ myi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las/ me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ de de logs su song pa dang / des de grong ngam NI/ phagu 'gram mtho ba nas// de shugs phyi nang te rab tu dbugs phyi nga nas/ 
195a6(mdo): 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems cad rnams kyis byang chub sems dpal mthong / shugs phyi da par 'gyur/ rab tu dbugs phyind par 'gyur/ 
195a7(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar ma byang chub sems dpal dbugs 'byin pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
195a8(mdo): dang dag marnamams can thams cad kyi srin mo du gyun pa'o/ ris ran rgyas zas dpar rnye gas pagang gangos bus pa na nodo// nga bzhis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i'ims can mams cad dang drim sngo kyi/ 
195b1(mdo): gyu rang pa yin te/ ji ltar rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol phul yang de bzhin te/ de lta bar byang chub sems dpra' sems can thams cad kyi thung pong du gyur pa yin do// ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhes
195b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na me la mi bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi myi dang / yul gyi gyo rnams kyis mchod ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang 'di lta ste dper na/ gyi dang / lAm y-i ma dpe / dri ma dang bcas pa'i 'dzi
195b3(mdo): rtom gos ston pa ma 'du shes pas// mchod de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod la bya ba yi na no byang chub sems dpal myi rnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me stag chub ngu yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin / pas na
195b4(mdo): myi rgyas pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pas 'gyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sem das dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po pa las dang po'i yangaH/ dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis myi brnyas pa yinan/ 
195b5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin mas kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni ring po myi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub mngon
195b6(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong tu chud de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
195b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' chung dmar dang mtshungs pa rnapas yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas byed par pyod pa dang / gyod yul kun tu mu myed pa dang / sems can nga rgyal kyis snyems pa'i rtse mo mtho zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil par byed
195b8(mdo): ba dang / chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar rgyo
196a1(mdo): ba dang / chos kyi cher sprin dpag tu myed pa kun 'dzind pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhas khyed khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par phye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing / yongs su 'gong pa dang / 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor
196a2(mdo): dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag pa rnam par nges pa'i me tog yo de khu 'ong ba'i cher rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang / skal pa grangs myed par dkab po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su partsams la ting nge 'dzin dang / 
196a3(mdo): rnam par tha rad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang // khab pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug li las 'thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyis
196a4(mdo): mtha na ga dus 'ayongs su myed pa lang thoyang dag par gnas pa/ da ci chus byed pa'i gsas 'gyur bar 'dzig pa'i mishes kyi rlung ni kyis 'a'od du tu tong bar phyir ro// rigs kyi bye la'iji ltamang byang chum mo sa
196a5(mdo): gnas myed par khyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni thams cad du thogs pa myed cing gnas pa myed de// rten myed/ de gzugs myed kyang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhas byed lnga
196a6(mdo): dang / ri ba dang / rgyam tsho las 'thogs pa thams cad la rang gi rkos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung dmar yang chos thams cad la kun tu myi gnas pa yin te/ phung po dang / khams
196a7(mdo): dang / skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khas
196a8(mdo): dang / sgo'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sA'i khams dang / dri'o khams dang / sA'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / skye'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus
196b1(mdo): kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / myig go skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / 
196b2(mdo): rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la gyi
196b3(mdo): gnas pa yin// 'jig rtend pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ngo'o// lha dang phyi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byi dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bdag
196b4(mdo): tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dngar sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams da thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas par gyi byed de// de sa
196b5(mdo): cad la myi gnas pas/ dngos po dang / dngos po myed pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid las sosogs par rlom sems su rnam pa du mas ma gyur da cing / dmyigs pa myed la// rnam par thard
196b6(mdo): pa'i sgrib pa myed pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sa tshogs pa yang myed la/ phyogs pacu mtha' yas mu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams
196b7(mdo): cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal par thams cad du yang rgyu la/ chos kyi lus kyis myi snang ba yang yin zhing / myi rtog rnam par myi rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas myed par spyod pa
196b8(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu ji lta mang byang chub sems dpa' myod yul kun tu mu myed pa yan zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpeman/ rlung dam pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa dag tu reg par byed de// g.yos
197a1(mdo): gtsa 'o// gis byini bani nga sumang rgyam bsas dpa'abya ma pa thams cad pa kya dzub dang / dadadas pa nas bdang / yang byed pa/ shAg nam pagag cug na/ 
197a2(mdo): gshegs pa'i 'char kyang kyis 'khom dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor da// dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi ma gyogs pa dang ldan zhing phyogs thams cad kyi ma bar thug pa 'i khyod yul zer gyur nas/ N+ya
197a3(mdo): zhib 'gro ste// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu myed pa yin to// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can pa rgyal gyis snyems pa 'i me mo mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa yini zhe na/ rigs
197a4(mdo): ki bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung ngamar ni ri dpa/ khyim dang / nag tshas kyi rtse mo dag 'dung thar byed/ rab tu rnyil par byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ dmyi snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal drung dam pa dang / 
197a5(mdo): sems can pa rgyal dang / rlob pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i blos snyems pa rnams gzugs dang / dpal bab pa dang / long myed dang / da bang po dang / stobs dang / tshe dang / nad myed pa dang / 'chol dang / bzod pa
197a6(mdo): thob pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra ma zhes pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag stod pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa li phun sum tshogs pa bstan da pa dang / chos bstand pas
197a7(mdo): pargyal choms par byed cing / dge ba dri ma myed pa la spyom par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyal gyis snyems pa'i che mor 'thor zhing / 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi pu ji lta bar byang chub sems das/ 
197a8(mdo): chos kyi cha ba sprin chen po kun ras skyed pa yin zhen/ rags kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ma chung das pa'i phyogs bzhinas/ min gyi dkyil 'kho kha tog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsas la lanyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgyal tsho'i dbyangs can sku/ 
197b1(mdo): tshe sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byind cing yi du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa/ klog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gis rnam par brgyad 'gang dag gis 'jig rten gi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khyabs par byas rte// 'gro ba/ 
197b2(mdo): thams cad dga' ba dang // lo tog dang sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir char kyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chang par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas slob po// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal rlung nga mar yang lus sna tshogs
197b3(mdo): kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs brgya 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha tog mthal yas pa'i kha'i klog gi'i phreng ba'i rgyur 'byung ba yang dag pa/ de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra/ 
197b4(mdo): yan lag stong phrag drug cu ba sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlupa dmar gyis yang dag par mthor la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis brlas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kun nas khyebs par byas
197b5(mdo): shing ka ngan song dang / myi khom pa las sortogs pa nas// sems can rnams rnam khar bslang ste/ rnam pas thams cad mtshan dang / dpe la byad bzang po dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs
197b6(mdo): steg 'god pa thams cad kyi rkyen gyis brgyang ba'i 'jig rten gi khams ngag kyang byin gis rlabs nas// lha dang myi dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur da pa dga' ba dang / bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten
197b7(mdo): brda / 'jig rtenams 'das pa'i mchog dag thol lo cog dang / kyi chen po dang / sngob po sems cad rnam par bskyed pa dang/ thams cad du skyed par zas kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir// sems can thams cad kyi phug sum tshogs dang / 
197b8(mdo): dgal ba yun sum tshogs pa dang / rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi mamachen po mngod par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi ji ltams byang cung / 
198a1(mdo): sems dpal 'gro po khrims cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpepa na rlung dmar dri zhim po 'tsher kyi rgyan gyi snying po can ldang na/ sems can rnams kyi sa dung ba yongs/ 
198a2(mdo): su zhi bar byas shing / sus shi ning tu bsil ba dang / bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlupa mar ldang / sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dngag gti mug dang / ngan 'gro dang / 
198a3(mdo): rngon par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tsom dang / 'phongs pa myi bzad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / bral zhing phrad pa dang / rang rnams btsal nas/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
198a4(mdo): la srel ba las bathogs pa'i gtung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang / 'dres pa'i bla ma myed pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa la / 
198a5(mdo): bas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems da/ pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gtung ba rab tu// zhi bar byed cing / nyon mongs pa byed pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no// 
198a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
198a7(mdo): na dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung ki mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mngon par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpal bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung
198a8(mdo): dmar nye bar sbyar ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang / sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzham yang 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dmar ni 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu/ 
198b1(mdo): 'di lta ste / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dpa'akhor yug gyi ri reg dang / 'khor yug kyi ro chen po rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi'o yongs su 'dzi rang pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rim po che'i byug
198b2(mdo): gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / ri ba dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos kyi ngang ldar dang / grong rdus dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal byed 'tha dag ngo// 'jam bu'i gros
198b3(mdo): dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dpa/ stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gi stong chen po dag bkod pa rngam par phye ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung dmar yang phyogs bcu
198b4(mdo): kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye ba ru/ bsgrub bo// skyed do// yongs su gzhog go// de la ji ltar gangs kyi dri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun suM chos
198b5(mdo): ba rnams blta'o// ji ltar na gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri rab phun sum/ tshogs pa de ltar na nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// / ji ltar na stong gi 'jig rten gi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na
198b6(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na byang chub sems/ 
198b7(mdo): dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gsum go stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khoms phun sum tshogs pa ji ltar na/ 'jig rten thams cad nis mngon 'ar 'phags pa'i 'jig rtem ga khams thams cad kyi
198b8(mdo): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i shi na tu rnam par dag par grags pa// mchod pa la rnam par dmyigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa// rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams
199a1(mdo): brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa phum sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar mo tong nge 'dzin kyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// kwi ba dang / bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang/ gli cher po bzhi tha las 'tshogs
199a2(mdo): ba ltar ni sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun las gtogs par blta'o// krong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal myed khang ltar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan
199a3(mdo): bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpaka bsam gyi shing kyi nags tshal rnams ltar ni sa dang / pha rol tu phyi da pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang // rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub
199a4(mdo): sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stob/ ngas dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po la sang btsogs pa'i dbang skur dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// 
199a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na yongs su brtag par bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten
199a6(mdo): ki khams gang ga'i klung grangs myed pa'i phyis rnyed dag / sems cad gang mi byed yang ba dang ga mams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i lanang los sbyar ba'i 'aso rnams kyi phung po dang ldan par byung nas/ den bu'i 'phang la su
199a7(mdo): ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs kyi yajig rten gi khams thams cad 'das
199a8(mdo): de snyed kyi 'jig rton gi khams su gtogs pa'i sems je snyed ci// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang / so sor ldan par gyur da la/ snga ma bzhin du grogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i Shas/ 
199b1(mdo): kyi ma thas gtugs pa dag na/ sems cad yod do// chag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bug stag dang / so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhim du 'grang ba de nyid kyis / 'jig rten gamapa de sted
199b2(mdo): gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur nga la// phyogs ban+d+ha li 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung grangs byed pa'i bye ma snyed du rtogs pa'i brgya byin
199b3(mdo): rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chetsam pa de dang / brgya byin cig cig ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkharim thas gtugs pa/ thams cad na sems cad
199b4(mdo): gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang / 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur da la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu la phyogs re re 'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rtogs pa'i sems can de dag
199b5(mdo): thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur pa la/ bsod nams de tham/ sa cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang // tshangs pa chen po gcig nr-i ke lnga/ rna bar gyur pa la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang / 
199b6(mdo): de bzhin du gyur da te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nye mthos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpe las chen po 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa/ 
199b7(mdo): stag tu gyur da te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams su rtogs pa dus gsum la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dzaH
199b8(mdo): pa'i dus gsum ki nam mkha'i khams su rtogs pa dang / 'jig rten go khams su rtogs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rdul phra rab brkyar bsgyur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba sru'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'gyur ni
200a1(mdo): ba bcu'i khrub bu thams cad rtogs pa'i bsod rnams kyi phung po brgya stang grangs byed pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byang ba bang po brgya stsal pa dpe ba zang pa mem mngon 'am 'grub bo// dpe kyang pa tham por rtogs
200a2(mdo): pa'i ba sod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du myed pa bcur bsgyur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu yang gu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub lo// de yang brjod du byed pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs
200a3(mdo): pa'i smyon 'tshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste// dri me myed pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'o mngon par grub po// de yang brjod du myed pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
200a4(mdo): gyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / bltar myi snang btsug tor gas rnam par brgyan pa'i mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas// re bzhi
200a5(mdo): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsu yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa// dmyigs pa thams cad las gsum gyi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis/ grub pas// sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur
200a6(mdo): ba 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa// mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya'i mchi na ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang / 
200a7(mdo): ye shes kyi tshogs kyi zad pa dang ldan zhing / kun tu rgyas par byed pa// 'god pa dang lda pas sems cam thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung ma/ gas te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi
200a8(mdo): dbyings kyis bzlas pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa// thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sgom la gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog tu lta ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang
200b1(mdo): dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur pa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu rtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la/ 'dzam bu'i rgya bo'i gser gyis byas pa li/ sdod rim po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spros pa/ 
200b2(mdo): nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te// phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i skal par yongs su bkang zhing / skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing / zher yang ba spu'i zhu bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dam pa
200b3(mdo): gapa pa 'am/ bri bar myi mngon to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang
200b4(mdo): dri ma myod pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro can dang / shi nad tu sbyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / myi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i glo gros/ dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od te/ sa bcu gnyis
200b5(mdo): bo na de dag go// de la byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'dim byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tanaHmas cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po khams
200b6(mdo): cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khyad zhugs shi ba 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad tu dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi
200b7(mdo): rgyan gyis brgyad pa / phyogs bcu'i 'di nyen gyi khams su byed par snang bar byed la 'od kyi kyil 'khor dang ldan la/ slob pa myed pa'i stobs kyi thugs 'chad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gangs myed par skad ci/ re re la 'gro zhing 'ong // 
200b8(mdo): dri zhim dang 'od zer gyi dri ba'i tshogs chen po'i grib bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kun tu 'byung ba// pad mas rkapa pa/ yongs su brtan pa// stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi mthal dang mnyam pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i// chos thams cad
201a1(mdo): 'di bunas pa gdad pa'i ga masong rnas par brnams pas// pags 'amyed cing ba'i du 'ong ba'i rtsigs pa'i samanas chen po 'as gas pa/ thas med pa'i ma sa ba mamathas kyi rgya na ma/ 
201a2(mdo): phyogs kyi nags tshal gribs lo mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bas sa kyis kyi thub la/ rab tu 'byed pas/ zhing dpag tu byed pa'i spyan byed pa/ la gi rten gi khams brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten ga khams du
201a3(mdo): tu myed pa snyed kyi/ bdag gi gizugs brnyan gyis dbang sgyur pa/ yang dag par nod pa'i dbang dang / byin gyis rlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i cher gyi snang ba'i sgo dang/ 
201a4(mdo): tu myed pa thams cad brtan pa// myed par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyid chen po lhur byed pa// bltan bzang zhing yid bya 'o la/ mdzes shing dge la/ 'gro ba thams cad dang / myi mthun pa myed
201a5(mdo): tsang don yod pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ ba 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa// rab tu g.yo bar byed 'gro ba// ngan 'gro las sordzogs pa las/ sems can mtha' yas
201a6(mdo): pa yongs su skyob pa// mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rigs pa grangs myed pas rnam par/ 
201a7(mdo): rosad pa/ chos mtha' sbas pa la dka' zhing / mos pas/ zang zing myed par phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par myi rtog cing / lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa// skal/ 
201a8(mdo): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu myed par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la// gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar byed pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon
201b1(mdo): bar grub pa// grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos 'gyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chu
201b2(mdo): kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di sde ste dper na// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na myo'o kha tog las ni 'das la/ lha'i kha tog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang / 'di
201b3(mdo): rtend pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od ni dbus myed pa la lus
201b4(mdo): dri ma myed pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shi nad tu ltang bu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la ting nge 'dzind rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byad
201b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind rnams te/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ rin cen kun tu 'phags dang / shaning tu gnas pa/ dang / gyi skul pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung / 
201b6(mdo): gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang / dpal bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag las sotshogs pa'i bya
201b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mthal las so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang skur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / phyi zad pa'i ma la to// 
201b8(mdo): dang / 'khyim pa mthal yas pa dang / rgyam po'i phyag rgya dang / pad ma bkod pa dang // chags pa byed pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so la bdag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'dug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byen gi chubs
202a1(mdo): pa dang / kha tog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha tog rdzogs la mngon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs te// de dag las 'thogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug steg drug gang / 
202a2(mdo): enaka 'di lta ste/ lha'i myig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rold kyi sems shes pa dang // sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran ba'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / 'og pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
202a3(mdo): ste/ drug po de dag go/ dbang ni brgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad skal pa ba grangs myed dpag tu myed par byin gyis rlob pas/ tshol dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzind brjod du byed pa'i yo brjod du
202a4(mdo): myed pa la nges par rtog cing / 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan rtsu nga margyan pa'i byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / 
202a5(mdo): dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par sbyin pa'i byin gyis rlob pa/ stodad pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mu stond pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gi kha lus cad sangs rgyas/ 
202a6(mdo): kyis yongs su ga pabaston pas mos pa la dba' pa dang / dus dang zhing gang cu 'dod pam mngon par byang chub la ston pas smon las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du su 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthal
202a7(mdo): bston pas/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang / dpung byed pa yongs su stond pas/ chos la dbang ga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so ya bdag par rig pa dang // 
202a8(mdo): 'dres pa dag ga mtshan dang / dpe than bamang ba dang / bangon par rdzogs pa'i gying chu 'de dang / dus bams cad tu rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mas cad kyi stsas tha rab kyi mangs lam rdzogs pa gang ci can pa ngas su das/ 
202b1(mdo): ba rnam pa thams cad kyi ma chog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye zhes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sadad pas ye shes la dab la ste/ bcu po de dag ni bya ba chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang nams so// de la byag
202b2(mdo): chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / gyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i
202b3(mdo): stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i myi 'jin
202b4(mdo): pa bzhig pazhe no// 'di lta ste gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzind cing / don bstan pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / bdag myed pa khong du chud pas / zhan gyis rtse ba'i mtshan ma myi 'byung zhing / rang bzhin gyis 'apyod yum largyad
202b5(mdo): byed pa'i lan gsum yongs su dag pa'i srung ba chen po phun su chogs pa'i myi 'jigs pa dang / chos gzung ba yun ring du myi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyind pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston/ 
202b6(mdo): pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du myi 'gyur zhing myi 'jigs pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams zhing / theg pa gzhan gyis myi 'byung ba dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang
202b7(mdo): dag par thob par bya ba la myi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brkyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
202b8(mdo): rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma kha sta dang pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / sa bstan pa'i brtsod 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang / 
203a1(mdo): a khastadad pa'i shes rab can rnams dpag bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdung la rnams dpa/ yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga zhes tha rnams 'dzag thabs mkhas zas/ sems can thams cad kyi myod pa'i dbang kyis/ 
203a2(mdo): theg pa'i mchog kyis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 'khom dang mya ngan las 'das pamin stan pa pa rnams dang ga su dang snrel gzhi'i skyel mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes na
203a3(mdo): tu 'gro bas mngon par 'du myi byed cing / kha na ma tho ba myed par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon du zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang / ngaka dang / yid kyi las kyi mthal dgo ba kho cu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gi phung
203a4(mdo): po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pa'i sems can kyi khams nyams cad yongs su myi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dka' bar stond pa rnams dang / byis pa rnams dang / nyan thos myi ba zad
203a5(mdo): pa ji snyed cig kau ne na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shi dpanabasam ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pa dang / dbang bsgyur
203a6(mdo): pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstand pa las phyin gyi ldeg pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chug sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang
203a7(mdo): med/ 'di lta ste gnas dang / gnas sa yin pa su myed pa'i spobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyims kyi rgya'i rnam par sbyid pa'i senang pa ma khyu nga pa'i sems dang / mos pa ga tshogs ma byed / 
203a8(mdo): pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / dbang po'i mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lo mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar po pa dang / 
203b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rngam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyedad pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye bam lced
203b2(mdo): ba'i stobs dang / 'ag pa med pa mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ brgya po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhig pa zhes/ 'di lta ste// chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang
203b3(mdo): rtsub pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / ba ru b+ha gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du myi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob
203b4(mdo): par 'gyur ba'i lam de bzhin tu 'gyur ba la myi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi yo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams so// de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs
203b5(mdo): pa la 'khrul pa myed pa dang / ca mo myed pa dang / bsnyel pa myed pa pasems mnyam par ma bzhag pa myed pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du/ shes myed pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myed pa dang / 
203b6(mdo): mos pa nyams pa myed pa dang / bcom 'grus nyams pa myed pa dang / dran pa nyams pa byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa myed pa dang / shes rab nyams pa myed pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa myed pa dang / 
203b7(mdo): 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye zhes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes
203b8(mdo): mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du / 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sdon 'gre zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'bra ba dang / yid kyi las zas
204a1(mdo): cad ye shes sdod du 'gro zhing ye zhes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ ba mo brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhel/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshes/ 
204a2(mdo): pa'i thugs rje chen po ni/ rnam pa sum brgya ma gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa/ dag tu bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu ma gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
204a3(mdo): chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa yin na// sems can rnams mi myed par ma mos pas// sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can du smra'o// sems can rnams
204a4(mdo): ni sems can du smra'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni srog tu lta'o zhes/ de'i phyir sems can rnams
204a5(mdo): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ga/ pa zag myed pa yin na// sems can rnams ni kang zag la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
204a6(mdo): po skye'o// chos thams cad bdag myed pa yin na// sems can rnams ni yod pam lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug ze chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas byed pa yin na// sems can rnams ni gnas la/ 
204a7(mdo): rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gzhi myed pa yin na// sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o// zhes sems can rnams la de lazhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po
204a8(mdo): skye'o// chos thams cad ni de yi byab myed la yin pa sems can rnams ni 'ayir bya ba la rten pado// zhes sems cad rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag myong ba yin na
204b1(mdo): sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la bathon no// zhes sems can rnams la do bzhi gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ste'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa la dem sems cam rnams ming ngos po ma
204b2(mdo): rje dang to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mi skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams mi'i chi 'pho dang skye ba sa rtend to zhes sems can rnams la/ 
204b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sho 'phos myed na ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa shi 'pho ba dang skye ba la te dang ngo zhes / sems can rnams/ 
204b4(mdo): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad na kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yinan/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
204b5(mdo): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sem/ sa can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// 
204b6(mdo): chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yi re na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar byed do// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral
204b7(mdo): ba yin na/ sems can thams cad ni gti mug par gyur to// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong
204b8(mdo): pa la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad da 'gro ba myed pa yi yin// sems cad rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems na/ 
205a1(mdo): nams sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi ches po bya'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa skyes pa sanan// sems can rnams na mngon par tu byed pa sa khyod de zhes de'i phyim sems
205a2(mdo): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khrugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni spro ba myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams na spro ba la dga'o// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i blam/ 
205a3(mdo): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni lte ba la zhe nad to// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan myed
205a4(mdo): pa yin na// sems can rnams ni mtshan yul can no// zhes// de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje/ chen po skye'o// chos thams cad na smon pa myed pa yin na// sems
205a5(mdo): can rnams ni smon lam spyod do zhes/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa'i 'ad ni phan tshun thodang pas yongs su zind cing / gnod
205a6(mdo): sems kyi za ba dang / zhe sda pa la zhugs par gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod sems kyi the ba dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos bstand par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skyer
205a7(mdo): kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyi nad mi log dang ldan zhing / lam nyam nga bar zhugs shing / lam kol ba la gnas pa yin kyis// de dag yang dag pa'i lam dugazud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de
205a8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje cher po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni rgas zhing 'dod pa'i zild kyis non pa ste/ cho ga myi shes shing gzhan gyi noms 'phrog pa yin gyis de dka' phags pa'i nor dad pa dang / tshul
205b1(mdo): rjen ba ste'o// sems can 'did/ kyi shes papa 'ams s+ho// ka ga la ga ci 'dri par/ dag ma pas su/ # sa bsta / sa sems cas rnamasas
205b2(mdo): gshegs pa'i thugs sde chen po skye'o// kyem sems cad 'di dag yin sa kyi gnas bkum sti dang / tshig su bcad las khyod kyang / bad ga cag ni tshig zhes pa'o snyam du 'dzind kyis/ de dag 'di skad du spun/ 
205b3(mdo): bsngal zhi nad tu zhi zhing / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shind tu chog par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye sa sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gadra
205b4(mdo): sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyan mongs pa la rtag tu dgal la yid kyis de dag la byung zhing khams gsum pa las yab dag par 'das par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstand to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
205b5(mdo): 'khrugs rje chen po sgra'o// chos thams cad na rgyas nye bar 'gro ba ste// bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams mi 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le yo byed kyis/ de dag
205b6(mdo): la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir bachod 'grus bsdam par chos bstand to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni tshigs pa myed pa'i ye shes
206a1(mdo): dpa kyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing / ka pa 'di dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dben pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas
206a2(mdo): kyi ye shes la dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po blo mos par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rngam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na sems
206a3(mdo): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs rje chen po zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa gsum bcu ma gnyis
206a4(mdo): bo de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skyen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos/ rgyas dpa phyir myi ldog pa sems can gi don la brtson par rig par bya'o// 
206a5(mdo): snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bgadas nyen srog chags song phrag/ sum bcu ma gnyis 'i khrin byed la yang / par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgya snang/ 
206a6(mdo): ni gyi skye ba'i chos la brjod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag 'dun nu phra gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi myog tshul byed ci dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag las 'ardzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang/ 
206a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur ga chos rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu myed grangs myed de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skald par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' myed na/ sems can rnams kyi dkal ba dang/ 
206a8(mdo): dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ phyogs tsam zhig bsta nad te/ de ltar na byang chugA sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthum par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rtsub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la ma wa/ 
206b1(mdo): na// na #ma 'di dag tu byed ma dzin dum pa dzin// gas kyi 'dis da
206b2(mdo): mas 'jigs pa dang / thegs pacad smin dang bcas pa/ byamatsho dang / sring cad po bani par bcas pa// ring ba dang / mi btang 'brang dang / mi bta 'bru chen po dang / gangs dang / 'ong sus ridang / 'o dun mi chen pos
206b3(mdo): ro spos kyi ngang ljang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / dgas tshalang dang / gzhal myed khang kyi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzi nad to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / gzungs kyi
206b4(mdo): rlung dmar gyi dkyil 'khor su myed pas// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dngas rgyas kyi sprin kyis pa la la gtan pa myed pa'i chos kyi cher gyi na chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten gi khaMs thos
206b5(mdo): cad 'chags pa'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i mir ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / gli nga chen po bzhi pa dang / ri pa tang bzung dang / ri btang ba zung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / 
206b6(mdo): ri spos kyi dad ldan dang / grong rdas dang / 'bab rgya dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal myed khang gi rnam pa ji lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang / 
206b7(mdo): mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la mtshogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phum supa tshogs pa thams
206b8(mdo): cad yongs su 'dzi nad to// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phu 'apo brgya stong pu myed sa yum sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad pa yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
207a1(mdo): chos kyi char spri dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yinado// ji skar na byang rgyal sems dpa' chos rnam pa sadang pa'i gnas byed 'ang ched pa'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad nam par 'byed cing / yod
207a2(mdo): su 'god pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung dam mad ga zhas byed khang bkod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de// dgas tshal dang / shing dang / 
207a3(mdo): sam ka dang / 'dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po las sa tshogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi san lag dang / nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun gyi
207a4(mdo): 'chad par yongs su gzhog cing / rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag/ par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing / 
207a5(mdo): mtha' yas// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa phru/ na sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhon/ par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ sdang bar byed/ yongs su
207a6(mdo): stond par byed/ thob par byed cing / rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'ang de ka/ de ben song sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag 'i sems can dmyal ba slab pa'o/ 
207a7(mdo): 'di dag ni dung 'gro'i ste gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzhon rje'i 'jig rten grub pa'o// 'di dka/ da myer sgrub pa'o// 'ang dag ni lngar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ri 'al 'khor los skur ba'o// de bzhin du mngo bcu
207a8(mdo): b+han 'di dag ni rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa sprul pa'o// 'di dag de gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yi gzungs 'dang / dpal chen po sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gi pa'o// 'di dga'i skyelal to/ 
207b1(mdo): dgani bA zo'i gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan bcos sna rdzogs rnam pa thams cad bu mkhas pa'o// 'di'i nyen 'os kyi theg la ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs
207b2(mdo): rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan kadon yang dag par 'thob par byed pa// kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'gyur
207b3(mdo): ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdu ste// 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / 
207b4(mdo): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par tha da pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes riH
207b5(mdo): kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag las satshogs pa rnam pa tshad myed pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa las pas gas pa la mkhas pas// chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag
207b6(mdo): byed de// de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal phyed khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam khar dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing / yongs su bkod pa yin no// ji ltar dbyang chub sems
207b7(mdo): dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpaka pas kyi shing las shing du byung ba'i chos kyi gtas yang dag pa rnam par nges pa/ me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yi na zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
207b8(mdo): dper na chung dam pa ni dpas bsam shing gzigs tshal gyis gang gis lha dang kyi rnams shi nad tu dgal ba dang / yid bde ba skyes ngas// mya ngan byed pa marnam par che zhing dag la la ngagal zhu myod de/ rtag
208a1(mdo): rgyan gyi can pas ga dang / skabs dang / mu dang / yid bde ba las yongs su su nyis pa de lta bum gros dang / to/ dang / can dang / sa dang / rnga dang / sam stan dang / rol polan
208a2(mdo): las tsags pa phun sum tshogs pa'i cher mngon par 'bebs yongs su bskyod cing/ 'byi dad par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chung dmar yang yongs su gapa par 'jig rten gi khams
208a3(mdo): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun myi chad par chos kun dgalal mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang
208a4(mdo): dag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / gzi dang 3/ sa pa dang / yongs su skyob par myi 'gyur ba dang / lga dang dmya'o phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / 
208a5(mdo): bye nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang par gyur pas/ rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dong para'agyur pa'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du stan
208a6(mdo): pa'i sngo dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtog pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu'i byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / chos rmad du byung ba'i
208a7(mdo): chos kyi sdeng nga/ rten ma kha ma thar za sta dad pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog las mthogs pa'i mngon par 'bebs so// rjes su mthun pa dang / rjes su myi mthun pa dang / snrel gzhi dang
208a8(mdo): sri'u chags kyi rgyud las 'thogs pa'i gtam rnam par nges pa nye bar sprul lo// tha snyad kyi dmyigs pa thams cad la bdag byed pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid 'jod cing // ston la rnam par byang bar byed do// 
208b1(mdo): ches thams cad kyi sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol bar yongs su stonang to// rgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga'/ 
208b2(mdo): bar phye ba'i jom por 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// dri ba thams cad kyi su bstan pas tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skyed de ga de
208b3(mdo): ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams shi ba las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon myi za ba'i me tog yid du myi 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// ji ltar na bya
208b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' skal pa grangs myed par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su brtsams pa// ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par thar pa pa/ dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mcho dpa/ ri rab dang // 'od dang / zla ba dang / 
208b5(mdo): nyis dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dan la'i khor yug ri la btogs pas yongs su bskor ba 'i sems nam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gtul ba yongs su sbyin pa mang po yang
208b6(mdo): dag par gnas pa/ bla na byed cing sus myed pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung kyi dkyil 'khokho rab tu gtom pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lte ste dpeman rlu dmar ni skas pa'i me ra thug ste/ 'dzi
208b7(mdo): rten gi kho mas 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na// gang stong gsum gyi stongab chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / khor yug dang / rgya mtsho las brdzogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cipo/ rnam
208b8(mdo): khor 'thor ba dang / myig myed par byed cing / nam mkha'i rang bzhin can dang bya lta bu stobs kyi shugs logs pa byed par ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal rlung ma ma yang skal pa mang po thogs/ 
209a1(mdo): ba chags pa'i sems cas bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i rim zan po dang ldan pa rnams la bya chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi zhugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang // rnam par 'phrul pa chen los sa
209a2(mdo): su bstand pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa myed par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i chos sdang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par myi/ 
209a3(mdo): nus pa'o 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa// tshul bzhin du yid la byas nas yang dag par sems nang tu gnas pa'i te pe 'ja nid phun sum tshogs pa la brte nang te// srid pa dang/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye
209a4(mdo): mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te// lus myed par byas nas// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa rnam/ bar bshig ste// 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/ zas/ 
209a5(mdo): rgyas kyi khyab cing gzugs byed pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yong su bstand pa rnam par gnyin pa sa gnas gyur ba pa rnam par dag pa/ phyi ma'i maba'i sum thus par gnas la/ 
209a6(mdo): rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed la// de lta bu kun gto sa// rigs kyi bu de ltam na byang chub sems dpal ska la pa grangs myed par dka po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sags pa// ting nge 'dzid dang / 
209a7(mdo): thar ma dzad pa dang / gzungs kyis rgyalatsho dang/ ring ba dang / 'ad dang / thab dang / nyis dang / kyi sa dang / sa sa dang // 'ad ba dang / dge ba'i khong stsa/ gi rimam chogs pas yongs sunan pa mams can gyi can/ 
209a8(mdo): kyi kyil 'khor dang 'dus sa sangs su sbyin pa mab po yang dag par gnas sa/ bla na myed cing lus myed pa'i gnas 'byung bar 'jig rten le shes kyi rlung ga dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na// 
209b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chung dmar dang mtshungs pa rnams yin mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgril pa thams cad rnam par sel pas 'di skad ces gsos to// a ya la de ltam bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa dzas/ 
209b2(mdo): cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim pa 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po de dag bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtsha rad to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das lnga dang myil chos 'di dag la mos
209b3(mdo): shing nan tan bgyid na// de dag thams cad ji snyed gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde la dang bcas pa// yid bde ba dang bcas par tho ba 'ar 'gyur te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong la brdzogs pa zhig bgyi de na/ yang
209b4(mdo): gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe ra pas gzhan gi phun sum tshogs/ de thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las d+ha ma ra pra// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// sems can gang de lta bu 'chos
209b5(mdo): rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag mi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon para'aphags pa dang / kun nas rnam par bltas pa dang / myi dge ba'i tshe/ sa thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang
