209b6(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni/ mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la ste nang po'o// lha dang mi dang lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jog rten gis mya ngan du bya ba'o// 
209b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldadan/ byang chub sems dpa' das ma'a' dang satshungs pa rnams yin no// bcug pa zhen/ 'di lta byed pa byed pa rnams gan// sa chags pa rnams yin/ gab rnams yin// shes rab ma 'a 'a yas pa rnams yin/ 
209b8(mdo): ye shes la ba lams pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yam// chos thams na nam pa kha'i dbyings kyingom nyid dums pa rnams yin/ sa sor gyi rtog pa rnams yin/ mya tsha ma 'i khyod yul las
210a1(mdo): ga'adas pa rnams yicig rtog ge'i myod yum mas 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang tub sems dpe' nam ma'a' dang mtshungs 'arnams yin do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcwa
210a2(mdo): dang ldan dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu ga bzhen/ 'di lta ste yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang myi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur
210a3(mdo): yid du 'ong ba dang / ya du phyi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / re ka rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la/ chags par yang myi 'gyur khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed
210a4(mdo): ba dang ga pa rnyed pa dang / bde ga dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa da ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang smad pas chags par ya myi gyur/ khong khro b.ras pyi 'gyur ba ste// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
210a5(mdo): bo de dag dang lda pa / byang chub sems dpa' das ma'al dang mtshungs pa ma sa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhes 'di lta ste sems can thams/ 
210a6(mdo): tsad rgya mu sa rag tu mam par byed pa dang / mthong mang/ la ba rnams dpalano// chos dkaR+sha po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin// lus yongs su dag pa
210a7(mdo): rnams yin// bzhon po mchog la zhon pa rnams yun / rtag tu brgya pa rnams yon// chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dud pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
210a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sa mra prar byed 'anas/ ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar bya yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi
210b1(mdo): yum bsil pa dang / yid du 'ong bas rag tu sam par byed do// de bzhin gyi byang chub sems dpal zla bzhi yang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dka' ba dang // dang bdang // rangs
210b2(mdo): pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim mar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// dper na zla ba shar na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang pa dang / sems sha nad tu dka' bar byed pas/ 
210b3(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi lus dgal ba yin do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal zla bo zhar na yapa 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsas 'dang / sems kyi rgyud dang 'a dang / pyod pa dang / khyod lam dang / son tan
210b4(mdo): phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong la dga' zhi na ya dadu 'ong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yang s+ya ro la na pa nyi/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyur kyi mdu
210b5(mdo): nyi ma re re zhib 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi par
210b6(mdo): dri nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te// nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de na/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sa
210b7(mdo): dper dang / zla ba mar gyi bo la bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/ pamo lnga la ni ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad tu myi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o/ 
210b8(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de mi de'i myi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro ste/ ji ltar byang chub kyi sto pa la thas
211a1(mdo): gcad kyi sems cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rag tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe mad zla bka pan bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong dang / sus kyi myo skyes pa dang / bung myed dang
211a2(mdo): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsdigs par bya ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na lha dang kyi dang lha ma yid dang dri zar bcas pa'i lag rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin/ 
211a3(mdo): no// rigs kyi bu 'di ste ste dper ma/ lga'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smind pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa myed cing / dpal dang bsal ba yin no// 
211a4(mdo): bzhin du byang chub sems dpal zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa brdzus te skyes pa// pha ma lib thog pa dang mer mer lo las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog
211a5(mdo): ba myed cing dpab dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di/ lta ste dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni gzhon pa mchog la zhon te/ gleng bzhir snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thog pa
211a6(mdo): limachog la zhon te/ 'jig rten ga khams mtha' yas mu myed par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba mi rtag tu brgyan cing // rgyan ma rnyis pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
211a7(mdo): dpala' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rkyen rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyud myi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa 'i dka' ba mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang
211a8(mdo): chub sems dpal zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas/ dga' ba la rga ba mi ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper da lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mahU~M
211b1(mdo): che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste// bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhide mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thos
211b2(mdo): cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan da byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na byang chub seM
211b3(mdo): dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnaMs yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems cad rnam par 'byed 'a byed rnaMs yin// phyogs bcu thams cad du lga ner byed pa rnams yin dge ba'i chos pa'o// 
211b4(mdo): par shar pa rnams yin// de dag gi 'ag pa nub par 'gyur ba dmas yin// snang bar byed pa rnams yin// mu stegs can ngan pa'i dbugs rnams zild kyis mnan te/ 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang / 
211b5(mdo): myi mnyam pa kun bstand pa rnams yin// chos dkar po'o le sa kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dang/ ba dga' ba rnams ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sos
211b6(mdo): dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ dza ster na skye bo dge ba dgal ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma sha ra da na mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
211b7(mdo): nyi ma shar na yang ma rig pa'i mum pa sems cad rnam par selang to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ma nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma zhapar phyogs bcu thams cad
211b8(mdo): ldan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyim shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes dang 'od zer gyis ldan de byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par myi 'gyur ro// 
212a1(mdo): gis sa kyi 'di ste ste ba 'angs thun sri du phyi ma'i 'od pa dgadapa slang ba san du seMs bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od mi rnams snang ba med gepa 'jos dpa pag sa
212a2(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dzas bu'i gro bu nyi ma'i spang ba dam myed par gyur pa pa de'i tshe nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i nyor mongs pa rnams thams cad gi thams cad kun pa byed par gyu rang
212a3(mdo): pa de'i tshen/ zag pa zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'ang lta ste dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling kyi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyim shar na yang sems can thams
212a4(mdo): la ye shes kyis snang bar byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khyebs pa rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi me shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od myed par byed kyang nyi ma ni ngos 'od
212a5(mdo): thams cad kyi 'od myi sdang bar bya'o// snyam du myi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas/ 'od myed par 'gyur ro// de ba zhin du byang chub/ sems dpa' nyi me shar na yang mu stegs can ngan sI
212a6(mdo): 'od dang / mu stegs can dam pa'i lugs thams cad 'od myed pam 'gyur mod kyi// byang chub sems dpal nyi ma mi nges 'di dag 'od myed par bya'o snyam du myi sems te/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od myed par 'gyur ro// 
212a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ba shar na 'dzam bu'i glid kyi phyi rnams la mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa legs par bstan to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la
212a8(mdo): ye shes kyi snang ba mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa legs par stond to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu myi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i
212b1(mdo): ci pa dgas sa// rigs kyi 'di lta ste dpe na nyi ma gar namo bgo'i mas kyis pa 'thams cad 'byung ngo // de bzhin du bya chub sems dpa' nyi ma gas sa yang dag pa'i chos kyi sas kyis la thams cad 'byung ba
212b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// nyi ma shar na skye lo dge ba ni dka' bar gyur da la/ mye srun pa'i rang bzhin can dgan gyi dkal 'ang 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ga mal ba skye bo dge ba rnams darje
212b3(mdo): mkhas po rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dka' bar 'gyur/ lamangan par zhugs pa rnams dang / myi srun pa'i rang bzhin cad rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chalang pa'i rang 'a zhi/ 
212b4(mdo): can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni myi dgal bar 'gyur ro// rigs da kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
212b5(mdo): ba nas/ skye bo dge ba dka' ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams mi na no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' se
212b6(mdo): ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu ga zhen/ 'di lta ste bag myi tsha ba rnams yin/ myi brtags pa rnams yin/ myi zlogs pa rnams yin// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yin// nags tshal dang / 
212b7(mdo): nags tshal gyi 'ad ba rgya ba rnams yin/ ri'i bug na gnas pa rnams yin/ mend pa myed pa rnams yin// bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdudan kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba
212b8(mdo): chos kyi lo tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal bag kyi tsha ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gir 'gro yang ba/ 
213a1(mdo): dang 'dral byed par mthong bas pan gyi shing kyi sreg par khro'o// de lezhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba skyed par 'thong bas ga 'gros bapan kyi zhipa kyi sdug par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'dis/ 
213a2(mdo): ste dper na/ seng ne ni la thams cad kyi sgras myi brtabs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng shes papas kyi rgol pa thams cad kyis bzad pas 'gas kyang / myi brtags shis/ rgod pa dang zhum par gyi chung
213a3(mdo): ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lte ste/ dper na seng ge ni/ bsgugs ma phyir myi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal seng ge yang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bsgrags ma myi zlogs shing myi zhum par 'gyur ro
213a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni sgra kang gis yi dgas pra mo/ thams cad dang / bsathams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba/ de lta bu sgrog ko// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang 'angs
213a5(mdo): myed pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis padag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhe/ nad pa gzhan mu stegs can g.yo dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi po thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer par 'gyur ba de lta bu
213a6(mdo): sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpal seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzind pa las zlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma rtogs par/ de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bdag myed pa'i seng ge'i sgra myi sgrog/ 
213a7(mdo): go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// seng ge ni kun tu lta yang myi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal se ge sa pa khyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lha yang myi 'jigs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
213a8(mdo): dper na/ seng kye ni reng bzhin gyis nags tshal dang // nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing nags tshal dang nags tshal gyi 'dab
213b1(mdo): dbyed pa 'did// rigs kyi su 'di lnga ste dpem mas gen ro'i sug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se shes pa ba zhes na/ kaura'i TIn dganas pa yid do// gis kyi bu 'di lnga ste dpe sa sem
213b2(mdo): ke na myo len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpal seng ge yang nyon mongs pa 'i khrur thams cad khom zhib len pa myed par 'gro ba yi ne no// rigs kyi su 'di lta ste dper na se ge ni gcig pu gnyis su myed par
213b3(mdo): bdagag pa rtson 'grus dang stobs dang / mthu thob pas pha rol du kyi sde 'jos so// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpal seng ge yang cig/ pu gnyis su myed par byang chub kyi snying po sa 'dug nas bdag ka ba rtsor 'grus dang
213b4(mdo): stobs dang / mthu thob pas/ bdud kyi sde 'dzom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na grong kau 'ad ba na seng ge'i rgyu ba der mi dgas phra mo// dag gis lo tog dag rnams chud myi gzor to// de bzhin du byang chub
213b5(mdo): sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug ba der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i lo tog chung myigazon te// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dang/ 
213b6(mdo): bag gyi sa ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi me tog srung ba'i bar du yin no// sus byed/ da mas tan pa dang gi zhing na na yosas ma supa rnams yinado// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams
213b7(mdo): yin/ byang chub kyi sems bya dor byas pa rnams yin// dbang po rnams bsdams pa rnams yin/ lab du zhugs pa rnams yom/ khur chen po khye thong ba rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la song/ 
213b8(mdo): su myi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag par 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang khags ka gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin// g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin// drang ba'i rang bzhin can rnams
214a1(mdo): pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag de ldan pa/ byang rgya sams dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan da/ byang chub sems dpa' chang shes pa rnams yin no// 
214a2(mdo): bcu gang zhe na 'di ste ste/ spong pa nyid la skol ba lnga bas rnal 'byor dang pyod pa rnams yin// sgrib pa myed cing kun nas sdang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyud bcad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
214a3(mdo): bka' myi gcog pas/ bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin// dmal ba dang dpal ba'i yid kyis mdor/ 
214a4(mdo): bu ltar 'jig rten mgyod pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun gyi dra bar bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag pas/ dang rgyas dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 
214a5(mdo): 'di ltar de mngon sum tu shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam sa la nem nur myed pa rnams yin/ chos rang gise rig pa'i phyir/ the tsom myed pa rnams yin/ rang kyis lam mthong bas gzhan
214a6(mdo): kyis mya kro zhi ba/ pha rol kyi dro de myi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur da pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag / dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
214a7(mdo): cang shes pa rnams yin no// rig kyi@sa lta di so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 
214a8(mdo): 'di ste ste ma gos pa rnams yi// sdig bachu ru dang yang lhan cis myi gnas pa rnams yin// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin// katsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ gyi sgrub pa rnams yin/ 
214b1(mdo): mthong na kra shis pa rnams yi de/ blo rnam par dbye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smyin pa rnams yin/ shi nad tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal ma gos pa
214b2(mdo): yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shi nang tu yongs su gzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang myi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob
214b3(mdo): ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyu las 'byung yang myi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thebs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
214b4(mdo): zabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na 'gyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dka/ gis myi kos te/ de'i thebs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par ni dend pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma la
214b5(mdo): chu'i thigs pa chu ngu yang myi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal la sdig pa chung ngu yang myi chags so// rigs kyi bu'adi sta ste dper na/ sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa
214b6(mdo): phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go// de bzhin du yul dang yul ga phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpal gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni sa phyogs de kar
214b7(mdo): skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / klong pa da / yul gyi myi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal gar skyes kyang rung ba/ 'di lta ste/ chus khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun gyon
214b8(mdo): bas gtsang ba yin te/ lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha me yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am mi nga / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs
215a1(mdo): kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma mi kha bye na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid tu 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta
215a2(mdo): bur sdang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khro gnyer med cing dbang po gnid tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yid no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing kyi rtsub pa

215a8(mdo): mabyig gdabang po rnam par dag par byed de/ mnyam dan pa dibang pornam par dag par byed/ tshul khri'is dang yod tan kyi dro bsngams da lnga'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bskyed bkur byas nasus kyi sa

220a7(mdo): sa bu 'dis pa sa kyim na pa tu ca byed pasanan// de bzhi na kyang rgya thamams dpa' sa di/ cang byed pams sa
220a8(mdo): nano// gis kyi 'di ste sten pas rgyal med pa ni rigs kyis gnas// gags kyis 'bar/ gas khyim bab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'a thams ca sa med pa nyid lag no/ 
220b1(mdo): thams cad ma byedad pa nyid la 'bab// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper da rgyalam mo chen po nizhi ba'i rod nga skad cig kyi 'dug go// de ci'i 'byor zhe na// deni rgyal po chen po 'jon/ 
220b2(mdo): nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang myi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig myi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di
220b3(mdo): sta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di sta ste/ lan tsha'o ra'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de dag thams cad ro/ 
220b4(mdo): gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyend pa'i ro'o// rigadas kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad myed pa dkuran zed kyang / de la bri ba 'am gang bar yang myi mngon no// de bzhin du byang
220b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad myed pa kun zed kyang / de la yang bri ba 'am gang bar myi mngon no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las myi yol lo// de bzhin du/ 
220b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su sbyid par bya ba'i dus las kyi yos so// rigs kyi bu 'di ste ste dpa pa kyi mamachen po ni 'byung po yang yun gyiganas so// de bzhin du byang chub
220b7(mdo): dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang chos kar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang myi zad pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sos
220b8(mdo): dpal yang sems can thams cad la chos ston pa myi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyurd pa nas myi zad pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos paH
221a1(mdo): ga dang nas kyang chub sem sa tharnams / sa kyi thams cwa nga nas bya chu bas sa dang thogs rnams 'ad na/ 'din te/ 
221a2(mdo): tshal ba la mkhas pa rnams ma/ tsas thams cad brtan pa la mkhas pa rnams na// chos thams cad kyimanyam pa nyid 'angadu chung ba rnams pan/ chos thams ca sprul nyid du 'ong chud pa rnam pa yin rnas
221a3(mdo): thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin// rten cinga'i 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gti dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam kyis kyi khyim pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ sbas pa'i dzin/ 
221a4(mdo): shes pa sa ni/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yi de khod la mkhas pa mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyis dade sa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung 'chol la la mkhas/ 
221a5(mdo): pa yin pa 'as/ ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar bya yi na zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'di ltar dpyod de// kye ma'o jig rten gnas dod de lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems kun tu
221a6(mdo): 'bar ro// rab tu 'bar ro// kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ro/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni 'di lta ste zhe sdang gdu pa 'khrigs pa'i lnga ba 'chubs pas/ rnam par tshangs so// kye ma'o 'jig rten
221a7(mdo): gnas pa 'di ni 'di ste ste/ gti mug gimun pas mun nag tu gyu rad to snyam mo// de ni 'di ltar sems can 'ad dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung la yongasu tshol zhing / chos thams
221a8(mdo): ma rtog go// chos thos cad la rtog pas chos zas cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kho du chud par 'gyur ro// chos mas cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
221b1(mdo): tu shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas// rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// 
221b2(mdo): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis myi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po myed pa'i chos rnams la las sna tshogs sdang ba mi ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// 
221b3(mdo): de ltar na de blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gas don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs so// don
221b4(mdo): yang dag la ji lta bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo // de de kho na mtho// dpas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i mtshon ra nas tha rang bar byed de/ derigs kyi bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la sar+b+ba/ 
221b5(mdo): bdas/ de kho na ma mkhas pa'i khrim cu yin no// rigs kyi bu chom bcu de da// dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tho zhib pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ches bcu dang ldan na byang chub rnams dpa' rigs pa
221b6(mdo): rnyed pa dang / se pa po myed pa rnas papo rdzun pa dang / man pas bskyed pa dang / namigags pa snyed pang khrug kyang ba dang / snang ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin bkun brta nga/ rkyen las byub bar 'dzin
221b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu le la chos thams cad bdag myed pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang mthun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can myed pa// srog myed pa// zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang / 
222a1(mdo): mgyur bam// de ba zhin du thos thams cadagaso pa myed pa dang / gapa 'ag byed pa dang / byed pa'o byed pa dang / tshong ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang / 'arjod pa ba myod pa dang / gsogags pa skyed pa rgyu
222a2(mdo): myang bA dngag stong pa dang / sangs/ pa la sbyin pa kun btags pa dang / rkye na las byung ba'o zhes pal 'di rdzogs pa'o// 'din chos nyid du su / gas kyi nyid dung mdun pa da / 
222a3(mdo): ba'o// gang chos nyid dang myi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// kang chos nyid las myi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// kang chos nyid las 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// kang chos nyid stond pa de ni rigs pa'o// 
222a4(mdo): de yang de dag la spobs pas na/ de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa na ras zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu ches bcu po de dag dang ldan khyab/ tshul sems dpal rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// 
222a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' krol ba'i bas pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa myed pa rnams yin// spobs pa myi zad pa rnams yin
222a6(mdo): sa na sa sa / sa tsha sa ldan sa / shA / Sh+Ta / las bya / 
222a7(mdo): kyis san pa rnams yin/ slobs pa mtha' mas pa rnams yin posas bdag par rig sa thob pa thabs pa rnams yin to/ su chos bcu pa dang / dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa 'gros ba'i gro
222a8(mdo): rnams yinano// kyi ma ma sa 'an bya rgya sasems dpa'adi ba dag pa'i ses bcan na yin no// bcug 'a 'dis she 'a byed ji'i rlobs pa rna ma na
222b1(mdo): zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yang leb po byed pa'i spobs pa car rnams yin/ de gag spabs 'dod dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'byu dang bral ba ma yin/ spyor ba dang bral 'a ma yin/ rlum dang / 
222b2(mdo): lam yin / thub pa ma yin/ myi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no// rigs kyi lce byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa 'dang 'dar po ma yin no// de ci'i byor zhen/ 'khor gyi 'jigs
222b3(mdo): ba'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni'okhrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i' byor zhe na/ bro brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
222b4(mdo): rnams kyi spobs pa ni zhend pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'khor gyi nang du phyi na myi 'jigs myi skrag ste/ 
222b5(mdo): seng ge ltar 'jigs pa myed cing myi skrag/ myi sdang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa na yang yed po myed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral
222b6(mdo): ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yeng meng por 'gyur ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi spobs pa ni don dang myi ldan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// chos
222b7(mdo): nyid thob pa'i byor te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi mo don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin do// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi spobs pa na tshig 'bru dang bra
222b8(mdo): thamasan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan ce semams cad la 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir te// rigs kyi bu 'dun pa cas kyi phyogs lagazhes pa rnams kyi tshog 'byung nga bral bar 'gyur gyi// bstan
223a1(mdo): ga thams cad 'jigs pa byed pa / rnams kyi ni ma yin no// thabachub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni snyom pa dang bral ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par
223a2(mdo): bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mya mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang / bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mthal yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na
223a3(mdo): pa ni gang phyis smra ba ni bya de sngar smra ba 'am/ gang sngar smra bar byed pa de phyis smra ba lta bu dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin// chod shes pa yin/ dus yin shes
223a4(mdo): pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni phrub pa yid du 'ong ba myi snyan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi kanaHdngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi 'u gnas ngan le nad dang / bcas
223a5(mdo): pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngang lend dang bral/ ba rnams kyi no ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rna kyi spobs pa ni myi gsal ba ma yin te// de ci'i phyir zhe na// dbang po rno ba'i/ 
223a6(mdo): phyir ro// / rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ma myo gsal ba yon gyi/ dbang po rnor po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal rnam par dag pa'i spobs
223a7(mdo): ba can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems cad thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ 
223a8(mdo): bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer myed pa rnams yo// don tu smra ba rnams yid/ chos su smra ba rnams yin// mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin// myi ngoms pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon
223b1(mdo): mongs par 'gyur ba myed pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa myed pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni 'jam par smra bas sems can nas

223b3(mdo): pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni/ sems can thams
223b4(mdo): cad la mtshungs par chos stond pas// sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' myi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang bral zhing / spyod pa mtshungs pa/

223b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ba byed pa na 'ing tshul nges pas sems can rnams ma u bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa myed pani bzod pa ma pas// sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub

224b3(mdo): dang ldan ma byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir chos stan kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / yang dag par sprul pa yab phyi dbyigs pa/

225a1(mdo): 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs so// bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhend pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang stond kyang / bdag dpa 'dzin pa pa yang gyi dmyigs so// sas kyi rnam par skyidad pa yang 'jog yod kyi las dpa las kyi/ 
225a2(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa yang myi dbyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang mying gang gis brjod pa de mying des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// chos nyid ni ya'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge sa

225b6(mdo): dge ba'i chos zas cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus pa thams pas ra sgril pa thams cad chub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa myed cing las kyi rkyen gyi bcad pas/ 
225b7(mdo): shind tu yongs su dag cing // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan lend pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// sto
225b8(mdo): pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmyigs pa'i lte bar myi 'gyur ro// de dmyigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpal sgril pa thams cad
226a1(mdo): rnam par sel pas gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo kho na zhes 'gyi ba de mi lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHsa dpa// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ro ying dag pa'i don gyi tshig
226a2(mdo): bla dgas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'ang mo legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sacal pa// rigs kyi bu gang myi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das gang
226a3(mdo): sku ba zhes bgyi ba de mi lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHlad pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'ang mi legs/ bcom ldan 'das
226a4(mdo): kyis bkalas la pa// rigs kyi bu 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa/ yin te/ 'di ni yo ge dag kyis kyang gdags par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'dra
226a5(mdo): ba/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi khyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa// rag kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa// spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang
226a6(mdo): dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba// rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba// brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i khyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa// mtshan ma byed pa mtshan ma dang bral ba madz+dza
226a7(mdo): ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i bapyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bcud thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi khyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam pa
226a8(mdo): shes pa'i khyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa// gnas pa ma yin pa myi gnas pa// zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi gyod yul te/ deng / nyid kyis so so rang kyis rig pa/ dri ma byed pa bgongs pa dang rngam par dag la/ gya rol lnga// 
226b1(mdo): mchog dam pa// phus rtag brtan pa zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpal dag
226b2(mdo): chos 'di thos nas/ sems cam dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho mas rab tu 'god do// snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing thol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dgal ba brgya dag byed pa rigs kyi bu de de de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// ma
226b3(mdo): dag pa'i ma'al zhes bya'o// thams cad ma khyend pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// gnyis su myed pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems
226b4(mdo): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par selang pas gsol pa/ bco nga ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud bar gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsal ba/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las
226b5(mdo): 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon tu bya'o// rang gyi rig pas khong dru chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon dubagyis
226b6(mdo): pa de rang kyi rig pas khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHla pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon
226b7(mdo): du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsosang pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas// chos khong du chud par gyur/ 
226b8(mdo): ba de rang gis rig pa ma lags sas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ca la pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am// bsams pa tsam gyis mi kyis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ 
227a1(mdo): dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'brog dkon par sos kha'i zla ba ma kyil zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas myi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ongs ste/ de yA
227a2(mdo): sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur da nas/ skom gis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i myi de la 'di skad ces smra ste/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te skom gyis nyen na/ gang
227a3(mdo): na 'tsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang pa rnyog pa myed pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang pA bdag tsha ba dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la stond cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'od
227a4(mdo): ba'i myi de yang lam zhes pa/ lam mkhas pa// lam mthong ba// lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nges pa dang bral ba'i lha ldan na/ du mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des byid
227a5(mdo): la 'di skad bu kye grogs po 'am/ 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi khar du song la// kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam por te g.yas ky-il mu nas nags tshal sngon po dang // nags tshal de'i dbus na mtshol
227a6(mdo): lteng ka 'am/ rdzing bu bsil zhing dpal rnyog pa myed pa gsal pas gang po mthong ba'i bar bya song la/ der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba myed par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de lnga snyam du sems// sos la
227a7(mdo): 'chi bas yongs su gdungs te/ skem gyis nyen pa'i gyi des rgyu zas ma lag dang / bsams pa tsas kyis tsha ba myed par 'gyur ram// skom pa dang sang bral bar 'gyur ram/ mu lasil bar yang rang kyis rig tu
227a8(mdo): 'gyur ram// gas lad pa bcom ldan 'das sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das myi de la deb byin nas des chu der zhugs te/ 'tshalang bar gyur pa de'i tshe gyi de'i tshe ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro// slob pa dang bral bar
227b1(mdo): du sa gis gyur ro// ldan 'das kyis bkA drung/ de zhizugs kyi su mas la.a dang / bamams bas bya byas kyi pa ma lang na
227b2(mdo): nus so// des rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba 'di ni 'khru ba'i 'jig ga nog za dgas so// seMs ka/ 'i rdzobs yongs su gdungs gis sgos kyis nye pa zhes bya ba 'din nyon mangs pa'i gadrung bas yong su sa sa
227b3(mdo): ba papa nyid pa'isems can nams kyo gatha / 'i cigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub semasadapa' bsas kyangs byed pa nyis pa/ chab gying bcas shi
227b4(mdo): pa rnams kyis tshig tha gas so// chubs la zhing dang la rtog pa skyed pa/ dgasas pa zhes bya ba 'din da pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas sa// ya dgas kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam
227b5(mdo): du sems// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshad skal par bzhu gas te/ 'dzam bu'i grong kai mye rnams kyi ma dud du 'di lta ste/ lha'i 'dud mi zhom pa dang / gtsang pa dang / gya nom pa dang / rab tu
227b6(mdo): zham pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te/ bsngags pa brjod na// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems// ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud de'i bsngags parabagyis rig par 'gyur ram// gsol pa bcom
227b7(mdo): ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHla pa// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gyis rig pa'i chos khong
227b8(mdo): du chud par myi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dpe nyog cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig kyis shing thog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur pa la// des kyi
228a1(mdo): gzhan nig/ gis nga tu shing thog kwinam pa de'i bsngags pa 'dis ste/ kha tog phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mo thun sum rdzogs pa dang / drwa zhes palas pa rnams te/ brjod ma rigs kyi bu rnam
228a2(mdo): snyam tu sems/ tsa myo nges shi'i thog kyi derab kyis rige par 'gyur ram// gsal pa bcom ldan 'das pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' la ya pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de
228a3(mdo): kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rab kyis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par nus par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
228a4(mdo): bar bsad pas gas med pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs pam gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin de tu legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi chos su zhig ni na par rlom
228a5(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ches khong du chud ba/ nyid du rig par bkyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom lnga/ na 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di zos par bgyi ba la
228a6(mdo): 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa rtsal pa la/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thos par bya ba la/ 'di nyid ma log pa
228a7(mdo): 'argyam 'gyum// seMs kyi bu chos bcu po de / dang ldanas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyis la sams pa rnams panano// rigs kyi bu chos pan dang ldanan// byang chub sems dpa'i sa
228a8(mdo): nyid kyi rgyang yul pa rnams yinano// bcug zhen/ 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab rgyags kyi 'jigs pa'i slob pa nyid kyang ram tugs// sangs rgyas kyi ma pa rnam pa'i mapal nyid kyi
228b1(mdo): tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting pe 'ji dad kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po/ 
228b2(mdo): 'astong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes// stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ 
228b3(mdo): rgyu de dang / rkyend de dang / zhi de las stong pa nyid dmyigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzi nad pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang myi dmyigs// rgyu de dang / rkyend de dang / 
228b4(mdo): gzhi des myed par yang myi ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi// spyod yul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
228b5(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma byed pa la gnas pa rnam sa yin no// bcug pa zhe na 'di lta ste phyi ros dkyi mtshan ma dpe bral ba rnams yin// nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams/ yan/ 
228b6(mdo): smos pa thams cad dang bral rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin// dmyigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin// g.yo thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ sgyu thams cad
228b7(mdo): dang bral ba rnams yin// dmyigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa rnams yin// rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po myi dmyigs pa rnams yin no// riH
228b8(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sesad pas
229a1(mdo): 'di skad ces gsosod to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis can pa mtshas pa la gnas pa yang de 'dran de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ji 'dra bar bsdu bar bgyi/ bcag
229a2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ma med pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
229a3(mdo): rjes su bsams na/ sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol da tam// tshu rol mthong bar myi 'gyur myi dmyigs te/ tha mar dub pa'i skal pa can tu
229a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pu na ze ba ning gti dpaka dka' la bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ dpag tu myed pa// rgya che ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / rtog ge ba
229a5(mdo): thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa// dmyigs pa can thams ca/ dkyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa'am bsam pa/ 'am gzhal ba 'am/ tshad byed par myi nus so// byang chub sems
229a6(mdo): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa// gal te zhus nas yub lung bstanang pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ 
229a7(mdo): bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig 'u'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' babyas dpa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs byes khyod dris shig/ byang chu
229a8(mdo): sems dpal sgrib pa thams cad rnam par semed pas gsosod pa/ bdag la stong pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la/ 
229b1(mdo): spod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la ba// rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// khyod kyis dri la rgyal bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyim legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung ni// 
229b2(mdo): dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa sems nang nam par seyang la bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
229b3(mdo): ma to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid rdol bar bya ba na phyir bdag bstod pa ma rtogs/ brgyal gyi 'i me dkyis nan pa dang / rnyed pa
229b4(mdo): zas kyis non pa dang / bkur sti'i zold kyis nom pa dang / zhugs pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khyi 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chom dpa'am/ kha gas ga byed cing / yang dag pa ma yin par bdag stong pa
229b5(mdo): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshe/ gas pa la dga'al ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bstand pa'i skal pa yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos
229b6(mdo): rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te// de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phar pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol dpa// bcom ldan 'das kyi lags
229b7(mdo): sems can 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthul 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsal dpa// rigs kyi bu gyi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhi 'di'i mas
229b8(mdo): na rgya chung ngul mos pa/ dman tshigs la mos la/ shes rab chung ba dang / dang 'chung ba dge ba'i rtse ba chung ngus brtar ba dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba gyi shes pas// de dag sa de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
230a1(mdo): bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de yang nan tad gis sgrub bo// rigs kyi 'di lta ste dper ma/ sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kya nab kyis nyer
230a2(mdo): bar gyur da cing / sa'i phyogs de na yang sman pa de gcig pur zad de/ gnyis su myed la// de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang myi shes pa dang // de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal la
230a3(mdo): nad kyis nyen pa sman pa myi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas// sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste// nad la mkhas pa'o// 
230a4(mdo): nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o// zhes bdag gi yon+ta/ tun gi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis bstand pa dang / sems can de da/ da'ang ni spen pa'o// zhes bya bar shes shing / yod ches par gyur da nas/ sman
230a5(mdo): bde la rten to// de nas smand pa de sems can de dag la gsol zhing/ nad de zhi bar byed na// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems// sman pa de bdag la bstod par 'gyur ram// gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das lags
230a6(mdo): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lang ba// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang / smand pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na myed pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa// nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon
230a7(mdo): mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas pa// chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin kyang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis na bar gyur pa sems can rnams kyis myi shes te/ nyon mongs pa 'i nad kyis nad par gyur ba'i sems can rnam
230a8(mdo): gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun pa dag gi yon tan dang / bsngags pa bdag nyid brjod do// de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis dad par gyur nga ba'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gis bsngags pa'i che ba'o// 
230b1(mdo): ras / yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la brtend to// de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas sman gyi rgyal po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de// chos kyi sman chen
230b2(mdo): po de dag kyang keng zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ myi sdug pa dang / byams dang rten da cing 'brel pa 'byung ba las 'asogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di ga zishes nas bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// 
230b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam rten dang
230b4(mdo): shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang / sa ma dang / mya dam rdzas 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la myi gnas parda/ su yin te/ rigs kyi bu de mi la phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' min
230b5(mdo): pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ myi gnas par 'jig rten thams na/ da du rnam par pyod do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba
230b6(mdo): nan/ sa kya ma da na/ byang chub saras dpa'i byams pa'i yid nyid can rnams yinado// bcag pa der/ 'dus pa ba byed pa'i byams pa ldan pa rnams yi/ pa dang bzung
230b7(mdo): byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyams pa dang ldas pa rnams yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin// gnod pa thod pa'i thams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i thams sa
230b8(mdo): dang ldan pa rnams yin// sems can thams cad sa snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin// gnod sems byed pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyoms bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa / 
231a1(mdo): san/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs/ 
231a2(mdo): kyo hU~M chos bcu dang sdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can nams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta sde seM na sdug bsdus pa dang / skyabs byed pa dang / 'gos byed pa dang / rten byed pa dang / 
231a3(mdo): dpung gnyen myed pa dag / mthong na// byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir// 'bad rtsol 'artson 'grus rtsom ste/ dkal ba khyad pa brgyad dag kyang byed de/ 
231a4(mdo): de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sem sna can rnams sbyin pa la 'jog par byetshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod sos
231a5(mdo): can rnams pa zod pa la// le lo can rnams partson 'grus la sems g.yeng ba rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal da pa rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed
231a6(mdo): sems can gi sdug bsngal myi bzad pa khya pa 'tsha ba dag gis nyen cing / bya bcu pa las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid
231a7(mdo): can rnams so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dka' ba la gnas pa yin/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i bcom rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab
231a8(mdo): tu dka' ba skyed do// bdag gi 'khor ba'i mya zag sun ring po nas thogs pa chad do// zhes dgal bskyed do// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i
231b1(mdo): rgyal po las gas to// zhes rab tu dgal ba snyed do// bad// ni sun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i 'argyas kyi rgyal mtsham pasnyal lo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i rnams lazhes
231b2(mdo): kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdus kyang myi snang ba de ltar bcom mo// zhes rab tu dga' bar skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs phyind pa yin gyis// da ni dbugs 'byung bar bya'o// zhes rab tu dag la
231b3(mdo): skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa yun po nas gnyid log pa sred pa'i snyoms pas yongasu zin pa// myig gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas// sad pa yin gyis// da ni gzhan yang
231b4(mdo): rnam par sad par bya'o// zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang / ngan song dang / log par ltung ba/ thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis da ni gzhan
231b5(mdo): yang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o// zhes rab tu dga' bo skyed du bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas yun ring po nas la byas
231b6(mdo): te grogs myed cing gnyis su myed par gar yang 'khyam zhing lam la myi mkhas la/ lam myi shes shing / yul myo zhes pas// lam stond pa rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni thos
231b7(mdo): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to// zhes rab tu dag bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// 
231b8(mdo): rigs kyi lce las bcwa dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyims la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ phyog gi rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la ba
232a1(mdo): su gnas pa yin te/ phyog/ gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i/ gzugs rnams kyis smras par myi 'gyur// gnod par gyi 'gyur/ mabyung bar myi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin drarna pas rnam par shes
232a2(mdo): bar bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sngas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rngam par shes zer
232a3(mdo): bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa yin te// yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smras par myi 'gyur/ gnod par myi 'gyur/ rma byung bar myi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug
232a4(mdo): bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'o// sdug bsngal gis smras par myi 'gyur/ gnod par myi 'gyur/ rma byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la
232a5(mdo): btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te// de dag la dka' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed cing / de dag la 'dim du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid nas
232a6(mdo): par gyur da to// zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi chos brgya dang
232a7(mdo): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'chi 'pho'ang ston/ skye ba 'ang ston / btsas pa dang / byis pa'i gyod pa dang / sras kyi
232a8(mdo): nang na rtse pa'ang ston pa/ mngon par 'byung ba yang stonapa/ dka' ba pyad pa yang stond// byang rgyal kyi snying por 'gro ba yang ston pa/ bdud 'dul pa yang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ston/ 
232b1(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo skor la yang ston da/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang stodang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas 'di skad ces gsog
232b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rgyug pa dang rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho stond pa nas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bA tu stonang pa lags/ bcom ldan
232b3(mdo): 'das kyis bka'asaHyad pa// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan ga pho brang dam pa nas// sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang khyad zhugs
232b4(mdo): pa/ 'jig rtend thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun kyi phul du byung ba// myi nyams pa 'dod pa'i na tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags bka shi 'pho bar mthong na// 
232b5(mdo): rta ka la'o 'du shes ldog cing myi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ myi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas pag yod pa la gnas ra 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dka'i ldan gi pho brang dam 'as/ sems
232b6(mdo): can gang dag pag myed par 'khyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' lo/ dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod/ kyang yul la mngon par zhe dang pas// byang chub sems dpa'i drung du myi 'dod myi stend/ bsnyen bkur gyi
232b7(mdo): cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpal yang zhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de/ dus kyangapa ring du yod kyis/ lab kyis 'dor bar bya'o// snyam du sems pa de dag gi/ bag myed pa zlog pa'i phyir// byang chub sos
232b8(mdo): dpa' shi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpal ni 'pho ba mthong nas/ skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag skyo bar gyur nas// bag myed pa myi byed de/ bag yod pas ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par
233a1(mdo): 'gyur rog/ rigs kyi bu sems can ga dag skye bas 'dul 'khod pa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i sangs ra 'dug pa mthong na// ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te// de dag ci nas kyang blan myed sa
233a2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos stodod to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa da / byis pa'i
233a3(mdo): myo/ de pa dang / sras kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su sbyind par byed pa yod de/ de dag yongs su smyind bA bya ba dang / dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpal btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod
233a4(mdo): ba dang / sras kyi nang na 'dug pa stond to// rigs kyi bu sems can// padag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung bas yongs su sbyin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i
233a5(mdo): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba stond cing / rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can ga padag lga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / sgra ma yin la gtsogs pa'i 'gyod pa dman pa
233a6(mdo): la mos pa// byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan dag gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba gyod bstod to// rigs kyi chu sems cad gang dag / 
233a7(mdo): yun ring po nas bdag cag gis/ byang chub sems dpal byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i ma/ mchod pa'i las la 'thon par bya'o// zhes ston lam gtab yod pa de dgas byang chub sems dpal byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba/ 
233a8(mdo): stond la/ de dag gang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod byed de/ sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpal la mchod pa byas pas/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
233b1(mdo): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag pa rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir ro// byang chul sems dpal byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / bdud 'dul
233b2(mdo): pa bste dang tog sems cadan gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las kong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston te// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal mngon
233b3(mdo): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe// stong gsum gi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / caco sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad myed cing / stong gsum gi stong chen pola'ajig rten gi
233b4(mdo): khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong na/ bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
233b5(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sems cad gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par khas 'chel/ de dag 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos
233b6(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang / sems can dge ba'i me kha yongs su sun cing snod du gyur pa rnams la// lam bstand pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
233b7(mdo): dpal byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi ka'i grong rdal du song ba nas lar gsum du bzlas te// rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// rigs kyi bu sos
233b8(mdo): can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dul ba yod pa de dag gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ste// rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sos
234a1(mdo): dpal dgal ldan ga pho bra dam pa nas/ shi 'pho ston cing / yongs su mya ngan 'das pa chen po'i bar du stond to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal mngon
234a2(mdo): bair shes pas rnam par rold pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myi khob pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ myi dge ba'i
234a3(mdo): chos las phyir log pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las myi 'da' ba rnams yin// ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin// sngon gi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnabs la ni/ 
234a4(mdo): bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin/ shes rab pu na sum tshogs pa rnams yin// zabs mkhas pa rnams// yin// smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyob
234a5(mdo): mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus pa rtsams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni myi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis// sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye
234a6(mdo): zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang / tshor ba myi bzad pa khyab pa/ tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am// yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am// sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag
234a7(mdo): la gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur de lta bur myo 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar
234a8(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba la/ de dag tu skyes nas kyab 'dud 'grol
234b1(mdo): sdug bsngal myi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba myed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkye nad de dang / gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing / skyes nas
234b2(mdo): kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal myi bzad pa grub pa myong bar gyur da byang chub sems dpal na keng du skyes pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa thob pa'i rkyend dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log/ 
234b3(mdo): bar lta ba'i rigs su mi ste'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang rgyal sems dpa' dzas de sden gyi myod pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal bral bya ba byas pa yin pas/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skyes pa
234b4(mdo): yin te// de // tu skyes kyang // na phun sum tshogs pa 'a gyur zhing // kye nang de dag dpas kyang 'phel pa dang rgyas pa da / yangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang pom
234b5(mdo): rang ba'i rnabag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi// bya sems dpal ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams
234b6(mdo): kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchid rten dam chos sam// dge 'dun la bya ba kang byas shing bsten du pa dang / bstodad pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / sad tu byas pas dbang po phun sumatsha
234b7(mdo): par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de / dang / de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod rgya 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams mim pa la khob kyi sa
234b8(mdo): rnasems cad phung po mings pa yun ltam sreg pa'i ring tus can ma med pa skyed pa legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par 'azhid pa'i ridashes par bya ba'i ma ba byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams kyi sbed
235a1(mdo): mgyu pa/ mar gyi 'dzin sa par gyi 'dzin la/ dge slong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer gyi 'dzinas pa / gnab tu kyi skye'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi sum/ 
235a2(mdo): ka na sems can dbang po rno ba// dbang po gsal pa/ mkhas pa mkhas par bkur ba/ skal ba yod pa// legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i ma
235a3(mdo): yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur dpa// mar 'dzind pa/ phar 'dzi nad pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzi dad pa// bram zer 'dzi nad pa rnams kyi rang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi
235a4(mdo): shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i/ phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gapar gnas pa sa sangs rgyas skyes pa yul 'bras bu byed par 'gyur ba dang / 
235a5(mdo): sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe rings po'i na du bya skya'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid drug ngan sems can 'dul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes/ 
235a6(mdo): pamanyes par byam yod par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni sebs mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rig padas ngas rgyas kyi bzhugs pa dang / chos so thos pa dang / dge/ 'dun pa snod
235a7(mdo): byed pa'i ma na / ya 'dam pa nganas can mas 'as su na ra tu / 
235b1(mdo): ni gnas pa 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/ skyo bar gyur nas/ myi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus pa thams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
235b2(mdo): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myi khom la brgyad rnam par spangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal byang chub kyi sems ma stor pa rnams yin no// 
235b3(mdo): bcu gang zhen 'di lte ste g.yo dang sgyu myed de/ drang zhing s+ya b+h+ya myed pa dpa pa rnams yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / neb nur dang / the tsom myed pa rnams
235b4(mdo): yin// chos la slob dpon gyi da po la 'khyud pa dang / bral/ pa rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba
235b5(mdo): ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de lta bur byed de/ myirmA ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po rnams su 'dzind pa rnams yi na// de yongs su 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams la chos mtshungs
235b6(mdo): ba'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dpa bcas pa rnams yin// theg pa chen po la gzhol// theg pa chen po la 'bab/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yan/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la chos ston/ 
235b7(mdo): bar 'phyoshes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes kanyen du 'du shes bskyed pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan ma/ byang chub sems dpal byang chub kyi sems ma sbyor ba rnams yin no// 
235b8(mdo): rigs bu chos bcud ba ldan sa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs drad pa rnams yi do/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la pom bsnyen pakur byas pa rnams yin// dam pa'i chos yongs su
236a1(mdo): 'dzind pa rnams yin// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa myed pa rnams yim/ sgrib la myed pa rnams yin// dgal ba mang ba rnams yin// sprom pa mapa pa rnams yin// 
236a2(mdo): sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yo me/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang pos bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpo' mi ngas/ 
236a3(mdo): pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing // bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i yongs su 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing / bkur sti yod pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyend de dang / gzhi des lus dang / 
236a4(mdo): srog la myi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzi nad to// 'chang jo klog go/ kun chub par byed do// gzhan la rgya cher stond to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin dpa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ 
236a5(mdo): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyi sa tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa myed pa yin te/ de yang rim gro myod pa yi
236a6(mdo): te/ de yang rim gro myed pa yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'gyod pa myed pas sgrib pa myed pa yin// sgrib pa myed pas dga' ba mnga' yin// dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom
236a7(mdo): sa sems la nyam la gdag las 'gyur lo// sgom kha mang pas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs
236a8(mdo): su dag pas rgyas te skye bar 'gyum/ thus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin 'o// rnam par shes pa ma tshangs pa'i khyim tshor bas dran pa yin te/ de tshe rabs tshig kya rjes su dram do// gnyi
236b1(mdo): gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi brgya dpa/ lnga brgya nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byad
236b2(mdo): chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
236b3(mdo): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / drad pa dang / ma bral ba rnams yin// chos mnyam pa dang ma bral pa rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod rtsi bsnyen bkuram byed cing mgras pa rnams yin
236b4(mdo): sangs rgyas dang kya chub sems da 'dzum pa ba dang / bya pa dang ldang la dang ma sa ldan pa dngadung ba'i las dang sa thal ba rnams yin/ mang
236b5(mdo): gang bag smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba yin/ pha rol tu phyin da mnyan la dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyis mnyam pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ nam par ma da pa'i sgo
236b6(mdo): gsum mnyan pa dang bral ba rnams yin// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldanan kyang
236b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zher 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po sangasu spangs par ri// 
236b8(mdo): par bya'o// b+ha ba nyams pa'i gang bag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'cho nyams pa'i gapa bzhi rnam par spangs pa dang / 'argya 'jis dgal ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / lol can mi ga
236b9(mdo): cho ga nyis pa'i gang zas rnaM paraspangs la dang
237a1(mdo): sa/ smras pas/ mas rgyab kyis gas paTIg pa gnas lam / khyim 'das zhen pa nas pa sa
237a2(mdo): ba dang / nyon mongs pamams na rnam pa spangs 'asas/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnam pa spangs par ri kharam bya ste/ rigs kyi bya byang chub sems dpa' des/ gnas 'di da// nas par
237a3(mdo): ka bka/ de dgas zhesdang pa'i sems rnyed pa gyi bya/ khyo khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sengs bskyed par sti bya'i// des de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis / sems can rnams ni khams pa sa
237a4(mdo): bsten nyi/ bsten par gyur nas chung za bar 'gyur ro// shes lagal ma lad kyis// de bas na bdag gis bsten pa/ yongs su spang bar bya'o// snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya
237a5(mdo): rigs kyi thos bcu po da dang ldanan/ byang chub ma dpa' sdig pa'i granam pa mdzes su spangs pa rnams zhin// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' di bzhin
237a6(mdo): gshegs pa'i skye'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin// lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus ma myed pa rnams yin/ lus legs par grub pa rnam
237a7(mdo): yin// chos kyi lus rnams yini/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing / gtang dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhig pa rnams yin// lus nam mkha' dang
237a8(mdo): mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 
237b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par semed pas gsol da pa// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang go tshe/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob
237b2(mdo): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya la pa// rigs kyi bus dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi phyi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 
237b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ lus yongasu dag pa 'thob lo// sa gsum
237b4(mdo): bas byang chub sems dpa' 'khro ba dang gnad sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus ma byed pa 'thob bo// sa bzhi/ pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chom yong su chub
237b5(mdo): 'phyir lus legs par grub pa 'thob bo// sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus thob bo// sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing rting dpag
237b6(mdo): dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu grub pa dang // thabs mkhas pa yang dag par
237b7(mdo): grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis kyi khyab pa 'thob bo// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'tho ba'o// sa dku pa la byed pas khyab pa myed pa
237b8(mdo): phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob po// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhes/ shes bya thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chu
238a1(mdo): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsomang pa// bcom ldan 'das ji lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spya'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid/ 
238a2(mdo): lA wa dang yubakyi ba ma mchis sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa// rigs kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dang du bya ba byed de// yon tan dang mthus tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dan/ 
238a3(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gso med pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la// yon tan dang mthus tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom
238a4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla dab// rigs kyi bu lus lus/ zhes bya ba 'di ni the dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan dang / 
238a5(mdo): mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a/ das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du bsta/ 
238a6(mdo): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHsa pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na/ don 'di nyid khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gyi dor ma byas pa'i nor du
238a7(mdo): rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po chen 'di lta ste// nor bu rin po che ma zhu rin po che zhes bya bar rdo bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji snyam gyi ma byas pa'i no bu rin po che'i mthu dang yi
238a8(mdo): du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni gyi rdo la byas pa la byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sus nor bu ri po che la bde bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ror bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gzhags pa'i
238b1(mdo): li chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rim po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku no bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes myi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
238b2(mdo): sku nor bu rin po cheni sems can gyi khams tshad myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams tshad myed pa 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shinang tu yongasu dag pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral 'i
238b3(mdo): phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus no bu rin po chen de tsam su khyas par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri ma'isam las pa'i byor ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chos gnyis
238b4(mdo): kyi zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su bya ba nas/ zla ba nya ba'i ba gyi/ zla ba yang khra ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ chos gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya pa la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
238b5(mdo): zhe na/ de lta 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te// rigs kyi bu de pa zhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra bcas te// lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni
238b6(mdo): de bzhis gshegs pa'i sku'i rlung na lam mer myi 'gyur/ ldan ner myi 'gyur/ lhang der myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i drung na// tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
238b7(mdo): pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar
238b8(mdo): sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 
239a1(mdo): lta ba phyin ci log dag gis kyi tshugs pa rnams yin// 'jig rten ga chos brgyad po dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan so pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams sa no// sems can kyi/ 
239a2(mdo): sdug bsngal dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin// skye ba dang / rga ba dngan pa dpa' chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin// mu stegs can dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 
239a3(mdo): baidud bams cad dang 'dud kyi ngogs su rtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis myi chugs pa rnams yin/ nyam dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyi chugs pa rnams yini/ 'dod pa sa spyod pa thams cad kyis kyi rmugs pa
239a4(mdo): rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu chos brgya po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal lus rdo rje lta khur sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu/ chos brgya dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal ded dpon chen po rnas
239a5(mdo): yin ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bkur ba rnams yin// mchod par/ 'os pa rnams yin// phyi nad par bya ba rnams yin/ brten par bya ba rnaMs yin// nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ brgyags
239a6(mdo): shi nan tu phun sum tshogs par bya la rnams yin// tshogs shi nad tu bophyags pa rnams yin/ myi ngoms pa rnams sa ni/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin/ 
239a7(mdo): par bya bas mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal bkur ba yin pas na/ ji ltar na thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen po pa phyind par bya ba la mkhas pa'o bar
239a8(mdo): du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon ni rgyal po dang blon po dag gis bkur ba dag go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang / sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams// 
239b1(mdo): kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / klong dang / yul gyi myi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
239b2(mdo): ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang // gzhan yang lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham yon dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// 
239b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dkon para'agro po mang po gcan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su myi skyo bar phyind par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems da
239b4(mdo): ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na sems can 'gron pa mang po nyon mongs pa'i gcan pas gtses dpa legs par bde zhing yongasu myi skyo bar phyind par byed pa yin
239b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po la brten na sdug bsngal pa dang / 'phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ra 'gyur ro// / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen
239b6(mdo): bol brten na// gzhan mu stegs can 'apyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po mi rgyal po// 
239b7(mdo): dang / las byed pa dang / zho gas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chul sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dkal ba'i sems
239b8(mdo): can nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ma ded dpon chen po da/ ni phyogs su 'gro bar chas te// 'gron po mang po dang sman cig tu grong khyer chen por bya ba'i phyir/ 'phrog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ gros
240a1(mdo): khyer chen por byin gyi bar du chags yun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par zhi zhing / yongs su skyo ba myed par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal ded dpon chen po
240a2(mdo): yang nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bapa 'dod cing / sems can 'dros pa mapa po ded de// 'khom pa'i 'brog dkon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer
240a3(mdo): chen po pa byind par bya ba pa 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs gnad tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ma da dpon chen po mo 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste gsor
240a4(mdo): dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bai dUr+ya dang / du pa dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sa tshogs pa yang lo batshogs shing phyogs su 'gro'o// de zhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po sang nas thams cad
240a5(mdo): mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shis su pa cags zhib 'gro'o// rig/ sa kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po nor pa thags
240a6(mdo): pas// chog myi shes pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog myi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste/ 
240a7(mdo): nom phun sum tshogs pa dang / tso bo dang / dbang po sod pa dang / ngag mnyam pas/ 'gron pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di sa ste
240a8(mdo): yon tan phun sum rdzogs pa yod/ yongs kyi cho bo dang / chos la dpal pa dang / ma log par smra bas// sems can 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi log mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon/ 
240b1(mdo): na pa dag rgya na par na #[।] / da nga du mas ca sa can na@#
240b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu skar da byang chub sems dpal 'asum tha yi panas/ mas ca ma khye pa nyid kyi gre ny-i chen par sbyin par bya bas mkhas pa'i ba rjod// rigs kyi rnams brgya po dedag dang ldams
240b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanas/ byang chub sems dpa' las mkhas pa rnaMs yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'ad ste ste lam mnyas pa'ang rab tu zhes
240b4(mdo): mas nyam ngags par N+DI zhes/ ma ya sas rab tu shes/ sa pa'i sams nga ya tushes/ las tu me la dang / chu byed pa rab tug kyid dngas da/ ya ba
