240b5(mdo): kyis rgyags da kyang tu shes/ sapa 'argyan pa rab tu shes/ las ba/ ga tugs/ sa ba tunas sa/ rigs kyi na 'a / 
240b6(mdo): sabyang chub sems dpal sams mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcur ba ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpal lams leg sa mon pa rnam pa yin no// bcu gang zhes 'di lta ste theg pa chen pos
240b7(mdo): 'dul ba'i sems cam rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lam stond kyi nyan thos kyi lam gyi ste nad to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnaMs la nyan thos kyi lam stond kyi byang chub mos dpa'i lam kyi
240b8(mdo): stonan to// khams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can la thams cad mkhyes pa nyid kyi las ston kyi/ ram sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul pa'i sems can/ 
241a1(mdo): la mngon par zhend pa rnams la padag byed pa'i las dang / stong pa nyid kyi las stond kyi/ bdag dang/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang // gang zag kyi lam gyi se nang do// 
241a2(mdo): mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston kyi/ mthal gnyis la gnas 'am stond to// sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhig nas dang lpag
241a3(mdo): mtho kyil ba ston kyi g.yeb ba'i lam gyi stodang to// sa pa la mngon par dkal ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyi dkyi lam stond kyi/ byis pa spros pa la mngon lnga dka' ba'i
241a4(mdo): myi ston to// 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sos can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam stond kyi/ 'khor ba'i lam myi stond to// lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
241a5(mdo): la lam srol mdod pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma myed pa'i lam stond kyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tshed mas gang ba'i lam myi stond to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang
241a6(mdo): lam ma log par stonod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na
241a7(mdo): 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// tshor pa rnams dang sems dang / chos rnams dang / yul rnams dang / dkon pa rnams dang / grong dang / krong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
241b1(mdo): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa
241b2(mdo): rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongasu nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa zhinang tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
241b3(mdo): dpal lus la dran pa nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdog pa myi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtag+sas/ 
241b4(mdo): shing yongs su spong ngo // de'i 'og gi rkeng pa'i 'thil nas 'amams te// yang na klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog ko// lus la bdag myed par yang rtog go// lus kyi brtan
241b5(mdo): ba dang / 'jig pa dang // chu rgyas kyis bklags pa dang dri myi zhim pa dang / dring ba dang / kha tog kyi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang lus la
241b6(mdo): 'dod chags dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzind pa dang / lus la zhend pa de dag myi 'byung ste/ rgyu de dang / rkyen da de dang / gzhi des lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar myi 'gyur gyi// gzhan dun
241b7(mdo): lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa sha nad tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems/ dpa' chom pa rnams la dran pa shind tu nyo bar gzhag
241b8(mdo): cing gnas she na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam bya sems te/ tshor ba kang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin mi log tu gyur da pa rnams ni// bde bas 'a ning te/ byis pa chongs
242a1(mdo): pa rnams sdug bsngams// 'de ba zhes bya 'am 'dzin kyi/ 'phags pa rnams kyis rnamams ca sdug bsus pa zugs su chud nas// de spang ba'i phyir/ nanas tan mdzangs/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rnam pa
242a2(mdo): de nyid la 'god kyis/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bsal pas bya'o// snyam ste de sa btog pas tshor pa rnams la dran pa shis tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang byed/ khong khro ba'ang myed cing de dag spang ma
242a3(mdo): phyi rab tu zhugs pa yin no// gzhan dag kyang bslapa pa de nyid la 'gad de// de ltar datshor ba rnams la dran pa zhini tu nye bar gzhanag cing gnas so// ji lulam byang chub sems dpa' sems la drad bzhin du nye bar gzhag pa
242a4(mdo): gnas shes/ de 'di snyam chu sems te/ sems 'di ro myo rtag pa rtag par mngon par dgal ba'o// sdug/ bsngal ba la bde bar mngon par chags pa'o// bdag myed pa sa bdag tu mngos pa dka
242a5(mdo): ched pa la ma bar mngon par dka' ba'o// gas zhing myi rtan lamyur tu 'gyur pa'o// nyin mongs pa rnams kyi mnga'o// ngan so nga rnams kyi sgo'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams gzhi'o// bde 'gronas
242a6(mdo): chung gsos pa'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi sbyinapa tu gyur pa'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag por myu nga pa 'o// chos thams cad ni sems log par 'gro ste/ sems su zhes na/ chos
242a7(mdo): thams cad kyang yangs su shes par 'gyur rje/ gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa skye/ sems ni sems kyis kyi mthong po// dge bstan gyi dge ba'i/ las ni sems kyis ba migs pa mo// sa
242a8(mdo): ni migs me bskor ltar 'khor/ sems mi rta ltar rnam par la byam// sems ni nags kyi me ltar tshig/ sems mi rgya chen bzhin du skyed/ de de ltar rtog pas// sems la dran bzhind tu nye bar gzhag pa
242b1(mdo): gnas te/ sems kyi dbang du myi 'gro'i/ sems nyid de'i dbab du 'gro ste/ sems de'i dbang du gyur pa pas// chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu
242b2(mdo): nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa gnad tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug/ 
242b3(mdo): las brtogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan sa 'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos rnams so// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la stem/ zhe sdang dang / kati mug
242b4(mdo): gyi gnyen po la ste nad cing / de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ma// na no// chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas chos de// dag la sems gtong zhing / dran pa nye bar 'jog ste/ chos de dag
242b5(mdo): kyang yang dag par blangs shing gnas so// gzhan yang bskal pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar ma/ byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam sa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag ci gnas so// ji ltar ra byad/ 
242b6(mdo): chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dras pa nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs sam/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la chags par 'dzin
242b7(mdo): par yang myi 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang myi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po myed pa'i chos rnams la chags paskyed pa ni bdag gi myi che ste/ de ni bdag gi byis pa dang / rmongs pa
242b8(mdo): pa dang / myi gsal ba dang / mya mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur de nas// zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs nas dge ba 'i/ myi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom par myi 'gyur te/ 
243a1(mdo): de'i klus ngam song du 'gro bar gsungs so// zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa ni bdag gi khyim ste// de mi bdag gi myi bzod pa dang / dang du myi len pa
243a2(mdo): dang / khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis spang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa mtshungs par 'apyod pa rnams kyis ni/ dbye bar 'gyur ro// zhes de de ltar rtog pas yul rnams la dran bzhidang / 
243a3(mdo): tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ yus rnams kyis kyi smras shing // rma byung bar myi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran bzhin tu
243a4(mdo): nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar nga byang chub sems dang le dkon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du dkon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa myed/ 
243a5(mdo): par rnam par khyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// zhi ba rnam par skye da pa rnams kyi gnas so// dkon pa la ni lga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan ka sems mngon par zhes pa rnaMs
243a6(mdo): yod do// de dag bdag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu zhes na/ bdag tu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi kyi che'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma
243a7(mdo): pa'i yid la bya ba thams cad dang bral nas// tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing / chos de dag la skom pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpal dkon pa rnams la dran pa bzhin du nye bar
243a8(mdo): gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho thang 'khor rnams la dran bzhin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhen// 'di la
243b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gro ba dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khom dang / rgyal po 'i pho brang 'khor dag na// byang chub sems dpa'i bapyad pa spyod pa na/ gnas gang dang tshul dang / myi 'dra
243b2(mdo): yongs su myong bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang / myi mthun pa de dag yongasu spong ngo // de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste chang tshong pa'i khyim 'am// smang 'tshong ma'i khyim 'am// rgyal po'i pho brang ngas// brgyan po'i gan
243b3(mdo): sam/ ra lo pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam// gar mkhan dang / klu gang gi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang / myi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spong zhing / de dag la dran pa shin
243b4(mdo): tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang / 'gro ba dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang // la 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu nye ba
243b5(mdo): gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad po dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub seMs
243b6(mdo): dpal sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ tsa nas kyang zhend par myi 'gyur// sred pa myi skyed// chags pa myi skyed/ bdag gir myi khyed/ 
243b7(mdo): nor du gyi 'dzin bdag gini myi 'dzidad pa dang / minas kyang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du byas zhing sdug bsngal pa 'i sems can thams cad la phad pa 'thum pa de na nga / gas te rgyu dang
243b8(mdo): rkye nad de dang / gzhi des grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang / des khyengs par gyi 'gyur/ nga rgyal gyi ste/ rgyags pa kyi skye/ de 'di snyam du sems so// ring por mya thogs par grags pa dang / 
244a1(mdo): steg de stam na bya chu po sems des rnyed pa dang / kun sti nga/ grags pa dang / sna dang/ tshigs su bcad pa rnams sa dra bzhin cu nya lar gzhag cing gnas so// ji snyar na byang chub sems dpa' de ban
244a2(mdo): gshegs pas 'ams pa bcas pa mdun bzhin tu nye ba cing gnas shen/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sa sate/ gang 'das pa 'a de bzhin gshenas pa'i di bzhin brlo
244a3(mdo): pa 'das masrabs te/ mngon par rdzogs pa sa ma rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// grangs khyod 'thung 'dzigyur pa de dag kyang bas pa pa 'di nyid la lasapas dang/ 
244a4(mdo): dzu/ sa 'o// sa su na ma gyu // shA da / na 'jugs pa
244a5(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes// de denapas de ses pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan tu byed pa yin te/ brtson par byed pa dang / stegs par byed cing / zhin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de ltam byung / 
244a6(mdo): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa ya la yas pa sa/ drad bzhin tu nye ba dag zhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu'i skalam byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mangs pa dang / yo sunyan
244b1(mdo): mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad ma dran ba zhin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'dil byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ yong du nyon mdas
244b2(mdo): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis byung la'i gzhi yang rab tu shes te/ des de snar zhes nas byu ba ba de dang / rkyen pa de dag/ 
244b3(mdo): yongs su spong ngo/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal nye bu'i nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa yin no// 
244b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems da/ bal rtag tu d+hAn myi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pan mas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sos
244b5(mdo): dpal phyag dang khrod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dmar pa rnams yin/ yongs su myi skyo ba rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa
244b6(mdo): rnams yin// nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin// yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la myi stong pa rnams yin// gzhan la myi smod pa rnams yin// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rjes
244b7(mdo): lha 'du ba rnams yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas ji ltar na// lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dang
244b8(mdo): dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad ci de yid ches pa rnams yin// de srog gi phyir yang yang dag par blangs pa myi 'jig cing / yang dag par blangs pa las
245a1(mdo): myi 'gyur te/ de ya dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems dpal zhing rgyal myed pa yin// de rgyal byed cing sems dasal bas/ phyag dar khrod pa/ 
245a2(mdo): ngan ngon yongs su bor ba/ skye bo mang po thams cad dang / mthun pa dag sbyang ngo // de dag bsdus ras 'khrul par byed do// de gru ba dang / klan pa dang / bcol ba dang / btso par byed pa kun nas nyon mongs
245a3(mdo): pa myed cing yongs su gyi skyo ste/ yongs su kye skyo ba chen tu byas nas// tso tsam gyis don 'grub par 'gyur ba ma rtogs par de la zhen par yang kyi 'gyur ro// kye ma'o phyag dang khrod pa 'di dag ni zhi ba'o// 
245a4(mdo): kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sgom pa'o// kye ma'o phyag da ra khrod pa 'di dag ni shog mang ba ste/ lus la myi bde zhing dul 'byin to// zhes nges par lta ba ma yin gyi/ phyag dar khrod pa/ 
245a5(mdo): 'di dag sa drang srong gyis bgos pa'o// 'dod chags dang bra ba dang mthun pa'o// 'phags pa'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o// zhes phyag/ 
245a6(mdo): dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta pa yin te/ rgyu de dang chen de dang / gzhi des bdag la myi stong gzhan la myi spong ngo do// de bdag la stod cing gzham la spyod pa dang / bral bas tshul khrims phun su tshogs pa yin te/ 
245a7(mdo): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsa ba yin/ myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams
245a8(mdo): kyis yongs su bsrung pa yin/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi myi dang / yul gyi myi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnaMs kyis gzeng bstod pa bya ba yin te/ 
245b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin 'o// byang chub sems dpal sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsolang pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chu ma/ 
245b2(mdo): dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la gyod pa dman tshigs kyis ci zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang / sbyor ba yin rte/ stobs kyi
245b3(mdo): mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang mthun par 'apyod kyi/ stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu ma thob pas ni// nyon mongs pa ma sangs par gnyen po bste dang
245b4(mdo): par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de bzhi/ na gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam/ 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sem
245b5(mdo): pas gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang pa/ de 'i lan gsol tu bdag gos tshig myi phyi nad to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa la sa spos
245b6(mdo): pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni chos gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gapal yang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o sa cal pa/ 
245b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu re ji snyam bya sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i myi rnams dang / lga dang / klu dang // gnod sbyin dang / dri za mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la 'gyod pa dman tshegs ston cing / de dag gi mdun tu sbyangs
245b8(mdo): ba'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sems cad de dag de lta bus 'dul ba'i srang du'o// gan
246a1(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa lags ru du gzhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pas skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa'i stonod pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de ba ni
246a2(mdo): du byang chub sems dpal stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gyi phyir/ phyag dar khrod par 'gyur gyi dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyag dar khrod pa rnaMs
246a3(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no// brgya gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ cho ga shes pa rnams yin// 'dod pa chung pa rnams yin// kun tu btsal ba rnams/ 
246a4(mdo): yin/ thogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin// bsacags pachu dathos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bcags brgyad zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba rnams yin/ yid kyi bde ba dang bral ba rnas
246a5(mdo): yin/ 'khrug pa dang bral pa rnams yin// lend pa myed pa dbral ba rnams yan/ zag pa zad pa dang thus pam rgya lcizhes pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos/ 
246a6(mdo): gos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chu la yin/ de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba byed pa yin/ kun tu tshol ba myed pas na tshogs pa myed pa yin/ tshogs pa myed pas na bsags pa chud za
246a7(mdo): myed pa yin/ bsags pa chud pa 'byed pas na bsags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myed pa yin/ sdug bsngal myed pas na/ yid kyi bde ba myed pa yin/ yid kyi bde ba byed pas na/ 
246a8(mdo): 'khrug pa myed pa yin/ 'khrug pa myed pas na len pa myed pa yin/ lend pa myed pas na/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa/ 
246b1(mdo): chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi bsam khas myi 'gro ste/ de ci'i phyir phyir
246b2(mdo): pa can zhes bya'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang kyi bsam pas myi 'gro/ gti mug ki bsam pas myi 'gro/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas myi 'gro/ pra tog dang ser snali bas pas myi 'gro'o// nga rgyal gyi bas pas myi 'gro/ 
246b3(mdo): grags pa'i bas pas myi 'gro/ shes kyi khye 'dod pa'i bsaM pas myi 'gro/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i bsam pas myi 'gro zhing / bdud la mye 'dud dga' bar bya bas snyems pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir phyir pa can
246b4(mdo): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' phyir ba can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos pa sgra dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpal bsod snyoms pa rnaMs yin na
246b5(mdo): brgya gang zhe na 'di lta ste// sems can rnams la phan par zhu gas pa rnams yin// mthar kyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi bcad pa myed pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin
246b6(mdo): chog shes pa rnams yin/ bgo ba sha byed pa'i nga tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms pa thal ba la chod shes pa rnams yin// dge ba'i tshogs la mngon tu phyogs pa rnams yin// / 
246b7(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba shi nid tu yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin// ril por 'du shes pa myed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems cad rnams la phan par zhugs pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar
246b8(mdo): na mis po'i 'du shes myed pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal sos can dge ba'i yab dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba ca chu dru dang ldan pa sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na// sems can de dag la 'am
247a1(mdo): bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms pa'i yi ma 'dzin te// de nam gro pa ngam grong khyer ras/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ 'gro ba de'i tshe/ dran bzhin pa tu nye bar gzhag pa dang / myong lam mdzes pas dbang ngo // 
247a2(mdo): myi nyams pa dang / dbang po myi dgo ba dang / dbang po dul pa dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnaMs la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas/ bso snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gron
247a3(mdo): bsod snyoms mthar da kyis lend pa yin te// 'go 'phang bstod ci pe bram ze shibs la tshwa bo lta bu'i grong ngam// rgyal rigs shibs la chen po lta bu'i grong ngam/ khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu'i grongab 'byor pa
247a4(mdo): 'byor da pa dag tu mya 'jug gi/ mthal gcig nas bzung ste/ denas de'i don 'grub par 'gyur gyi bar du bsod snyoms pyod de/ gzha na du ni gnas gang na/ khyi za ba dang / bgrus ma 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye
247a5(mdo): gnas su gtogs pa/ rang bzhin gyis dang rgyal ngan pa'i srogs sa// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rgyas ka bya lobs pa can dag yod pa 'am// spang ba'i gnas thams cad su rnaMs
247a6(mdo): cad yongasu srung / de mams byas pas skams sa 'gron/ yongs su sa gyi 'chad cing // kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa/ sems can de nga/ la chags pa yang kyi byed/ khong khro ba yang myi skyed de/ yongs su yi
247a7(mdo): bskyed pas seMs tsa rigs pa'i bas nga snyoms ngan dom gyis cag shes pa yin te// des bsod snyoms de grangs nas bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag/ rga lag bkrus te/ de bzhin gshen
247a8(mdo): pa'i gzugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti dang rim gro byas te// gnas su song nas bsod snyoms dems ma cig ni tshangs pa mtshungs par pyod pa rnams kyi phyi gnag go/ 
247b1(mdo): ba ni sdug bsdus 'arnams kyi gyim gnon go// gsum pa ni sems can so ngo ba dbyung ba rnams kyi phyim gzhog go// rtsa bzhi pa ni 'das pa ste/ de la lan 'dod chags byed pa pa la ste/ chags par ma yin/ rgas lnga/ 
247b2(mdo): ma yin/ zhe nang par ma yin gyi/ gzhan dun mi tsam chu lus gnas par 'gyur pa dang/ 'tsho bar bya ba'i khyim dza ste/ ji ltar na gcas panyam dpa' ba dang / gcang yang lus lci bar gyi 'gyur ba de snyas pa ste/ 
247b3(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhes/ hacang nyam dpas nan/ dge ba'i phyogs su rgyas kyis bltas par 'gyur ro// lus pa tsa lus namig nyid kyi ma nan par 'gyur ro// des bsod snyoms de thos nas// dge ba'i phyogs la
247b4(mdo): mngon du phyogs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 9 lo myed pa dang / snyom kha byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yong su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o// de byang chub kyi phyogs
247b5(mdo): kyi chos yongs su 'dus pas/ bdag tu 'dzind pa myed pa na bdag tu 'dzind pa myed pas bdag gis kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ 
247b6(mdo): bya chub sems dpal bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal stas cig pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad kyis bsdigs
247b7(mdo): kyang byang chub kyi snying po'i stan cig las kyi g.yo ba rnams son// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las kyi g.yo ba rnams yin// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhes rab las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 
247b8(mdo): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las myi gsob rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las kyi gso rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa las kyi g.yo ba rnams yin// ma
248a1(mdo): las kyi g.yo ba rnams yon/ yang dag pa'i mthal las myi g.yo ba rnams yin// de bzhin nyid las myi gso la nas yin// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan las myi g.yo ba rnams yin no// rigs
248a2(mdo): kyi bu stan cig po ni 'di yon te/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyerang pa nyid kyi stan no// rigs kyi bu stan cig pon 'di yin te/ de na chos kyi stan no// stan de las byang chub sems dpa' de dag myi g.yo ste/ de bsam stan cin
248a3(mdo): pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' stan cig pa rnaMs yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis myi len pa rnams yin no// bcu
248a4(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste// myi rkam pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin// mags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin// de dag gis na mchod bzla dra bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi tshong yod dam skyed kyang rung ste// de dag
248a5(mdo): lus rton pa so byud 'di lta ste/ mar ram 'brumarapa ram/ spang chi 'am// bu'am 'am/ spang ci'i khu ba 'am// sdong po'i khu bo la/ 'bras bu'i zhu ba de lta bu dag bzar myi rung ngo // gzhan za ba
248a6(mdo): sagrong yang khong khro ba'i sems dang / 'jungs pa'i sems kyang myi skyed do// ya kal te zas phyis myi len pa'i byang chub sems dpal de ji lta bu 'i nad kyis srog ki bar cam du 'gyur pa 'am// dge ba'i phyogs
248a7(mdo): kyi bar chad tu 'gyur te// nad tshabs chen des 'gyod pa byed cing // the tsom myed par byas la/ sman yin pas sems nye bar gzhag par khyad par bya ste// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpal zas
248a8(mdo): phyis myi lend pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal bas phyis myi len pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi zhu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub seMs dpa
248b1(mdo): dgon pa pa rnams yin no// pan+ya gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ yun ring po nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ dbang po ma nyams pa rnams yin// mang du
248b2(mdo): thos pa rnams yin// nus pa rnams yin// bdag tu 'dzind pa'i 'jigs pa dang bras pa rnams yin// ri dgas dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ sus kyi theg bsrings pa rnams yin/ dper ba la mngon du phyogs pa nas/ 
248b3(mdo): yin/ myi dka' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu drol ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yum ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa yin pa nas// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
248b4(mdo): byalani zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal le// klas par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 
248b5(mdo): chos nyid la mkhas shing cho ga dang / gyod yus dang / 'gro ba da phyir myi 'ong ba la mkhas pas/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyis 'am
248b6(mdo): ba'i lam bstand pa de la 'di lta ste/ don dang / tshig dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog cing / gzhan gyis myi bkri ba yin no// de ltung ba byung na/ ltung ba las byung ba rab tu shes shing kasa?
248b7(mdo): de dag kyang yongs su spong ngo // gnas de dag la gus par byed cing // chags pa smon no// sdig pa de la smod cing 'gyod de// 'jol par byed do// gnas gang dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu
248b8(mdo): myi 'gyur pa de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu chen por 'gyur ba dang / kang dag tu 'bring dang / gang dag tu chung ngum 'gyur ba yin no// rab tu las kyi rnam par smin pa'i yum mi srid pa de yang rab tu shes te/ 
249a1(mdo): de yang nam tan gyis sgrub bo// de myig ki dbang po ma nyams pa dang / rna ba 'i dbang po ma nyams shing / yan lag dang nyidang lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon pa na gnas te/ gnas kangan
249a2(mdo): ba myed pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas so// gnas gang dgan bsod snyoms blang pa'i pyod yul dpapa 'i kyi nye ba dang / gnas gang dag mchu dang zhing rnyog pa myed pa// gtsang zhing dri ma myed pa/ tshugs
249a3(mdo): chung ba yod pa dang / gnas kang na shing phun sum tshogs pa/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa// 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/ gcan pa sa khro bo myed pa// phug dang ldan pa// spun
249a4(mdo): gzhong dang ldan pa/ zag thug myed pa// 'gron bde ba// zhi pa gnyis su myed pa'i gnas/ de 'dra ba dag na gnas so// de/ gnas de dag na gnas shing / gang des sngon blags pa dang / ldan
249a5(mdo): zos pa nyin lan gsu mtshan lan gsu du sgra la cad yang myi che/ ha cang yang myi chung ba dang / dbang po mya dkod cing / phyi rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyis dad pas// nye bar 'tsho zhing tshi ga nye ba bzung ste/ 
249a6(mdo): mtshan ma 'dzind cing gnyid kyis ma yig par kha tom byed do// gal te dge slong dkon drung du rgyal po 'am// blon po chen po 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs su/ grong rdal gyi myi ngag/ 
249a7(mdo): 'ongs na// des de dag la gus par legs par 'ongs so// zhes brjod par bya ste/ des rgyal po chen po ji ltar ba dan bting ba la bzhugs shig/ ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug na/ gnyi ga yang 'dug
249a8(mdo): bar bya'o// de ste myi 'dug nag nyi ka ya pa myi 'dug par bya'o// gal te dbang po dgod par gyur da na/ rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis phyogs na dge sbyong dang / bram ze nas tshul khrims dang ldan na/ yon tan dang
249b1(mdo): ldan pa/ mang du zos pa dag myi dergod dang / spre'u rnams kyi sem gtses par gnas pa de ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes bstod par bya'o// de ste brtan zhing dul la dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te
249b2(mdo): chos bstan par rung / de la chos sna tshogs bstand par bya'o// de ste chos bstand pa la myi dga' na/ de la skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstand par bya'o// de ste skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan dpal
249b3(mdo): myi dka' na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rgya che ba dag ba stan du par bya'o// bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi myi reg 'ongs ma yang mi rigs par bya ba dag bya'o// de de ltar yang du rma
249b4(mdo): pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu khar byed nus pa yin te// sems can de dag kyang de la dgal ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa kun nas langs
249b5(mdo): pa rnams kyi gnyes po yang nus pa yin no// sa du thos stobs bskyed pas/ bdag tu 'dzind pa'i 'jigs pa la ba yin no// de bdag tu 'a dzidzi pa'i 'jigs pa dang
249b6(mdo): dkon pa de gyi 'jigs kyi thAk+Sha/ gyi sna lags pa sred cing / rab tu dben pa la se ngan tu phyogs par 'gyur te/ gnas so// de dgon pa de ma dben pa sa mngon tu phyogs ga'i// 'du 'dzi byed par gnas ngos
249b7(mdo): ni dwags dang 'dra ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal dgonas pa ni ro dgas lham rtag tu 'jigs pa ma yin te/ de la rigs kyi nges pa yang myed mod kyi/ jiskar mdogs dag bdag nyid men
249b8(mdo): kyis srog gi ser yang tu 'gyur du 'tho zhes sus dang yus kyi thogs ring thams kyang ri ri ba'i yub sa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa bang/ 'di 'i man med kyis// 'di kyi da des/ so / 
250a1(mdo): bar gyur dan gyi rung ngo zhes bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / 'bru 'dzi gyi byed cing / 'du 'ji dag ring go bas kyang ri lom yongasu spong ngo // de de ltar 'ag bsrings te/ karba
250a2(mdo): pas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin// der ba tu dben pa la mngon tu phyogs pas// dkon pa de la yon tan tu lta ba dang / zhi bar lta ba yin// de yon tan tu lta zhing zhi ba ma lta bas nag kyi / 
250a3(mdo): ba dang myi 'dre'o// de myi dgal ba dang ma 'dres pas na/ dkon pa'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs nas gyod de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par byed pa la gnas pa rma
250a4(mdo): myi dka' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i khor du yin no// rigs kyi thu chos cu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dgon pa pa rnams/ yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan// byangabachub sems dpa' ni
250a5(mdo): rlung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di sa ste grobaha cang nyes shing drung dang / gyi rten thob dang / gtsang ring ba'i zhing drung du mi rten / ldum lhum chems can gyis mapa pa'i ging drung du myi rten/ shings tu
250a6(mdo): ka bi ke tsa 'i sho beka pa'i shing drung du mya rten// shing lo ma skams pa'i shing drung du myo rten// spre'u 'dug pa'i shi bi drung du myi rten/ bya gnas pa'i shing dru su myi brten// gcan zan khro bo gnas pa'i shing drung du myi rten/ 
250a7(mdo): 'gron po gnas pa'i shong drung du myi rten// myi g.yon can gnas pa'i sho drung du myi brten gyi/ gang na lus bag yangs shing sems dga' bar 'gyur ba'i shing drung de lta bur rten to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po deng/ 
250a8(mdo): dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' shing rngub pa rnams man no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' thaga' myed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang len 'di lta ste/ dgun nas dpyid dam/ 
250b1(mdo): dbyar dang// ston yang rung ste/ cig drung na myi gnas shing rlung tum yin/ sogs spungs par ma yin/ ma'o sma gzhong du ma yin// rgya lkog du ma yin// drang pa skyob lnga lnga yin// rlung skyob pa ma yin// tsham myos
250b2(mdo): pa ma yin/ nyi ma skyob pa ma yin// pa mo'i skyabs kyang myi byed kyi/ gzhan du na gal te byang chub sems dpal bla ga pa myed pa de na 'am/ lus kyis myi nus par gyur da na// des gtsug lag khang du gnas te/ nyon
250b3(mdo): mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcas te// ci nas kyang bdag gtsug lag khang na gnas bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar 'bad pa de ltar bya'o// zhes de ltar
250b4(mdo): bskyed par bya'o// gtsug khang de la yang chags pa myi skyed de/ zhend pa yang ma yin no// de yang 'di ltar sems te/ sbyin pa 'i bdag po rnams la phan gdags par bya'o// bdag cag gis padag
250b5(mdo): nyid gso bar myi bya'o snyam ste/ de rtag tu rgyud myi 'chad par tha/ gang myed pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no// rigs kyi zhu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blag pa
250b6(mdo): myed pa pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gang na gnas kyang rung ste/ skyob sang pa rnams man// 
250b7(mdo): de dag 'chi ba'i dus shes rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par nye bar 'jog pa rnams yin// de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang
250b8(mdo): rnam par rul par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par pham par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang / kyeng rus su 'du shes pa rtag tu rkyen gyi 'chad pas nye ba pa
251a1(mdo): 'jog pa yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas ni/ byams pa'i sems su bya'o// phan pa'i sems dang / sems can la snying pa che ba dang / tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra'i cho/ 
251a2(mdo): ka dang ldan zhi ba/ sha dang 'bag pa myed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dur khrod dam yod na ni gang byang chub sems dpa' sha za ba mthong na// ma dad pa skyed cig/ rtse bar sems pa'i myim/ 
251a3(mdo): yin pa dka gnas pa dag yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag byas// dge slong rgan rabs rnams
251a4(mdo): la phyag byas te/ gsar bu rnams kyang dgal bar byas la 'dreng ste 'dug par bya'o// dge 'dun gi mal stan la 'dug myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na// byang chub sems dpa
251a5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi yid la sbyar par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpal dur khrod pa ni/ 'phags pa ma yin pa mi/ 'jig rte/ dang myi mthun gyi/ 'phags pa dang ni myi mthun pa myed do// 
251a6(mdo): gal te byang chub sems dpal dur khrod pa ga ba zag gi mal stan la btang na/ des ci nas kyang de 'gyod par myi 'gyur la/ gzhan gyis kya bang bya bar myi 'gyur la shin tu rtogs par byas la/ dge slong de
251a7(mdo): libs pa yang shes nas// gdod stan de la gdol bu dang 'dra bar dmal ba dasal ba'i sems kyis stan de la 'dug par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal dur khrod pa
251a8(mdo): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' cog bu pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongasu gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ sems
251b1(mdo): gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ gnyid kyis non te 'dug pa ma yin/ lus dub pas 'dug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' tso bu la 'dug pa ni byang chub kyi cho kra yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ 
251b2(mdo): 'adz+rag ko// sems gsogacig tu bya ba'i phyir 'jug go// byang rgyub kyi snying po 'gro ba'i phyir 'dug go// sems canas 'an pa'i phyi 'dug go// nyon mongs pa thams cad slob pa'i phyir 'dug go// ram
251b3(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhi mi bzhin rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
251b4(mdo): mal stan la ma chags pa rnams yin/ bdag nyid kyang ma la stan myi 'ding gzhan dag kyang 'ding du myi 'jug/ 'did pa'i// phyir brda myi byed cing / gzhan du na lo mas kang na'o/ chos gang
251b5(mdo): pa'i gnas kyang rung ste// gnas de dag tu nyal bar byed cing / sa gang gi phyogs na sbrul gyis gang pa laM/ spangs dang / sha sbrang gis gang ba laM/ khung mang ba de dag ring po myi thogs par yongasu spod
251b6(mdo): de dag nyal ba na glo g.yas pas nyal par byed de// rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas// lus chos gos dag gis shin tu g.yogs shing dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes dang / ldan pa'i 'du shes
251b7(mdo): su nyal bar byed de/ gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par myi byed de// skyes pa'i bde ba la yang ba yin te/ gzhan du na de dag ci tsam du 'byung ba chen po rnams gnas shing / 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed pa
251b8(mdo): rtag tu rgyu da myi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la mngon tu phyogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal gzhi mi bzhin pa rnaMs yon no// rigs kyi
252a1(mdo): bu chos brgya dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor dpyod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ myi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ byams pasgom pa mang pa rnaMs
252a2(mdo): yin// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa med pa rnams yin// smon la mkhas pa rnams yin// stong pa nyid sgom la mang pa rnams yin// mtshan ma myed bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin// rnal 'byor pa sgom/ 
252a3(mdo): pa yang ba rnams yin// rgyun tu bsgom pa mang pa rnams yin// 'gyod pa myed pa rnams yin// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi stug
252a4(mdo): pa bsgom pa mang ba yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di la bya chub sems dpa' gcig pu lkog tu song ste// nang du ya / dag bzhag nas rab tu dben mngon du phyogs shing / shin
252a5(mdo): rgyu spro ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang lus bkas kyis/ klo bas dkyis mo dkrung bcas nas dran pa mngo tu ba' ste/ phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sos/ 
252a6(mdo): so// ji snyam du myi'i ning du kha zas dang / zas skomo gtsang ma yang rung / bza ba'o yang rung / ngan pa yang rung / ro phur supa tshogs pa yang rung / de chung ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad lus kyi mes reg pa
252a7(mdo): dang / bachog par 'gyur te// rul cing bring ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang myi 'phrod pa yinas/ de la byis pa 'di dag ni sha ning tu zhend cing // rab tu 'chags so// bdag cag ni 'phags pa'i chos 'du
252a8(mdo): pa la gnas te// yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhan ma chags par bya'o// de'i phyir skyo ba'i sems kyang myi skyed do// snyam ste deltar
252b1(mdo): sa byang chub sems dpa' kyi sdug pa sgom pa yapa la yis no// ji sbyar na byang chub sems dpal byams pal sgom kha mnga' san zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dper ba'adun
252b2(mdo): steg nang bya rdza dag par bzhag nas// rab tu dper ba ya mngon tu phyogs te/ sha nang tu skyo ba'i sems kyis/ lus drang po drang po dang lus 'grus kyis glong pas// dkyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon
252b3(mdo): tu bzhag ste// phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam tu sems so// sems can gang dag 'a khro bo gnod sems mang ba// myi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang / gang rnams bdag la rgol ba
252b4(mdo): dang / da/ bo gcugs myed par na gnyer ba rnams 'byung ba la'abyung bar 'gyur bar yang rung ste// bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byas te/ byang / 
252b5(mdo): chub kyi snying po la dgod par bya'o snyam mo// de yang dag tsam ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas bsams te// de ltar na byang chu ba sems dpa' byams bsgom pa mang ba yin no// ji ltar
252b6(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba sgos pa mang ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'dod chags skyes pa dang / khro ba skyes pa dang / gnod sems kyi sems skyes pa/ 
252b7(mdo): 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di su la skye ba de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// chos 'di gang skyes pa de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rkyen dgang dag kyis skye ba de dag kyang rten cing 'brel
252b8(mdo): par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'bresang bar 'byung ba'i tshu gsog de dag la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag la ma 'byin snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brelang par 'byung ba sgo
253a1(mdo): ba mang 'a yin mo// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa rnams yod zhen/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyom yong ba de dag spang 'a'i phyir nan tan du byed/ 
253a2(mdo): gang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa myo nus pa'i ring bzhis de dag sa yang btang snyoms su gnas so// skyom de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la rim gro myo byed pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bla ma dang / 
253a3(mdo): 'phags pa rnams dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par pyod pa rkan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la ri mo myo byed pa ni skyon mo// bdag la ri mo myo byed pa dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dang / yul la mdo
253a4(mdo): du phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis 'phyogs/ pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par
253a5(mdo): lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzind pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / myi rtag par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa rnams mnyes par myi byed pa dang / byis pa'i skye ba ste nad pa dang / tshul
253a6(mdo): khrims dang ldan pa yong su spong ba dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po la ste nad pa dang / dge ba'i ba shes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang / mdo sde zab
253a7(mdo): mo spong ba dang / mdo sde zab mo skrag pa dang / snyom las dang / le lo dang // bdag la brnyes pa dang / gzi brjid chung dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / gnas ma yin pas 'gyod pa dang / myi 'gyod pa la
253a8(mdo): 'gyod pa dang / 'gyod pa la gyi 'gyod pa dang / sgrib pa kun nas ldang bas klags pa dang / g.yo smras bcings pa dang / rmugs shing ga nyid kyis nod pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / nus la 'dod
253b1(mdo): ba dang / lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang / yul la 'dod chags pa dang / 'khor ba la 'dod chags pa dang / 'jig rten rkyang phan gyigs pa tshig la sten pa dang / dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang / yid dam/ 
253b2(mdo): 'dor ba dang / myi dge ba dag dang ldan pa dag la grol ba dang / dge ba dang ldan pa dka la myi tshol pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / sde pa dang / skyes bu dang / sde pa dang / khye'u dang / sde pa dang / bu mo dang / sde
253b3(mdo): pa dang / mu stegs can dang / sde pa dang / dgon pa la mngon par myi dga' ba dang / zas kyi tshod myi shes pa dang / bla ma'i drung du myi 'gro ba dang / kha don gyi dus myi shes pa dang / spyod yus kyi gnas myi
253b4(mdo): shes pa dang / bslab pa phra mo/ la gus par myi byed pa dang / sdig pa chu ngu dag la 'jigs par mya lta ba dang / dbang po gta muka gyis bsgribs pa dang ldan pa dang / g.yeng ba la dbang po'i
253b5(mdo): grims pa dang / rgod par 'gyod pa dang / bcos dka' ba dang / bka' blo mya bde ba dang / yid pU kyi 'ong ba dang / yid su myi'o/ nga ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang / mngon rtags su 'dzin
253b6(mdo): pa dang / khro ba rnams la sems kyi byams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying myi bam pa dang / nabs skyo bar myi byed pa dang / shi bas myi skrag pa dang / kun nas 'bar ba las kyi 'byung ba dang / 
253b7(mdo): lus la so sor myi rtog pa dang / tshul khrims la so sor rtog pa dang / ci byas mi byed ci bya zhes so sor brtags pa dang / myi bsams pa la sems pa dang / myi brtan pa la rtog pa dang / myi smon pa la smon
253b8(mdo): pa dang // myi 'byung ba la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / myi dka' ba la dka' bar 'du shes pa dang / lam ma yin pa la l-i u 'du shes pa dang / ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang / 'phral gyi bya ba la chags
254a1(mdo): pa dang / byed pa ngan pas g.yengs pa dang / dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par spong ba dang / theg pa chen po la myi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 
254a2(mdo): theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i ge pa zag rnams la myi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / thod pa lhur byed pa dang / 
254a3(mdo): 'thab pa lingang tshul can dang / brlang pa dang / rtsub pa dang / pho theg can dang / gyi rdol che la dang / gtum pa dang / gdug pa dang / ngag kyi snyan pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / myi tshigs par smra ba dang / ngan pa smra bas
254a4(mdo): smra ba dang / brgyan zer ba dang / spros pa la mngon par rga ba dang spros pa la gzhol ba ni skyon no// de de ltar skyonas mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa nyid bsgom pa la rnam
254a5(mdo): 'byor du byed de/ de stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas gnas pa dang / gang dag la sems 'jug cing // sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang / de dag la ngo bo nyid yongs su btsal na/ 
254a6(mdo): stong par rtogs so// sems de dag yin pa de yang yongs su brtags na stong pa'o// gang gis brtags pa de yang stong par rtogs so// de de ltar rtogs pas mtshan ma myed pa sa rnal 'byor du byed do// 
254a7(mdo): de la nad kyi mtshan ma gang dang gang snang bar 'gyur ba de dang / de dag mtshan ma myed par byed de/ ci nas kyang lus myi dmyigs pa dang / lus la dran pa nye bar gzhog pa dang / lus la sems myi gtong ba dang / 
254a8(mdo): phyi ro la kyim can pa rnams kyi dbyigs pa dang / phyi ros dkyis can sa rnams sa dran pa nye bar gyi 'dzeg pa dang / choms kyi rkang ba de ltar mchad ma gyid pam byed de/ de phyi bang kyim tshan sa nas dang bral ba / 
254b1(mdo): lus kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral bas// nad kyi mtshan ma rnams la spang ba'i phyir zhugs te// sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba skyed do// de skom pa rtag tu bsgom pas brtson pa yin/ rgyun myi 'chad par zhig na/ 
254b2(mdo): dang / lhag mthong la gnas pas gnas pa yin// de la zhi gnas ni sems zhe gcig pa'o// lhag mthong ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa'o// de sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'gyod/ 
254b3(mdo): po byed cing / rab tu dgal ba yin no// de ci'o phyir zhe na/ de ltar de tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams ni rnal 'byor da pyod pa yin te/ 
254b4(mdo): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni rnal 'byor nga yang dag par 'grul po// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs 'arnams ni ni rnal 'byor ngal khyod de/ de bas nanal 'byor da du myong ba rnams
254b5(mdo): shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor nga pyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal mdo
254b6(mdo): 'dzind pa rnams yin no// brgya ga zhen 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bskyang ba'i phyir/ zos par 'dzind kyi zab mi kyi phyir ma yin no// bstan pa kur bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzind kyi rnyed
254b7(mdo): pa'i phyi sa yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyi 'chad par bya ba'i byor// thos pa 'dzidzind kyi/ bkur sti'i phyin ma yin no// 9pa chen po sa yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems mnas rjes su
254b8(mdo): ba'i phyir/ thos pa 'dzind kyi grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no// 'gon myed pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzind to// sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams
255a1(mdo): la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzi nad to// shes rab kyi myig dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes rab kyi myog thob par bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i rdzi nad to// nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhu/ 
255a2(mdo): pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir/ thos pa 'dzin to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa
255a3(mdo): 'dzind to// bdag nyid kyang bla ra myed pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ thos pa 'dzid kyi/ theg pa chung ngus ni myi smon to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo
255a4(mdo): 'dzind pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no// brgyagadang zhe na 'di ste ste/ 'dul ba yang rab tu shes te/ 'dul pa/ 
255a5(mdo): pa'i tshul yang rab tu shes/ 'dus pa zab pa yang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zhib pa yang rab tu shes// rung ba dang myi rung ba yang rab tu shes/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yang rab tu shes
255a6(mdo): bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba myed pa rab tu shes/ so so tha rad pa'i bslab pa'i gleng gzhi dang / 'byung ba yang rab tu shes/ nyan thos kyi 'dus ba yang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba yang rab tu
255a7(mdo): shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzind pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' chog dang spyod/ 
255a8(mdo): yul dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa ni sa yin mo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// nyan thos kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la nin
255b1(mdo): tu bslabs pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bsrabs pa rnams yin// de dag shi nad tu bslabs pas na// cho ga dang / spyod yul phum su tshogs pa rnams yin// cho ga/ 
255b2(mdo): dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang / mthun pa ma yin la'i khyod yul rnams yongasu spong / de dag/ de'i phyir gnas ma yin par myi pyod/ yul ma yin la dang / dus ma yin par
255b3(mdo): myi pyod/ de dag dge sbyong gi spyod yul la 'gyod pas myong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ dge sbyong ngam// bram zes 'di lta ste// don dang myi ldan pa de dang / des mtshang byung myed la// gzhan das/ 
255b4(mdo): kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'jog par byed do// de dag pyod pa tu na suM tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ spyod la rab tu zhi bas spyod lam bcos pa myeng ba dang ldan
255b5(mdo): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// bya ngachub sems dpa' chog dang spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang so// lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ches
255b6(mdo): bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang / phra dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/ bran+da gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa yang dag pa
255b7(mdo): 'jud/ sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yin/ gzhan dag kyis byin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/ sbyin pa'i bdag po gzhan dag la yang ga zeng spyod cing // rab tu dkal bar byed/ gzhan dag la byin
255b8(mdo): na yang 'di skad tu bdag cag byin cig/ gzhanas ni ma yin no// bdag cag kyi dbyur ngan sa ba gzhan dag kyir mgyur da cig/ ces sems myi skyed/ 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'tshong
256a1(mdo): yo byad de dang de dag thob par gyur da cig/ ces 'jig rten dpa'adas pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bde bar gyur dacig/ bdag gyis kyang de nyid du 'bad par bya/ brtsal bar bya'i/ bdag kyis ser
256a2(mdo): sna dang / pha dog gi sems bskyed par myi bya'o// zhes sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang pra tog dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi
256a3(mdo): bu chos brgya dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal sems can thams cad la sems stobs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba rnams na
256a4(mdo): sems can thams cad la khong khro ba 'i sems myed pa rnaMs yin/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems myed pa rnams yin/ sem sa can thams cad kyi don kho nar sbyor pa dag sbyin/ tshul khrims
256a5(mdo): srung / bzod pa sgom// brtson 'grus chom// bsam gtan/ la bas gtan du byed// shes rab sgom/ thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid kyang yang dag par sgrub mod kyi/ gnyis la gnas nA/ 
256a6(mdo): sems kyis sgrub pa ma yin gyi/ sems can rnams cad la thun mong gi sems dang / sems can thams cad la dmyigs pas sprub ste// ci nas kyang chos nyid sbyam du zab par 'gyum pa de ltar gyu
256a7(mdo): de dag 'khor po rab tu 'khom pa ras bdag nyid byung ba nas// gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/ de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gzhag cing 'byin gyi// sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin/ 
256a8(mdo): khong khro bas ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam// khyim bdag la khu sdug pa phangs pa byams pa yid du 'ong ba drug cig yong la// bu de dag la tshob dpon nam/ 
256b1(mdo): khyim bdag de mtshungs par byams zhing // mtshungs par sbyor ba 'gyur ba las/ de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/ gos pa myi zhes pa phyi mkhas pa cig yod la// de nas tshong dpon nam khyim padas
256b2(mdo): de'i khyim me thard te/ de'i bu de dag kyang so so na 'khod par gyur da na// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam/ du sems// tshong dpon ram khyim bdag de 'don sde ji byung ngo // de nas phyis 'byung ngo snyam de ltar/ 
256b3(mdo): sems sam// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon nas khyim bdag de 'u
256b4(mdo): rnams la sems snyoms pas/ de gang dang gang dag ji ltar/ 'jal ba de dang / de nyid de bzhin du 'byind to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas la pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
256b5(mdo): byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dang / 'i bu dang 'dra'i 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de byis pa myi gsal ba/ myi mkhas pa/ 'gro ba
256b6(mdo): drugs sa dganas pa// de dag 'khor ba'i khyimal 'a dang pan// gang dang nga ltar sangs su sbyin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid ji ltar 'byin to// byung nas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i byings ni
256b7(mdo): rab tugazhog/ sa kyi rnams bcu po dadag dang ldan byang chub se las dpa' sems pa thams ca ma thams byams pa rnams yin no// dgas kyi bu rgyas bcu dang ldanas byang chu'i sems dus
256b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// brgya gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen/ 
257a1(mdo): bkur byas pa yin gyi/ 'ang mi kyi mchod pas ni ma yin no// rag tan gyigyis nod pa dang / sems can rnams sa pan zhing 'de bar bya ba dang / sems cad rnams sa lan 'dogs par byed
257a2(mdo): dang / sems cad kyi don ma zhugs pa dang / yidas myi gtong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi gtong ba dang / ji snyam smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang / yid yongs kyi skyo ba dang / byang chub rgyas
257a3(mdo): yongs su myi gtong bas// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/ zang zing kyi mchod pas na ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na// de bzhin gshes
257a4(mdo): ba rnams ni chos kyi sku ste/ chos la mchod na de bzhin gshes/ das pa rnams la mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin/ gshegs pa rnams ma nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa yin/ 
257a5(mdo): sems can thams cad la phar zhing bde ba dang / sems can/ mas cad la phar 'dogs pa dang / sems cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir/ skye'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don de yang yi dpa btang ba dang
257a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i las la rgyab kyis 'phyogs pa dang / brtan du smra ba dang / smras pa las nyams pa dang / dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / yid yongs su skyo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang bral/ 
257a7(mdo): bas yang dag par thob par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu de ci'i byor zhe na/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni sems can gyi don la rag las te/ gal te sos
257a8(mdo): cad rnams myed na// byang chub sems dpal rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyi 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs la mchos ci rim gro byas pa sa
257b1(mdo): zang zing gyi mchod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// 
257b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no// pacu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste// rab tu
257b3(mdo): byung nas bdag ni grogs po dang // glon po dang / gnyen pa shes dadang / sAg gi nye 'tshams la shi ba dang 'dra'o// zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis gzugs myi sdug par khas blangs shing / bdag gose gos kha dog myi sdug
257b4(mdo): bar bgos te// tshul gzhan du bsgyurang to zhes nga rgyas bcom pa yin/ spob ba'i rgyu spong ba'i phyir 'gro bregs shib lag na lhung bzed thogs te / gong nas gong du 'gro'o zhes pa rgyal bcom pa yin// gdol bu dang 'dra bar
257b5(mdo): dasal ba dmal ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'grolo zhes pa rgyal ba com pa yin/ bdag ni bsod snyoms pa ste/ bdag gi 'tsho la gzhan la rag lus so zhes pa rgyal bcom pa yim/ brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon
257b6(mdo): le nad to// zhes pa rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis slob dpon dang / tha ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so// zhes pa rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par 'gyod pa rnams la 'di
257b7(mdo): lha ste cho ga dang / khyod yul dang / kun khyod pa de dang / des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thol la rnams thob par bya'o// zhes pa rgyal bcom la yis/ sems cad 'gro ba dang / 
257b8(mdo): gnod sems can rnams kyi nang na 'bod pa mang bar bya'o zhes pa rgyal bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal ba rgyal bcom pa rnams dayin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcud ldan
258a1(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' dpa pa yang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sngon gi dge ba'i rtsabs brtan pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin// gzhan gyi dring
258a2(mdo): myi 'jog gzhan gyis myi bkri/ ston pa gzhan myed pas// yang dag par lta ba rnams yon/ g.yo dang skus 'apyod pa dang bral bas bsam kha phun sum tshogs pa rnams yine/ gya klu myed pa'i rang bzhin can yin du/ 
258a3(mdo): drang ba rnams yo re// dbang po rdzo pas shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// rgyud dpabs sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang ba nga bral ba rnams yin// sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ 
258a4(mdo): la rten pa rnams yin/ legs par bshad pa tshol bas mngon pa ldi nga rgyal myed pa rnams yin/ chos bstand pa la log par myi'adzind pa rnaMs yin// rgya chen po la mo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
258a5(mdo): che ba rab tu shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dad pa mang ba rnam sa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thams cad rnam par
258a6(mdo): sel bsagaso yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag me de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'aka' tsam zhig nyan par gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la ba/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de bzhin
258a7(mdo): gshegs pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstand kyis// legs par rab tu nyom la yid la zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpal sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa/ bcom ldan
258a8(mdo): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' sa la to// rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad la thun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs/ 
258b1(mdo): pa ji ltar sems can cig la khyab pa de bzhin du/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la yang khyab ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyab nas// nam mkha'i khams la khyab kyang / de bzhin gnas/ 
258b2(mdo): pa'i byams pa chen po'i mthal dang mu shes pa yang byed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje chen po dang
258b3(mdo): ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la snying rje phra bzhin du sems can gi khams ma lus par thams cad la snying rje zhing / de la pham pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos ston
258b4(mdo): pa myi zad pa dang ldan te// des de bzhin gshegs pas skal pa dU ma nas/ skal ba brgya stong tshad myed grangs myed la du ma'i bar du/ nam grangs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag/ 
258b5(mdo): gyis sems can thams cad la dus cig tu chos stond kyang / de ba zhing gshegs pa'i chos bstand pa zad par myi 'gyur ro// rig sa kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dri ba le lung bstand pa shind tu
258b6(mdo): tshad myed pa dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ji snyed sems cad gi grangs su/ rtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa sa dus cig tu tshig dang yo ge gzhan dag gis dri la tha dad dris
258b7(mdo): kyang / de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung bstand pa'i stonod pa bstand kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dro be lupa bstan pa'i stand pa zad pa pa myi 'gyur ro// 
258b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa myed pa'i bas gtan ga'i khyod yul ba yin te// rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpalas bcu dang ldan par gyur da la/ de dag
259a1(mdo): thams cad dus cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin du snyoms par zhugs nas skald pa brgya stong dum ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang / gzhan dag la snyoms par
259a2(mdo): thugs kyang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'i ting nge 'dzin tam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am mu ma rnying do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad myed pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i mngon
259a3(mdo): par bsgrub pa dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bugal te sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa 'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur dan// de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ skad cig zang cig/ yud tsam cig gis sem
259a4(mdo): can re ro'i ma dun bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar bston/ da to// gal teg/ thugs gzhan dang gzhan la mos par gyur dan/ de ya yang de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig zang cig ud tsam gyis sems can
259a5(mdo): re re'i mdun tu gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du nye bar stodang to// kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan gyi yul tshad byed de// rig tu bu su'i byad kyigazigs kyi/ phyi'i dbyig gis ma yi pa'i sems na
259a6(mdo): yod pa// gal te rigs kyi bu grangs dang bsam pa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kA sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur da kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gyi 'phel ma sgyu ru nga'i 'bras bu sbyar/ yang dag pa ji
259a7(mdo): lta ba bzhin du gzigs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i/ snyan gyi yul tshad myed de// rigs kyi bu gal te de lta bu'i nyid kyi sems can gyis// mtha' yas mu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams/ yongs su dag
259a8(mdo): byung sa/ de da/ zas cad kyis skad ci/ thang cig yud tsam tshigs sgra dbyangs brjod pa'i// sgra snyan cig tu byung ste/ brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bdag bdag ga sde rnams kyang sa ma gas dado/ mapa rarab tus rkyen te/ 
259b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye zhes tshad myed pa// mya zad pa mu myed nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ga khams ma lus par so sor rnam par rtog pa rjes su rnam par rtog cing bas pa rnam
259b2(mdo): pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la// so so ma las rnam pa sna tshogs byed na// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig za cig yud tsam cig la sems can 'di ni 'dis rnam par rtog go// sems can 'ang mo 'di la sems so// 
259b3(mdo): sems can 'di ni las 'di byed do// de'i 'bras bu ni 'dir 'gyur ro// zhes rab tu mkhyen to// de yang de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum cam yangang thogs pa myong pa'i ye shes kyis skad cig zang cig yud tsam cig
259b4(mdo): rab tu mkhyend to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu// mnyam par bzhag pa rgyun myi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag pa'o// / rigs kyi de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel nges
259b5(mdo): ba myed// dbang po bslad pa myed/ sems 'khrug pa myed do// gas kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs po'i bag chags dang / bcas pa thams cad spangs pa ste// zhi ba rab tu
259b6(mdo): zhib nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang sa nyon mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni bslang par 'gyur te/ sems smad pas mnyam par 'jog par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyod mongs pa myed pa/ 
259b7(mdo): rdul myed pa/ zag pa myed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa// chos thams cad la dbang ba mnyam pa nyid thob pa// tipe nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i myod yul thams cad las
259b8(mdo): byung ba yin te/ gal te rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni pyod lam re re la yang ting nge 'dzini re res gyod pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du pyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyi tshe'i bar/ 
260a1(mdo): myong nag pa de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lta ci smos// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni skal pa pa grangs myed pa du mas yang dag par grub pa yin to// rigs kyi bu re
260a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ni da pag pa dpa bsam pa dang brtag par myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par se lad pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skal bgrangs ma mchis pa
260a3(mdo): gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yong dag par 'grub pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'os la pa// rigs kyi bu ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub seMs
260a4(mdo): dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ de ni skal da pa grangs myed pa ga/ sum gis yang dag par sgrub par myi nus kyi/ ni byang chub sems dang
260a5(mdo): chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par gyur da pa de'i tshe zhes brtsams te// bskal pa bkrab bar bya'o// thog ma'i sa sa nas brtsams pa de ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
260a6(mdo): thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dgal ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa rnyid pa'i sems can de dag ni snying de ba sem
260a7(mdo): bar bgyi ba'i las bgyid pa/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dad pa dang mos pa mang zhing / byang chub tu nye 'a lags da/ su dag thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid 'dang / 
260a8(mdo): gzhas sang rgya che stan pa rnams kyi smos te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ring por gyi thogs la de 'dzin gshegs pa'i cheb 'di 'bral bdag nyid kyi srod du gu dad par ma lo/ 
260b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa cas da pa// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos par 'gyum pa'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyis/ 
260b2(mdo): yongs su bzung ba yinano// pa'i thA bsnye pa sa/ sangs rgyas ma ste bsnyed bku zlas pa gyu / sa ky-i chu dang / rigs kyi bu bo de / gis sa myos dang mi gnyis dang nam cu
260b3(mdo): gyi skyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi gang gimi nub bdun yidi la b+ha bku'an myed cing sems pa lazugs pa bsam pajug zo dang / dang badras pos zhugs te/ de bzhin gzhas
260b4(mdo): pa'i rtsa ba 'disems su sems pa/ zhag bdun 'das pa dang / des ma tshad pa'i tshig nye bar bzhag nas gtsangs sa gos gtsung sa pagos te// dad pa langs du byas la 'dug par bya
260b5(mdo): te/ des de'i nub po de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo bar 'gyur ro// de ste myi byed dam tshogs chad par byed na de stelas phyug ni par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i sel pad bzhin gshegs la
260b6(mdo): de'i 'dun na bzugs pa 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal rnal tha mams cad ni par sesad pas gas sa pani mamam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i rmil 'di bag na sems can na
260b7(mdo): myi dad par 'gyur ba mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad pa na/ sems can gang mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba'i bsam pas gnod
260b8(mdo): sems kyi sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod de/ de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang rigs
261a1(mdo): kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bshad pa 'di la rang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / stong par 'du shes pas/ 
261a2(mdo): rigs kyi bu sngom yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di kyi rabs de ba de dag gzhanas yang rigs kyi bu de dag gas thob pa nges par rig par bya'o// de nas 'khro der 'phrul sems can la cig 'di snyam du mas/ 
261a3(mdo): kye malo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon 'dag cag gos kyang thos pa lta zhig snyam po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ ljags kyi dbang
261a4(mdo): pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'ag pa'o// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ma sa byer bka' nas dbu mngon par bka' bo// dbu mngon par bkab nasasku mngon par bkab bo// sku mngon par bka ba nas seng ge'i khri mngon
261a5(mdo): bar bkab bo// seng ge'i khri mngon par bkab nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo// de nas nyan thos kyi 'khor de nas pa rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/ de nas thams cad
261a6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo// de nas stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams mngon par bka' 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyir bsdus te/ thams cad dang ldama'i kho la bka la sa#
261a7(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brdzun du gsung bar gyi 'gyur gyis// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis dad par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams mngon pa mi dad par gyis shig/ de ni khyed kyi/ 
261a8(mdo): yun ring po'i don dang / phar pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpal brgyad khri bzhi stong gyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// srog chags ba
261b1(mdo): stong du ma ni chos rnams ma chos kyi myog/ rdus dang zal zhing dri ma myed pa rnam par dag go// sded sems la skyes pa'i sems cad dums mi byang chub tu sems skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub
261b2(mdo): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bkalas khad pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu ga bzhin 'di lta ste
261b3(mdo): gzugs su mdogs la/ don dam par na gzugs su'ang myi dmyigs ga 'i mngon par myi chags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pam yang 'dogs la/ da
261b4(mdo): par na rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs shing mngon par gyiH/ gas so// sa'i khams su yang dgongs la// den dam par na/ desa'i khams su yang gyi myigs shing mngon par myi chags so// 
261b5(mdo): de bzhin tu chu'i khams dang / sa'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / rnamal la mas dang / dam par zhes pa'i khams su yang 'jo/ sa sa/ don dam par na rnam pa nas pa'i mams su ya myi gyis
261b6(mdo): shib mngon par myi chags so// myig gi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la// don dam par na myig gi skye mched du'ang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chags so// de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched
261b7(mdo): dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skyem ched dang / yid kyi skye lached du'ang 'dogs la// don dam par ni yid kyi skye mched du'ang myi 'dogs shing / mngon par myi chags so// bdag tu 'ang 'dogs pa
261b8(mdo): don dam par na/ bdag tu'ang mya dmyigs shing / mngon par gyi chags so// sems can du 'dogs la/ don dam par na sems can yang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par gyi chags so// srog dang
262a1(mdo): gsob dang / skyes bu dang / sar dang / gdasas skyes pa dang / shed bu yang 'dogs la/ dos ngam lam na srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang 'ag dang / sheng las skyes pa dang / 
262a2(mdo): shed thams pa phyir phyogs zhing / mngon par gyi gas so// dzin rtes tu 'ang 'donas pa/ don dam par na 'jig nyes bya'ang myi gas na'o// mngon par myigs s+ho// 'dzin can
262a3(mdo): dmas su yang 'dags pa// dod dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su kyi dmyigs shing mngon du myi pa po// sangs rgyas khrims rnams kyi'ang 'dug dad dam par nam
262a4(mdo): go// rigs kyi phu sa pasan bye skad dri srin rdzo ba zhes byaste/ kun rdzob kyisas rnams sa ni na ras pagyid mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi chos nas byed pa ya ngon papa
262a5(mdo): bstan par gyi rnas so// rigs kyi su byang chub sems dpal gang gnas 'di dgas kun rdzob tu ma sa shing di ra das par ma yin pa de ni spyan rdzob la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de ga
262a6(mdo): ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yon no// rigs kyi thu chos bcu dang ldan sa// byang chub sems dpa' din ngas pal mabyas pa rnams pan na// bcu gangapa zhis 'di lta / 
262a7(mdo): ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yod/ myi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang / myi 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang / rgya ser gyi 'dor pa'i chos nyid dang / cimi ga khyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang / 
262b1(mdo): smrang byed pamatshab nyid dang / thob pa byed mab nyid dang / brjod du myed pa mthas nyid dang / nangarab nyid dang / 'jugs pa'i chos nyid rnam 'an// gis kyi chur car bya dang/ dadas
262b2(mdo): dongango // kI dag gis sna bam bya' pa pa'ido// rnams kyis kyi dzang dpa pa marjod du byeng bstan
262b3(mdo): brnams rgyam pa gas man pa'o// rigs kyi bu dod dam pa 'i pazhi gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang chungs bus kyang kyi 'jigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams sna dang bu su bregs te/ 
262b4(mdo): gos ngur srin gyod la sang dag par dad pas/ khyim nas khyim gyi/ par rab tu 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang chos 'di khon no dpa par bya ba'i phyir mgo 'am/ kos la me 'bar la bzhin bya brtson
262b5(mdo): 'grus brtsams shing gnas so// rigs kyi bu gal te don dam pa myed du 'anan/ tshangs par 'gyod pa don myed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga/ gas pa rnams 'byung ba yang don myed 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir don du
262b6(mdo): pa meng pas sa de'i phyir byang chub sem pa dang 'a rnams nangs pas mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigis kyi su chos bcu po dang / dang ldanas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drin ngas pa la mkhas pa sasu yina'o// 
262b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu ga bzhi na 'di lta ste/ chos rnams gsog nyid tu rab tu shes/ gsob nyid dang / 
262b8(mdo): snying po myed pa nyid dang / byig yo lta bu nyid dang // gzugs rnyan lta bu nyid dang / brag cha lta bu nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / myi gnas pa nyid dang / g.yo ba nyid dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid
263a1(mdo): tA// das sa smras 'ad/ na 'du / ga pan bskyed pa 'du stsa[।]/ 'di lta kAm/ 
263a2(mdo): d+ha na lta bu/ 'di ltar phrag cha lta bu/ 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu/ 'di snyam gyi gnas pa 'di ltar phyig so la/ 'di skar rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'thung pa yi ma sang 'di dag skye bar sdang po/ 
263a3(mdo): gnas pa dang 'dzi/ pa / rnam po/ dang / 'di sas/ yang 'dirnams skye ba'i nyin dgang das na/ sa 'a na sa pa'i man nga ni gang rnams panam
263a4(mdo): de dag 'di snyam du sems te// ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis chos de dag snyed// ma rig pa las byung ba'o// ma rig la na du 'gro ba'o// ma rig pa sa nyes pa'o// ma rig pa la brtanas
263a5(mdo): 'du byad rnams 'byung ba / 'du byed la btsun nas d+hags pa snang b.rang 'gyur ro// rnas pa shes pa yod na mying dang ga bags sa // par 'gyur ro// khyong dang ga zugs
263a6(mdo): du skyes med rngan rnams su 'dogs par 'gyur ro// skye mched rnaMs yod na rag las 'gyur ro// dag pa med na tshar pa snang bar 'gyur te/ tshong ba'i rgyas khyis pa zhes sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro// 
263a7(mdo): sred pa nyen na ldan pa 'dzin te// len pa bzung na srid pa 'i mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro// srid pa yang ma skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba yod nan par 'gyur ro// skyes bu gang zag zla ba'i chos can 'chin
263a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// shi ba la gnas pa 'i mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / oM yug dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di'i' ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta
263b1(mdo): bas na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spab bar nan tan bya'o// ma rig pa zhig pa dang / ma rig pa mkha nas 'byung ba dang / ma rin pa 'gag pa'i phyir nan tan bya'o// ma rig pa 'gag
263b2(mdo): pas ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis skyes pa// ma rig pa las byung ba// ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba// ma rig pa la rtend pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na srog gi
263b3(mdo): dbang po 'gags dang / dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gag pa na mya zhes pa la rtend pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// myi shes pa spangs
263b4(mdo): bas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mya 'byung ngo // 'gro ba rnam sa kyang myi 'byung ngo // 'khor rgyud rnams kyang 'gags pa ra 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// 
263b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpol rten cing 'brem par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos brgya dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa
263b6(mdo): bdag shes pa rnams yin no// 'argya gang zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di sa rdzi bad/ zas pa'i rigs su/ 'od te rgyas rigs sa// 'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ 
263b7(mdo): ci mardo zhing phyug po 'am/ 'on te/ dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sapa/ gang du skyes snyam kyi yongs rtogs te/ de la gal te rigs mtho zhing phyug par skyes na yang de la rigs kyis dregs
263b8(mdo): bar myi byed do// 'on te/ dpal zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur da na ya / bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las bdag gis sdom las 'dren mar byas nges so de snyam du seMs skyed cing
264a1(mdo): de rgyu des skyob sa pa yin no// skyob la par gyurd nas rab tu 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang bdag ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes yongasu rtog ste/ bdag ni rang gal nas gzhan dag kyang
264a2(mdo): bsgral bar bya'o// rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu byung ngo snyam nas// de de'i phyir le lo la myi rten cing snyom las myi byed de// de bdag rab tu byung nas// sdig pa myi dge ba
264a3(mdo): li chos gang dpagang nub cing yongasu zad de// kun byang bar gyur da ces yongs su rtog ste/ de sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos shig spongs par gyur dan de la dka' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa dag do// gang spangs
264a4(mdo): pa de dag ni spang pa'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do// de bdag ra/ tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang pa dang gang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa drang / rgya cher gyur da ces de snyam du yongasu rtog ste/ de'i dge ba'i
264a5(mdo): chos gang dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur pa de la dgal ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// gang de ltar ma gyu ra pa de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya che
264a6(mdo): bya ba'i phyir rgol zhing 'bad do// de tha ma la brten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyenang de dang / gan
264a7(mdo): des mkhan po nyung ngu thos pa 'am// mang du thos pa 'am/ shes pa 'am kyi shes pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i/ tshul khrims 'chal pa sa pa rung ste/ de la ston du pa'i 'du shes sbed do// de mi ltar ston pa la ngag/ 
264a8(mdo): zhing dad pa nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la yang byed do// de slob dpon rnams la ngom 'gro yod cing / rjes yod pa yin te 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la marnam na/ bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongasu ma jog
264b1(mdo): pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa rnams ni spangs par 'gyur ro// snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de dag la mkhan por 'du zhes skyed cing / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa 'thob pa dang / 
264b2(mdo): dge ba'i chos rnams sa de dag dang mthun pa gyod pa yin/ gyi dge bya'i chos rnams la gyi mthun par 'apyod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi sto pag pa nis yongs su rtog cing / de 'di snyed bdag ga ston dpa na
264b3(mdo): thams cad ma khyen pa// thams cad thugs su chung ba// 'jig rten thams cad la che ba/ zug rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas na/ lha rang kyi dang sbrus yin bya bcas pa'i 'di/ rten ga me pa
264b4(mdo): snyam ste/ de d+h+ya de dang / rkyed de dang / gshe des dgal ba dang // dad pa dang rangs bskyed do// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bangasags ston pa bcom ldan 'das de yin pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa
264b5(mdo): legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa 'i lam ka bcas pa de las kung bdag gis srog gi phyir yang 'dal bar gyi bya ste// de ltar na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim 'gro dang rjes su
264b6(mdo): 'brang ba byas par 'gyur ro snyam so// 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongasu khyod ces sems shing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang yul gyi myi nas
264b7(mdo): kyi bsod snyoms la yongasu spyod kyis// bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag ka bsod nams 'bras bu yod pa dang / don che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu
264b8(mdo): yod par yongs su pyod pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi myi 'di dag 'du shes mi pa ldan zhing / bdag la bsod snyoms gtong snyam zhing
