265a1(mdo): de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/ bram ze dab rgyal rigs dang / grong rdam gyi gyi dang / yul gyi gyi 'di dag ni bdag sa dge sbyong kyi 'du shes dang ldan/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang / 
265a2(mdo): ldan zhing 'dag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis// ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong kyi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang dge sbyong gyi yon tan dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan
265a3(mdo): rje mas yang dag par blangs te gdas par bya ba de lur dpyod snyam mo// de 'di snyam bu bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa'i skye ba'i 'khar pa las rgal bar gyur rad tam// zhes sems shing 'di snyam
265a4(mdo): bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o// bradag/ dge slong ga yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni rgol pa gnyis pa'o// bdag le lo myed cing chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ji nas kyang thog ma
265a5(mdo): dang tha ma myed pa'i skye ba'i 'khor pa las rgal ba 'gyur/ ba de ltar brtsod 'grus pa thams te gnas par bya'o// sgyum du sems te// rigs kyi bu de ltar yongasu rtog pa'i byang chub
265a6(mdo): sems dpa' ni bdag shes pa yin no// rigs kyi gru chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag zhes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi chu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten zhes pa
265a7(mdo): rnams yin no// brgya gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khyengs pa dgas dpa' ba rnams yin/ pa rgyal can dag la nga rgyal byed pa rnams yin// gya gya can dag la drang po rnams yin/ rdzun du smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams
265a8(mdo): kyimakhas pa dag la ldan par skal rnams yin/ thub pa dag la 'dzem par smra ba rnams yin/ khro ba dag la bzod 'a mang banas yin/ gam pa dgas byams pa'i bdag nyid ca na ma rnaM
265b1(mdo): sdug bsngal pa dag la snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ se sna can da/ la bgo lag byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin/ 
265b2(mdo): rten shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// brgya gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ skyon myed pa dang ma 'dres pad
265b3(mdo): bsra bsre myed pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin// sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin// dge ba'i rnam pa myi chung
265b4(mdo): pas dge ba'i mas ca chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos pa myed pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra/ nyedang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongasu spangs pa rnaMs yin/ 
265b5(mdo): nem nur myed pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa rnams yin/ sems le lo myed pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus pa rtsam rnam sa yin// sems myi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam rten phun
265b6(mdo): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rdo bas dbang po myi rtul pa rnams yin// gnod sems myong khri sas
265b7(mdo): dang ldan pas khyams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pa skye bar 'gyur
265b8(mdo): 'od te la la ma tshang yang ske bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las ma lang ba/ rigs kyi bu chos tshogs pa de dag las gang gi chos gcig cig spun myed cing ma 'dres la bsra bas myed / 
266a1(mdo): yongs su dag cing / yongs su khyang bar yongs su tshogs par gyur pa de la rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur bas// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de/ 
266a2(mdo): dag tshogs pas skye'i// mtshogs pas ni me yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// rigs kyi bu
266a3(mdo): chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mangs kyi dri mas mgos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa 'chos
266a4(mdo): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa 'bul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi sku gzugs chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
266a5(mdo): rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang / pha ma dag la lus rim 'gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang rlo ba dpon dag la lus kyi rimi 'gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa'i
266a6(mdo): mtshungs par 'apyod pa rnams lus kyi rim 'gro byed cing de yang zang zing byed pa'i phyir bgyis te/ zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin la dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems/ 
266a7(mdo): can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas bgos par skye bar gyur pa cig ces yongs su sngo zhing / de yang bas pa zag pa sems pa ste// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems da / 
266a8(mdo): mngal gyi dri mas mgos par skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rjes yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste nye bar lend pa byed/ 
266b1(mdo): pa rnams yin// 'du 'dzi myed par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnaMs yin// yul gyi nyes pas myi gos pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshes
266b2(mdo): pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim 'gro byed cing bathon pa dang shin tu bslabs pa rnams yini// gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha nganangon dang / mapa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngam ngon dag gis chog
266b3(mdo): shes pa rnams yin// srung zed dang / chos gos dang / yo byad ba thogs pa dang / bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'dzidad pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnaMs des skyob rjes yin// dben pa la dga' zhing rtag/ 
266b4(mdo): tu bsgom pa la ba rtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gan sa nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos brgya
266b5(mdo): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag padz+rayin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di ste lnga tshul 'chos po dang / khags ga/ garnyed pa dang bral ba rnaMs yin// gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral
266b6(mdo): ba rnams yi/ thob kyis 'jal pa'i snyed pa dang thal badzas yin/ phyi rigs par btsal ba'i rnying pa dang bral ba rnams yid/ chos ma yin pa'i steng pa dang pral ba rnams yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i ste
266b7(mdo): bdang bral pa rnams yin// rnyed pa la zhen pa byed pa rnams mam// rnyeng pa lachags pa byed 'arnams yid// yongs su kyi 'chang pa'i rang bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas so// shes pa rnam yin do// 
266b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir/ lus kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed/ 
267a1(mdo): ngag gis tshul 'chos pa myi byed/ sems kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed do// ji ltar na lus kyis/ 'chos pa myi byed pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag
267a2(mdo): po gang na/ khyod lam myi 'chos so// ji ltar sa pyod lam myi 'chos zhen// gnyi shing gang tsam d+hu lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgril byed par lta bas/ gos pa zhugs kyis dal nas 'dor zhing 'deg
267a3(mdo): ba ma yin te/ de ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos pa gyi byed do// ji ltar ra ngag gis tshul 'chos pa myi byed cen/ byang chub sems dpal ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom sbyangs shing smra ba ma yin
267a4(mdo): 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dga' bar smra ba ma yin/ rjes su 'brang ba'i cho ga brjod pa ma yin te/ de ltar ngag gyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed do// ji ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa
267a5(mdo): myi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs na tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing // sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no// 
267a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// tshig gis 'dod pa chung la// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dod pa 'di ni ning gyi gdung ba yin te// de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
267a7(mdo): tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na gzhogs slong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba la yin zhes/ byang chub sems dpal ni sbyin pa byed pa'am sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos gis yongs
267a8(mdo): so// bdag lhung bzed kyis 'phongs so// bdag na pa'i gso so sman kyis 'phongs so// zhes gzhog slongs myi byed cing / sbyin pa byed pa 'am// sbyin pa'i bdag po la myi slob zhing tshig tu myi brjod de/ de ltar na/ 
267b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpal gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar ma thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni smyon pa byed pa dang / sbyin padag mthong na/ 
267b2(mdo): bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gos dngos po che ge mo zhig khyon te/ des bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so// des kyang bdag la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya ste/ mang du thos
267b3(mdo): pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba'o// zhes 'di de pa 'di byon no// bdag gis kyang de la snying rje pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ spangs so zhes de skad kyi tshige myi brjod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis
267b4(mdo): 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bras ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' lus la chu byung
267b5(mdo): pa dang / sems la me byung bar rnyed pa chos pa ma yin no// de sa lus kyi mdo 'di lta ste rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang / kun tu rgyug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la 'gyod pa'o// 
267b6(mdo): sems kyi rme na 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smon pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gis rnyed pa dag la gnod pa ches meng pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa
267b7(mdo): dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yon zhe na// rigs kyi su 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu myed pa dang / gcal ba la sgyu myed pa dang / mod badzadan
267b8(mdo): pa la gnod par byed pa myed pa dang / g.yos rnyed pa myi sgrub pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sos dpal yongs mo dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bras / 
268a1(mdo): yin zhe na/ 'dis byang chub sems dpal gang mchod rten ga dang 'dres pa la/ chos kyi dang 'dres pa'i// dge 'dun go deng 'dres pa 'am/ ma byin pa'am/ ma gnang ba de dag myi khon ci bdag gir myi
268a2(mdo): byed chags pa'i sems kyi skyed do// de lta na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su pa dag pa'i rnyed pa dang thal ba yin no// ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpal rnyed pa la zhe pa myed pa yin zher// rigs kyi bu 'di sa byang chub sems
268a3(mdo): dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang bdag kir mye byed/ nor du myi byed// tshogs su myi byed cing / dus dus su dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / pha ma dang / mdza bo dang / blor po dang / gnyen pashes dang / snag ki gnyen 'tshags dka
268a4(mdo): gtong zhing dus dus su bdag kyang yongasu 'gyod la/ yongs su skyo/ dad pa'i tshe// chags pa myed pa dang zhend pa myed pa yongs su myod/ do rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang skyo ba'i sems myi skyed cing yongs su yi myi ched
268a5(mdo): de sbyin pa byed pa dang / sgyid khyed pa dang / sbyin padag rnams lam dad par 'dzind pa ma yin te/ de chos dang mthun par rnyed padage 'dun gyis rtogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/ 
268a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpalas smang pa// lhas bstod pa tshangs pa mtshungs par 'apyod pas kyi byabs chog myi zhes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal 'tsho ba yongasasu dag pa zhes yin no/ 
268a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yi yongasu myi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can kyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir/ 'khor ba da gnas pas yongs su myi skye'o// sems can
268a8(mdo): kyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kyis yongasu myi skyo'o// sems can kyi don rnams la yongasu myi skye'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongasu myi skye'o// seMs can gyi bya ba rnaMs la yongs su myi skye'o// 
268b1(mdo): gang bag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam gond pas yongs su mi skye'o// de dag lal dad par yang myi byed do// byang chub kyi chos yongasu bsdu bas kyang yongs su myi bya'o// byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs/ 
268b2(mdo): par bya bas kyang yongs su myi skyo'o// bsam pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gyi lta'i / byang chub la ga zhol// byang chub ya 'bab/ byang chub la bab pa rnaMs yin no// 
268b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' yid yongasu kyi skyo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs larjes kyi bkal bzhi byed pa nas
268b4(mdo): yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bag myed pa thams cad dang / bral zhing bag yod par 'apyod pa rnams yin// lus kyis shin tu sngams shing lus kyis ngan du pyad pa myi gyod pa nas yin/ ngag kri
268b5(mdo): shi nad tu bsdams shing dag gi ngan tu spyad pa rnams myi pyod pa yin/ yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du myang ba myi spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten pha rold kyis 'jigs shing // myi dge
268b6(mdo): ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin// rigs par smra zhing myi rigs pa thams cad dang bras pa rnaMs yin/ chos su smra zhing chos ma yin pa la spod pa rjes yin/ smad pa'i las rnam par spangs shing
268b7(mdo): dge ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun gyi 'byin zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dring ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs
268b8(mdo): su sbyang zhing sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams las srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan ma/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnam ma yin no// 
269a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer myed pa rnam ma yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste dbang ba zhin tu dang pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su nga/ 
269a2(mdo): pa rnams yan/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po dri mi myed pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongasu sbyang ba rnaMs yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin// bag la nyal pa dang bral ba rnams yin// 
269a3(mdo): kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin// pha ba dang 'dud par 'dzidid pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan da byang chub sems dpa' bzhin
269a4(mdo): 'dzum zhing khro gnyer byed pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsokhang pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i den ji lta bu lags pa bang
269a5(mdo): gyis ma 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpal rnams dbang po la ngas su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs paHmas dang bral bas na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags// bcom ldan
269a6(mdo): 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'jus pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnaMs dang bral bas ma khrog nyer
269a7(mdo): sred pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcug pa zhir 'di lta ste/ 'khor bani 'dod chags kyis des rab tu 'brer ba 'o nas
269a8(mdo): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi sems rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu zhes so// gti mug gi mes rab tu lugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin bye da
269b1(mdo): tu shes so// 'dus byas ni myi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni
269b2(mdo): stong phra'o zhes yang dag pa ji ste ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa'o zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga'
269b3(mdo): pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes ya dag
269b4(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de yang thos sha dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pas shes kyi/ sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i seMs
269b5(mdo): brtan pa nye bar gzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi don tu rtsol zhing 'bad la kha rtsom 'grus thom mo// rigs te bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
269b6(mdo): mang du thos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos ban+d+ha dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i
269b7(mdo): tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma ya dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cad bstand pa 'khrug par gyur da kyang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi smon ma mya ngan las 'das te/ ston
269b8(mdo): pa myed pa'i/ mdo sde rgya chen po de ni don che zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos thams cad kyim mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing / klog la kha ton byed cing / kun chub par byed pa dang
270a1(mdo): la yang brjod cing stond pa yang dag par ston cing gsal bar byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i ga pa zag rnams la dgal ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing / de dag la phan 'dog/ 
270a2(mdo): pa dang / zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la stonang par 'du shes pa dang / dam pa'i chos la btud cing 'du shes pa dang / bcud kyi le nad du
270a3(mdo): 'duzhes pa dang / rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang srog la gyi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongasu rdol ba dang / btsal nas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
270a4(mdo): na byang chub sems dpal dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chubade sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// brgya
270a5(mdo): gang zhe na 'di ste ste/ lus mtshan gyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa na mas yin no// lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rna mas yin// dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhin
270a6(mdo): shind tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su bstan pa rnaMs yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin// de bzhin
270a7(mdo): gshegs pas thugs su chud pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa rnaMs yin// 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal ba yongs spong ba rjes yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul sa shin du bslabs pa rnaMs yin// tshangs pa'i gnas
270a8(mdo): rjes la shind tu mthar phyind pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin to// rigs kyi bu chos brgya po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
270b1(mdo): sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po 'i sras rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal brgya byin dang tshangs pa dpa'ajig rten skyong bas bsu brnaMs yin no// brgya gang
270b2(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste// byang chub las myi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis myi skul ba rnaMs yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las myi g.yo ba rnams yin// chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs
270b3(mdo): pa rnams yon/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa nas yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnaMs yin/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 
270b4(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/ pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'a/ gas pa rjes yin// myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa nas
270b5(mdo): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ bya chub sems dpal brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsdu ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang / 
270b6(mdo): ldan na byang chub sems dpal bas pa dang bag la nyal shes pa rnams yo no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can 'dod chags kyi bsapa pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// zhe
270b7(mdo): sde gyi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dam pa'i bsam pa can dang / bar ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhan pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bas pa can dang / brta pa'i bas brtan/ 
270b8(mdo): dang / yun ring po'i nges pa can dang / sems cad gtum kha'i bas pa can kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / de yang sems can gcig tu ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gi khaMs
271a1(mdo): kun la 'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dpabag nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// rigs
271a2(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su spyod par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnaMs yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i
271a3(mdo): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ rang sangs
271a4(mdo): rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i seMs can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs/ brgya byin gyi gzugs
271a5(mdo): kyis 'dus pa'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi gzug bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs// tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i
271a6(mdo): sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams sa khram ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul pa'i sems can rnams la rgyal
271a7(mdo): rigs kyi gzugs// khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems cad rnaMs la khyim bdag kyi rigs nye bar stond te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ba gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul ba 'gyur/ 
271a8(mdo): pa'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub seMs dpa' rnams nye par sterang to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub seMs dpa' sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i chog shes pa rnaMs yin no// 
271b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' des rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnaMs yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin
271b2(mdo): gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa rjes yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnaMs yin/ byi blang ba'i seMs dang ldan pa rnams yin// 
271b3(mdo): grub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnaMs yin/ nges pa phum sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal nges pa rnaMs yin no// rig
271b4(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lta pa yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams / 
271b5(mdo): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// cho ga phun su tshogs pa rnams yin// tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod yul tu phyid brjes yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par pyod pa rjes mi
271b6(mdo): khong yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs pam 'apyod pas brjed pa rnams yin/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams yin/ l-i cig tu zhugs pa rnams yin// ston pa gzhan myed pa rnams yin te/ 
271b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal bsdu ba'i dngos po myed pa la ma
271b8(mdo): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / myi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan par smra ba dang / don tu smra ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / 
272a1(mdo): rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing kyis don tu mthun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i
272a2(mdo): sbyin pa ni gang zang zing sbyin pa'o// myi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang gi lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o// phan par smra ba ni gang dge ba'i khya ba bstan pa'o// don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// chos su spro ba ni gong dpan
272a3(mdo): gshegs pa'i bstand pa dang / mthun par chos bstan pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni ga pa yang dag par chud myi gson pa'o// don bya ba ni gang myi dge ba'i gnas nas bsrang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o// zang zing / 
272a4(mdo): gyis don mthun pa ni gang bza ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa/ dang / btung ba dang / bzhib pa dang / ko sa la las tshogs pa thun mong du yongasu spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pa
272a5(mdo): ni gang gze dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du bya dang / dung dang man shel dang / bye mu dang / sa ye sbram dang / rdul dang / rta dang / blang po che dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa thun mong du pyod pa yin no// rigs
272a6(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po sa mkhas pa rnams yiran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' tshus tu shis pa rnams yin no// bcug pa ni/ 
272a7(mdo): ma 'di lte ste/ khyod sam rab tu zhi ba rnaMs yin/ khyod la mi rgyu byed pa rnams yin/ s+yo la yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bstan dgal ba rnams yin// blta bas chog myi zhes pa rnam yin/ blta na 'jas pa rdos/ 
272a8(mdo): yone/ bltan sems can thams cad khong khro ba myed par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dpabar 'gyur ba rna
272b1(mdo): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shis pa dzas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan ma byang chub sems dpa' gnas bam pa rjes yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
272b2(mdo): sems can thams cad nyan mongs pa'i 'ati/ sa za dag pas yongs su srung ba rnams / 'khor pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyamatsholas sgrol pa rnam par/ 'gon byed brna
272b3(mdo): la gnyen tu gyu rang pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nid kyis nang par gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin/ rked med pa dag la nyes rnams yid// gnas byed pa pa/ gdas rnamasas do// 
272b4(mdo): bas smras rnams pam/ gling khyed pa dag kris rnams so/ zung ga nyid byed ba sa nga nyid nas pa / rigs kyi thu chos de dag dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bas pa rnams
272b5(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal gyi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// bcug zhe na 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe rar rmi'o rgyal po'i shing
272b6(mdo): chen po bltan bzang po zhes bya ba ni mkhas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho// sdong po dang / yal ka rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnaMs dang / 'bras bu rnaMs dang / mthong ba dang bsnams pa dang
272b7(mdo): myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs pa snga tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyur da pa'i
272b8(mdo): sems can rnams/ sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bcon 'grus dang / bas gtan dang / shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen
273a1(mdo): bkur byas nas kyang nye bar gyur pa yon no// rigs kyi thums bcu po dag/ dang lnga das// byang chub sems dpa' pa'i rgyas tha ma shing chen po sa bu rnams yi do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan/ 
273a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpal bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nang pa rnams la gyi sbyor ba dang / sems
273a3(mdo): can bkres pa dang / skom pas nyes pa rnams la zas dang sgob kyi sbyid pa dang / rlung dang / lpags pa dang / nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can dzas la dag pa byin pa dang / 'kham po dang slob dpon rnaMs la gus
273a4(mdo): rim 'gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par 'apyod pa rnams/ la gus par smra/ phyag 'tshal/ thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par byed/ pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / phrug lag kho ba dang // skyed mos
273a5(mdo): tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bapa pa gtong ba dang / bram po dang / bran mo dang / las kyi zho gas 'tsho ba la 'go pags yongasu spyong ba dang / dus dus
273a6(mdo): su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpal bsod snyoms bya ba la brtsod pa rnams yin no// rig+sa/ 
273a7(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongasu 'dri'o// sangs
273a8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu mar yab de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas myi g.yos// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin
273b1(mdo): gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas
273b2(mdo): kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma ma yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim 'gror byed/ bkur sti byed/ sti bstang byed/ mchod pa
273b3(mdo): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang myi g.yol// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang myi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
273b4(mdo): du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar snang // // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myi g.yo la/ sangs rgyasakyi na'i du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs
273b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myig yol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi / du ma yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang myi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhe
273b6(mdo): du mar yang sems can 'dul pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sprasad pa 'gyed kyang / de dag 'phrul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe rtog pa myed cing / rnam par rtog pa myed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
273b7(mdo): cad rnam par semed pas gsoyang pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa 'gyed na/ myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsal pa/ 
273b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir depe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla 'i gling bzhi sdang bar byed cing / sems can rnams la phar 'dogs pa yin yang / nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag gis snang / 
274a1(mdo): par bya'o// bdag cag na sems can la yan 'dogs pa'o// nis gyi tog rnam pa ma rtog yod kyi/ 'on kyang sngom gyisas kyi rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du byed pas zla ba dang nyis
274a2(mdo): gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpalas bstsal pa 'gyed na/ mye tog rnam par myi rtogs/ bsgrib pa 'am/ mngon par 'du bya ba myi byed do// 
274a3(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi mas kyi rnam par smin pas// mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir te/ sngod byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa myod pa'i
274a4(mdo): de michis kyang rnam par rtog pa myed par yang phrul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ de ste de ltar smon lam bta'/ de lta de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dang / 
274a5(mdo): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yul pas mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' myur du blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
274a6(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams ya no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa sha ring tu grub pase// sbyin bzhi nang tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// tshul khrims shin tu grub cing / rgya
274a7(mdo): khrims kyi phung po skyon byed pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / bsra bsre myed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa yongs su dag pa// yongasu byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khrims mi
274a8(mdo): tu phun sum tshogs pa dzas pa'i/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / brtsod 'grus shin tu phun su tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / shes rab nin
274b1(mdo): tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zabs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun su tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shi nad tu blam
274b2(mdo): ci thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i b.ragyi
274b3(mdo): se shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas/ ye shes shi nang tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du blan myed pa yang dag par rdzog 'i byang chub tu
274b4(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe// stong gsum kaM stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'khru
274b5(mdo): te/ rab tu g.yos par gyu rad to// stong gsum go stong go stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab dag kam/ r-i ba tang zung chen po dag kam/ khor yug gi mo'im/ 
274b6(mdo): khor yug ga ro chen po dgag sa/ de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ro dang / ri nag po chen po de dag thams cad kyang yul gsagal ba dang / ga ya mgo'i rog la pa de sogs su bcom ldan 'das la chos dka' ba
274b7(mdo): bya ba'i phyi'i 'dud par gyur da to// gang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di dag da me tog gzhong ngam/ 'bras bu'i zhing das/ spos kyi shi ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'dra
274b8(mdo): la chos kyi dgala' bya ba'i tshorags man rigs pa de sogs su 'dud pam gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chas kyi dga' pa 'phrul 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thag
275a1(mdo): kyang / na bas dang rgyad kyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ma btsam byas par gyur to// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / 
275a2(mdo): sbyar ba byas te/ 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dar pa dang / mar dar ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu brgya stong sum yang nam mkha'i dkyis gnas te gos g.yo ba tsa mo dang / gan bar+g+ha
275a3(mdo): stong byed par gyur te/ kwa'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor 'thar bar gyur cing / kye ma'o dong de 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par gyur to// kye ma chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bsgo tan
275a4(mdo): sems can gang kau rje lam na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sreg par gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs padzas la dge ba'i ma bzhin tu bsngags pa yin
275a5(mdo): no// gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta spos kyang ci dgos shes de skad du brjod do// lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la chos kyi dga' ba bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar
275a6(mdo): sge'ur 'ur 'byin sgrog par byed/ shin tu sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi 'i tshogs mngon par sprul te// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams dang / ka ya 'goli ri la spos kyi chu'i char yang mngon par 'bebs
275a7(mdo): kyang / sems cad rnams la gnod par myi sdang ngo po// klu'i bu mo brgya stong dum yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu'i sgra dang rol mo'i sgra 'byidad par gyur to// dri me dang phyi'am chi brgya stong byam yang snyad cing za' bar
275a8(mdo): dbyangs kyis kyu len cing / gas mgo' yodang / stong gsum go stang chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams la sgom pa byed par gyur to// gnod sbyin bye sa brgya stong dus yang pang sa'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// 
275b1(mdo): bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi gyi dang / yul kyi myi brgya stong du ma yang me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na pa pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
275b2(mdo): pa dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dka nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dga' ba bya ba'i phyir/ so so'i sprin 'tshams kyi mdzod / 
275b3(mdo): dag nas 'od zer mang po le bye bar gyurd te/ 'od gzer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/ gzugs sna tshogs/ snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag ste/ de 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / 
275b4(mdo): leb rgan dang / shes dang / rdul gi kha dog dang / de dag stong ga/ sum ka stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams 'dis skor ba byed/ ning mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur da te/ 'gro
275b5(mdo): nas g.ya 'go'i ro la bskor ba byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyu rang to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi
275b6(mdo): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// srog chags kyi/ 
275b7(mdo): pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang chos rnams la chos kyi myog rdul myed cing dri ma myed par bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngon cud seMs ma bskyed pa la
275b8(mdo): byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo gyi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas 'khom dang bcas te// 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dun
276a1(mdo): pa las/ de stan las langs nas bdag gi gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas phyir bcom ldan 'das kyisakyar sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti
276a2(mdo): byas/ btsun par byas/ da mor byas/ mchod par byas/ stibastang byas/ rim 'gror byas so// bkur sti dang / btsun pa dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / sti bstang dang / ri grong byas nas
276a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la g.ya mgo'i ro 'o nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu pa gnyis kyis// 
276a4(mdo): don 'di nyid de dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang / yo ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// batsho ma ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la dpa// myi 'chi ba de ltar khyod tu
276a5(mdo): dkon mchog 'byung ba 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob po// de nas 'khor der tshe gas pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ 
276a6(mdo): lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la// de stod kyi dri bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'dis bud khyed kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sos dpa
276a7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par selang pas/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog la sems kyis yongasu shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
276a8(mdo): ldan 'das de lta ma lha mo mya 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thos la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkum bgyis na/ bud byed kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyug/ 
276b1(mdo): lags rkyend kang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa lad pa// rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don na rgyu'o// sems can gyi don no rkyend to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo gyi 'chin
276b2(mdo): ni rnam par ma rad pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pa la gnas pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthuche ba ste/ rigs kyi bu sa po gyi 'phriga'i gang yang dag par sa rang du brgyang pa dang / gzang bstong pa dang / byang chub tu
276b3(mdo): sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo s+ye'i chi ba'i rdzu 'phrul che ba// mthu che ba ste/ 
276b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu lnga po bya'i chi ba ni skal ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas/ rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzog
276b5(mdo): par sangs rgyas nas kyang mya'ichi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gan gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mye 'chi ba
276b6(mdo): la bkal saHlad pa/ rtswa 'chi ba khyod kyis rang kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sto dad cig/ de nas lha mo gyi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su dang pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
276b7(mdo): gyur te/ lham myo 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su stonang pa'i ting nge 'dzidzid de la snyoms par zhugs ma lag tu de'i tshe stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten pa khams 'di lag 'tshal sna ru
276b8(mdo): mnyam zhing / bye du rtsa'i bzhir snang bar gyur te// mi nag po myed cing shing thams pa byed la// gnas gnas dag ma ya dpag bsams kyi zhing sa stag snang bar gyur to// gnas gnas dag na chu
277a1(mdo): myig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su ga pa dag snang bar gyur to// myi phal pa myed par sdang bar gyur to// de na bud byed kyis
277a2(mdo): myi grag par gyur to// gnas dag gnas dag na pad ma'i shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag snang bar gyur da to// pad ma de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung 'khod pa sha stag snang bar/ 
277a3(mdo): gyu rang to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'chi ba de yab byang chub sems dpa' de dag lo chos sbyor bar snang ste/ brgya byin dang /

277a6(mdo): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' slob pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs
277a7(mdo): 'di nyan tam/ 'dzind dam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kum chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dag/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dge bar stodang par bgyid na/ de 'bod nams kyi zhig skyed par gyur
277a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa thas pa/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis// stong gsum gi steng ched pa'i 'jig rten gi khams su rdzogs pa'i sems can rnams la spyod pa lkug par phyin te// 
277b1(mdo): de ltar sbyin pas skal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas// rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris pa legs par zhus te/ sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na// 
277b2(mdo): de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gyi skyon pa ni phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ med/ rigs kyi
277b3(mdo): pu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gyi// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ron nam yang myi myong ste/ 'jig rten pa ni me yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las
277b4(mdo): stong gsum ga stong chen pola'ajig rten gi/ khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la/ bkod pa las// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam
277b5(mdo): 'dzind tam/ 'chang ngam// klog gam/ kun chub par byedam gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di ches bsro de nams mang du skyed ngo do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag
277b6(mdo): ba ban+d+ha'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi phu gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyund tu zhugs pa dang / lan/ 
277b7(mdo): cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkang ba byas/ gang chas kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngas/ sreg gsaH/ kun chub par byed dam
277b8(mdo): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la brten na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnaMs snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyi
278a1(mdo): 'di la brten na byang chub sems dpal rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la brten na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rdo grangs/

282b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sna tshogs rnam mngal// rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgrib pa myed par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dpung byed byang chub rab tu zhi reg 'gyur ro zhes// 
283a1(mdo): rgyal sras bsod snyoms byas la lung stond pa/ par snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'o 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag/ nam mkha'i ngos la 'dug cing seMs
283a2(mdo): dpa'ang/ nyon mongs rgyal ba rgyal ba sab la stonapar snang 'di la deng 'dug bdag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag// dga' ldan gnas nas dpag myed shi 'phos nas/ 
283a3(mdo): ba'i tho nas tha ma'i mngal 'jug pa// bar snang 'di ni deng 'dug bdag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpal dag/ ma'i g.yas logs rus sa gnas gyur te/ lha yis rab tu mdzod
283a4(mdo): cing 'byung ba dag/ bar snang 'di ni deng 'dug bdag gis mtho nga // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter byang chub sems dpa' dag/ 'du dkyi sde dang dpung rnams pas byas nas// byang chub sems dpal
283a5(mdo): bla khyed byang chub reke/ bar snang 'di na des 'dug padag gi sa mthong / 'jig rten 'gon po'i phyogs bcu'i 'dzi/ rten na/ sel chus 'dab zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ yang byung / 
283a6(mdo): rab tu ngan yong 'dal ba// bco sdang 'din dang 'dug bdag gos mthong / stobs bcu myi dbang khyod kyi ga bi brjid kyis/ 'jig rten mni sgrib pa gang yang byed/ rgyal pa tshad myed zhing yang / 
283a7(mdo): de bzhin te/ thogs pa byed par nam mkha' 'di nas mthong / ji ltar myi dag rmyilas 'dod 'apyod dang / sos ka/ ji ltar sbyin/ rgya 'byung ba dang / la las chu nang zla ba mthong ba bzhin// zhing dang / 
283a8(mdo): sangs rgyas de dag bdag gis mthong / ka rtse bdag gis sangs rgyas zhing yongs dge/ de tshe sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes tho ba/ sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i tshe/ den phyi dpang byang chu
283b1(mdo): bdag yung bstan// 'gro ba thams cad brag ma 'dra ba ste/ skye bo mkhas pa dag la myi smras so// de ring mgon po khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ chos kyi myong yang yang dag nyid kyang rtogs// 
283b2(mdo): dan sgo'i mya nganam grol myod pas/ mtshungs myed pasas pas sangs rgyas zhing yang dag/ rgyal 'tshang spyod de bzhin zhing rnams na/ myi dpa pag migs shing bzhugs pa ngas mthong ngo // 'jam dpal de lta bsas
283b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib myed pa'i rnam par thard pa la bslab par bya'o// sgrib pa myed pa'i rlom par thard pa la myod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
283b4(mdo): po ni rnam par tha rad par yang myo 'dzi ni dang / 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa myed par yang myi 'dzind/ slob par yang myi 'dzin da/ 'di na slob pa myed ces kyang mya 'dzin / byang chub sems dpa' ma
283b5(mdo): par myi 'dzin / byang chub sems dpa' 'din myed par sa pamyi 'dzin da/ yod pa myed par yang myi 'dzind/ pyod pa 'do na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myed
283b6(mdo): bar yang bya 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'o zhes kyang myi'odzi nad// dpag tu myed po myed khor yang myi 'dzin dang / dpag tu myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzi dang / grangs myed pa myed par yang
283b7(mdo): myi 'dzin / grangs myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzinid/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa myed yung myi 'dzid/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin pa/ mtshungs pa myed par yang myi 'dzin
283b8(mdo): mtshungs pa myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ gzha du myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin // gzhal du myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / brjod du myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin / brjod du
284a1(mdo): myed pa 'dina'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin rto// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig gnyid log pa'i tshulam cu/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas kun tu myod// skyilas kyi sgo de yang byis pa'i rang
284a2(mdo): bzhin chams yin// blun po'i rapa bzhin can ma yin gyi mkhas pa rtogs pas/ shes rab dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin cam te/ nyal ba sad nas 'dod pa'i yon tan myed par yang myi 'dzind/ 'dod pa'i
284a3(mdo): yom tan 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba myed par yang myi 'dzi da/ 'dod pa dga' ba myed pa 'do na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rdo bar
284a4(mdo): tha rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rna bar thard ba myed par yang myi 'dzinang / rnam par thard pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzi dang to// de bzhin du sbyar te brjod du
284a5(mdo): myed pa byed par yang myi 'dzin da// brjod du myed pa 'ang/ na'o zhes mya 'dzind pa'i bar du/ 'jam dpal 'di ste/ ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam// sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma
284a6(mdo): mkhas pas/ skye bo phal po che'i mdun tu spyan sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs so// shing rta'i tshogs sam// dpung bu chung gi tshogs bstan la/ de la myi byis
284a7(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin rnam ma yin pa// zung po'i rang bzhin nan ma yin pa mkhas pa rtogs pa// bye brag byed pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can de dag/ gis de mthong na// klung po che chos/ 
284a8(mdo): myed par yang gyi 'dzid/ glang po che'i tshogs 'di'o'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzin / rta'i tshogs byed par yang myi 'dzin da/ rta'i tshigs 'disa'o zhes kyang gyi mdzin / shing rta'i tshogs byed par/ 
284b1(mdo): yang mya'i'adzin pa / shing rta 'tshogs 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / dpung bu chung ga tshogs myed par yang kyi 'dzinid/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs 'dira'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin da/ sgyum byed hA/ 
284b2(mdo): yang myi 'dzin dang / sgyu ma 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib myed pa'i rnam par thar pa la 'byod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par/ 
284b3(mdo): tha rad par myi 'dzin dang / rnam par tha rad pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjod du myed par gyi 'dzin / brjod du myed pa 'di ni'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa'i bar du'o// / 
284b4(mdo): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ram zang zhing sprin myed dpa'i nam mkha' las mtsho'i chu shin du dang pa'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gi gzugs rnya byung ba de la rtsig pa dag sa
284b5(mdo): byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa// blun pa'i rang bzhin na ma yin pa/ mkhas pa bye brag phyed pa shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis de mthong na zla ba li dkyil la
284b6(mdo): myed par myi 'dzind/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di na'o zhes kyang gyi 'dzidang / gzugs rten byed par yang gyi 'dzind// gzugs rnyan 'di ni'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal sgrib pa/ 
284b7(mdo): byed pa'i rnam par thar pal 'gyor pa'i byang bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen yang ne batha rad pa myed par yang myi 'dzin/ rnam pa mtha rad pa 'dir 'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
284b8(mdo): brjod du myed par yang myi 'dzi ning / brjod du byed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzi rang / yang dag par 'grub pa byed par yang myi 'dzin da/ yang dag par 'grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin pa'i bar du'o// 
285a1(mdo): 'jas dpas 'di lta ste dper na/ sos ka'i zla ba'i mam / rnam pang zhing srin skyed pa'idam mkha' la snyig tu zhing gso bskyed pa de la gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin nas yin pa/ thun pa'i na/ 
285a2(mdo): bzhin can ma yin pa 'khas pa rtogs pa bye ba// byed pa// shes rab kyi ring bzhin cad de dag gis des yong na/ smin rgyu ba myed pa ya gyi 'dzid/ smig rgyu ba 'dis po zhes kyang gyi 'di ring / gso ba myed na/ 
285a3(mdo): yang myi 'dzin dang/ g.yo ba 'di na'o zhes kyang myi'adzi nad pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thard pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dpyod pa myed par gyi 'dzin
285a4(mdo): pyod pa 'di na'o zhes kyang phyi 'dzind/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed par yang myi 'dzid/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / dpag tu myed par yang myi 'dzin da// dpag tu myed pa 'din
285a5(mdo): 'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin da/ grangs myed par yang mya'i rje nad grangs myed pa 'di ni zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ bsam gyis myi/ khyab pa myed par yang myi 'dzi nad/ bas gyis myi khyab pa 'di
285a6(mdo): na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ mtshungs pa myed par yang myi 'dzin pa/ mtshungs pa myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin pa/ gzhal du myed par yong myi 'dzi dang / gzhal du myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzi dang / 
285a7(mdo): brjod du byed par yang phyi 'dzind/ brjod du myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ yong su dag pa myed par yang myi 'dzid/ yongasu dag pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind// yang dag par grub pa yang myi 'dzin
285a8(mdo): yang dag par grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin myed cing sprin dang bral te/ namathang ba'i nam mkha'i dkyil nas sprin byung bas nam mkhal thas cad g.yog/ 
285a9(mdo): ba de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi myos mthong na// sprin gi dkyil 'khor myed par yang myi 'dzi nad// sprin kyo dkyil 'khor 'di na lo zhes kyang myi 'dzin // kun khebs par yang myi 'dzind// kun khyebs/ 
285b1(mdo): bA 'drin mo zhes kyang gyi 'dza dad pa// de bzhin bya/ 'jas rapa sa smra ba byed pa'i rnas pa yarang ba la med pa'i byang rgyab sems dpa' sasus dpa ched po sang ngas par bar byed pa
285b2(mdo): kyi 'dzid/ rnam par ma dang pa 'di ra'o zhes kyang myi 'dzid/ sgrib pa myed pa byed par yang byi'i 'did/ sgrib pa myed pa 'dina'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzi dang / byang chub sems dpa' byed pas myi dzi
285b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ khyod pa myed par myi 'dzind/ gyod pa 'dira'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong myed par yang myi 'dzind/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
285b4(mdo): 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ dpag tu myed par yang myi 'dzind/ dpag tu myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin da/ grangs myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin da/ grangs myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang
285b5(mdo): gyi 'dzind/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa myed par yang myi dzin/ bas gyis myi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin/ mtshu/ nges pa myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzind/ mtshungs pa myed
285b6(mdo): pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ gzhal du myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzi nad/ gzhal du myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ brjod du myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin pa/ brjod du myed pa 'di na'o/ 
285b7(mdo): zhes kyang myi 'dzin da/ yongs su dag pa myed par myi 'dzin/ yongs su dag pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ yang dag par 'grub pa myed pa yang myi 'dzin/ yang dag par 'grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang
285b8(mdo): mya 'dzind to// 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rje bar tha rad ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos co bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa yongasu dag par 'gyur ram/ 
286a1(mdo): zhes sems la myi bya ste/ 'od kyang sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thar dpal spyor pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu byed pa sgrib kyi dgos par yong su dag par
286a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa la gyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi 'o grangs myed pa yong su dag par 'gyur ram// de bzhin du sbyar te// ci sangs rgyas kyi
286a3(mdo): zhing brjod du myed pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram snyam du sems la myi bya ste// 'on kyang sgrib myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa/ 
286a4(mdo): bsgrim mya dgos khar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzho nu dper na/ nam nangs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ ci nyi ma 'char ram snyam du sems la myi bya'o// 'on kyang nam nangs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bsgrim gyi
286a5(mdo): dgos par nyi ma 'cham pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha ra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos ji ltar bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa yongs
286a6(mdo): su dag par 'gyur snyam du sems la gyi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa la myod pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa nas brjod du byed pa'i bar d+ha/ 
286a7(mdo): bsgom myi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la pyod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi dpag tu myed pa yongasu dag go// 
286a8(mdo): sangs rgyas zhing grangs myed pa dang / bas kyis myi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / gzhal tu byed pa dang / brjod du myed pa yongasu dag go// de skad ces bkal sa \u0f7fsang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dzad pa la
286b1(mdo): gzhon nur gyu rang bas 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de 'i sangs rgyas kyi don mi cos chu rgya ches mongs/ 
286b2(mdo): su dag lags/ de skad ces gsoyong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lajas dpal gzhon nur gyur pal 'di skad ces bkalas sang to// 'jam dpas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkra bcom
286b3(mdo): za yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji tsam du rgya cher yongasu dag pa ni tshig gis go khar sla ba ma yin no// gsol dpe bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi ma rung lags
286b4(mdo): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yad pa// 'jas dang / rung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi/ 
286b5(mdo): khams grong khyer cog tu gyur da pa 'di lta ste/ phye'i phye ma'irnam pa gzhan gise gang ba bzhin du yungs kar gyis gang ba/ ra gyur da te/ mya la la zhig gis yungs kar de rdul phra rab
286b6(mdo): tu btags nas yungs 'bru re re yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi pa kyi rdul du byas la/ des rdul phra rab de dag phrag pa la thogs nas shar phyogs su song ste/ gom pa
286b7(mdo): bor bas/ 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i bye ma snyed 'das la/ gom pa 'dor ba 'ang 'dra ba dang ldan zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan te/ gos pa 'a
286b8(mdo): pa de lta bu dang mgyogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pas skal pa gang ka'i klub kyi bye ma snyed du song zhing / rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig bor la de lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdus phra rab kyi rdul de zas cad
287a1(mdo): bar te de bzhin tu sgo dang / nub dang thang dang / phyogs 'tshams rnams su de snyed sa za ba rgyas bor zhib de bzhin du ste dang / 'ogs phyogs su yang dus pa rab kyi rnas de byed / 
287a2(mdo): na 'jam dpas de dza snyam d+ha sems// Angs kar ka hrIs tharab kyi rjes gang du bar ba dang / mkhor ba'i 'dzi ti a m+b+ha gang ya / gas ma / ma ldan 'das rgyas thar
287a3(mdo): 'jig rten pa khams don kyang lags kyim bar ba den ches yang lags so// bka' sa ya pa/ 'jas dpal 'jig rten gi khabs rgyas phra rab kyi rdul khor ba des/ kAng rgyam tho ba'i 'jog rten no/

287a5(mdo): yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi d+hum phra rab kyi rdul du byas te/ des rdul za rab tu rdul de dag thams cad phrag pa la sogs nas/ shar phyogs su song sa
287a6(mdo): gom pa gcig bor bas 'jig rten ga khrims gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dra zhing 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pa de ltar bu'i gom pa 'dor zhing / de lta bu'i megyo/ 
287a7(mdo): pas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par song ste/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshig bor zhing de lta bu'i tshul gyis// shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la// de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdus phra rab kyi rdus de snyed 'dor lI/ 
287a8(mdo): nub dang / byang dang / shar dang / zhar lho dang / lho nu ba dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams re rer rdus phra rab de snyed bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ 
287b1(mdo): gang du rdul phra ra ba de dag bor ba dang / ka bdul bor ba'i 'jig rten gi khams gang sang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga du rdul phra rab de dag por ni nyung lags kyi/ ma bor ba'i 'jig rten/ 
287b2(mdo): gi khams de ni ches mang lags so// bkalas na lad pa// 'jam dpal 'dzag rten gi khams gang du rdus phra rab bor ba dang / gang du mkhor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer cig tu gyur da ya/ 'di lta ste/ 
287b3(mdo): phyes phye ma'i rngam la gzhag gse gangab bzhin du sungs kar gis gang sa myal la zhig gas yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pade snyed kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdus byas te/ des phra rab thams cad 'phran

287b6(mdo): shar phyogs su rdul phra rab dethams cadra bo mas/ de bzhin du blo phyogs su rdul phra rab de snyed bor zhing chu ba dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang kyi mtshams dang / steng dang /

287b8(mdo): ldan 'das gang rdus par 'khor ba ni nyung lags kyi// ma khor la na chos mang lags so// bka' sa pa 'dzid pal 'jig rteg gi chos gang du tshul tha rab zer ba dang / gang dul sngo po de dag kyis pa grong khyer cig tu
288a1(mdo): gyur nas/ yungs kar gis ga ba ma ji ltar sngar dpe bstan pa de bzhin bya ba/ rgyas par byas te stong graka suM bcur bsgyur pa/ 'jam dpal thams cad kyi tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po bzhag pa de snyed kyi 'jig
288a2(mdo): rten gi khams rab 'byam gyi rgyu ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub kyi shing kyi rgya yang de tsam mo// byang chub kyi shing de ni rin po
288a3(mdo): che sna bdun te/ 'bras bu yi yi bzhis gyi nor bu'o// byang chub kyi zhing de'i lal gan rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yod do// yal gcig cig yang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yal ka bre'u yong / yal ga the'u cig/ 
288a4(mdo): ning yang rdza ma'i rmyil phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'bras bu yod do// 'bras bu re re la yang cha shas ni dpag tu myed do// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad
288a5(mdo): grub pa'i legs pa khyang ba'i 'bras bu grub pa ste/ de ni myig yongasu ma spangs pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi myig lam du snang bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di ste steng dben
288a6(mdo): bar ska kyi gnod sbyin nas kyi gzhal byed khang dag kyi rnams kyi phyog yang sdang bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi zhing de yang myog/ yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i mas can rnams kyi phyog lam tu
288a7(mdo): snang bar gyi 'gyur ro// 'jas dpas byang chub kyi shing de la sems cad rjes myi thogs par 'gro ste/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper ra bam sdang gyi gnod sbyin dag ka gzhas byed khang nams la gyilom/ 
288a8(mdo): par 'gro ba de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing des sems can rnams myi thogs par 'gro ste/ byang chub kyi zhing gang de yang yongasu dag pa'i las dang ldan pa'i sos can rnams kyi rnam par spyo/ 
288b1(mdo): bas yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro// 'jas dpas yang de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten pa khams ni shar phyogs su ya pa tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed yongs
288b2(mdo): su dag go// lhor yang de snyed nub du yang de snyed byang du yang de snyed/ shar sgor yang de snyed/ lho nub tu yang de snyed// nub byang du yang de snyed/ byang shar du yang de snyed// steng dang 'og go phyogs su yang de snyed/ 
288b3(mdo): kyi 'jig rten gi las su dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag go// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thar pa pa la brten na de brgyar bsgrags pa snyed du rab kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag go// 'dzad pa sa
288b4(mdo): byang chub kyi nang de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / sme ba dang so/ dang 'gas pa dang / kun gyi 'chad cing bar klubs myed de/ da pal 'di lta ste dper na/ byis po lnga brgyams zer
288b5(mdo): khrig / 'dun pa'i rgyun gyi'i chad tsa pas snrubs byedabazhin nu/ 'jas dpas byang chub kyi gong de'i 'bras na ba dang / spyi ba dang / smid pa dang / 'gas pa yang snun
288b6(mdo): da cing bamam pas med do// 'jam dpasa' 'dis ste/ de ya ca kyi 'thurags pa 'bab pa'i che/ tshul rgya'i rgya bus bci 'byung / kha cig 'jig pargyan gyi ci par skabs byed pa de bzhin sum
288b7(mdo): bu de dag 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / rgyal ba dang / 'gas pa yang rgyun myi ched cing bar skabs byed do// 'bras bugs pa de'i tshe shas cig las kyang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub seMs dpa' 'byung ste/ 
288b8(mdo): mtshan sum cu \u0f7fgnyis dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po brgya cus brgyan pa// sred byed kyi bu ltar lus mkhregs pa// sring pa tham par gyur da ba'i seMs can 'jig rten gi khams brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas
289a1(mdo): kyi zhong tshad myed par yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i bar du ste de dag thams cad kyis kyang de tsam gyis rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyangs pa ste/ de dag de nas byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa da/ 
289a2(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa// de'i zhabs lo// 'go los phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la de bzhin ga
289a3(mdo): ba don thams cad grub pas/ rab kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'chang ba dang / dus sum mnyam pa nyid kyang ston to// de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nyan cing kun 'dzin ce/ thos sa ga/ 
289a4(mdo): mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa mngon par shes pa thob ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i gaphral 'an thos phyag 'tshas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la ma gsu bsgom pa byas nas 'dong ngo // 
289a5(mdo): da/ rdzu 'phrum rgya stobs kyis rang rang kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhi tu song nas/ than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o// yangs dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dan/ 
289a6(mdo): thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i byed pa gyod pa na/ byang chub sos dpa'i tinge nge 'dzi dag su bsgoms te/ rab tu goms par byas// lam tu byas// rten du byas/ chu zhing bzhin du byas/ rab
289a7(mdo): tu rtogs par byas shing / legs par brtsams so// ting nge 'dzind gsum gang zhe na/ byang chub sos dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shugs sngan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzid zhi gnas zhes bya ba dang / 
289a8(mdo): byang chub so sa dpa'i ting nge 'dzid chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya'o// 'ja bo dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus skal pa dpag tu myed grangs byed/ bsi kyis kyi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed// gzhal du rnyed
290a1(mdo): nyan thos khrag khrig yod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni// de'i gnyis 'gyur yod do// nyan thos 'dus pa gsuM la ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra banos
290a2(mdo): pa nyon mongs pa myed pa dbang dang ldan par gyur da pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du'o// byang chub sems dpal 'dus pa ni// de'i gnyis 'gyur yod de/ nyin re zhing
290a3(mdo): chos stond pa de thams cad la nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa rnams kyis sa mnyam du bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa kun shes so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon
290a4(mdo): mchog dam pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ this mkhan nam mas mkhan gi slob ma mkhas pas bskal pa'i/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngas// bskal pa stong phrag brgya laM/ bskal pa bye ba
290a5(mdo): la~M/ bskal pa khrag khri ga gas// bskal pa btams sam bskal pa pa dkrigs sam// bskal pa 'gyur yas kyi bar dusanganyan thos 'dus pa 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya phrag
290a6(mdo): 'di snyed me 'am// nyan thos 'dus pa stong phrag 'di snyed ce laM/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce laM/ nyan thos 'dus pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed che2/ nyan thos 'dus pa khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'o// nyan thos 'dun
290a7(mdo): ba gtams phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce 'pho// nyam thos 'dus pa khyad byin phrag 'di snyed ce le/ nyan thos 'dus pa 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces bri bar myi rus so// 
290a8(mdo): 'jas dpas 'di lta ste dper da/ stong gsug stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skam sa 'i gzugs rnams la skam pa'i gzugs 'di snyed ce 'am/ skam pa'i gzugs pa rgya phrag 'di snyed ce'o/ skam pa'i gzuH/ 
290b1(mdo): stong phrag 'di snyed ce li/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya stong phrag 'di snyed me 'am/ bye ba phrag 'di snyed me 'am/ khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce 'am// gtams phrag 'di snyed chelaM/ dkrigs phrag 'di snyed me'o// 'gyur/ 
290b2(mdo): sas phrag 'di snyed mo 'am/ cis ma'an ram/ gyis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas kyang bgrang bar myi nus te/ 'od kyang skar ma'i gzugs dpag tu myed pa'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin tu/ 'jam dpas
290b3(mdo): nyan thos 'dus pa de rnams kyi mthal yang rtogs par myi nus so// 'jam dpal de'i dus na rgyal po bde nas glo gros shes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong de thams
290b4(mdo): cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed do// las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po des// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkor mchog ngas pad
290b5(mdo): thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa ldan bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du/ mo sde brgya'i zhes zas sbyarati ris 'gro byas so// yul ga shi ba'i nin bzag sol cing / 
290b6(mdo): byang thams cad kyang sbyar te/ 'di ltar chos kos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / mapa'o gsos sman dang / yo byad kyi ros gro byas so// des de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de/ 
290b7(mdo): la ro sna brgya pa'i zas kyis ris 'gro byas pas// dge ba'i rtsartsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'du byas so// dge ba'i a pa rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus pas// dge ba'i chacham pa'i shuH
290b8(mdo): rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa bskyed do// dge ba'i mab rgya che zhing grangs myed pa mngon par 'dus so// dge ba'i mag rgya che zhing grangs myed pa mngon du'adu byas nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya
291a1(mdo): zhing grangs myed pa skyed par gyur to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i che ba bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa khyed gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa'i sang brjod du myed pa marjon
291a2(mdo): bar 'dus byas nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bshugs rgya che zhing / pas kyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa bskyed par gyur to// tshul khrims/ 
291a3(mdo): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i ma kha dpag tu myed pa/ rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i khyab dpag tu myed pa// rgya chen po
291a4(mdo): mngon par 'dus byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa drang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba'i shugs dpag tu chen po bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i
291a5(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs myed pas gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa mye// da gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed cing / rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan
291a6(mdo): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bgrangs myed pa nas// brjod du myed cing rgya che ba'i 'or du mngon par 'dus byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa dang ldam dge ba'i shugs kyi che zhing grangs myed/ bas kyis kyi
291a7(mdo): khyab mtshungs pa byed/ gzhal du med brjod du med pa skyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i phra ba rgya che zhing grangs myed/ dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i
291a8(mdo): rol tu phyinang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'dus pa de bzhin du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rgyas
291b1(mdo): par bya'o zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirid pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i cha ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus byas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i thab rtswa che zhing dpag tu byedam
291b2(mdo): mngon par 'dus ngas/ shes rab kyi pha ro song tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i ma pa'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyarang te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i
291b3(mdo): bgrangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldar ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du myed pa'i bar du mngon
291b4(mdo): bar 'dus byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan dba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal
291b5(mdo): rgyal po pade gnas blo gros kyis de lta bur pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i ma pa rnams bskyed nas// dga' ba dang / dang / ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bas/ tas bdun srid du ni mkha' la
291b6(mdo): 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa des// pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i tshogs su bcad tha'adi dag gis mngon par bstod do// stobs bcu shes rab mthalas/ 
291b7(mdo): brgya bo bzhinas kyi se ge// khyod sa phus pa dpag skyed 'gyur/ sbyin pa de sa pa zil gyi non// pa la myed pa'i zhing dag la/ rdo dang po la mo myed/ kun sbyangs rab tu rmongs pa na// phyis nyam kyid phyogs pa rtse
291b8(mdo): par// ji ltar sa bon btab nas su// rmed pa'i myo de bde nyal yang // dus su ram pa brtan par zug/ myur du sngon por 'byung bar byed// klu yis sa la chus btab pas// los sdong bu rnaMs kyang 'byung // dus tshikra du
292a1(mdo): kye rims bzhin du// nges par 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom// gti mug bras pa nges pa'i blos// ma spang yon tan zhing khyongs// shes rab gshos gis rmos pa ni// sa bon nyung du btab/ 
292a2(mdo): na yang // de bzhin sbyin bdag phyi ba rtson kyang pha rol tu phyind pa yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i myu gu ste// / mgon po khyod la sbyin phul ma// byams pa snying rje nyon mongs myed// naM par tha rang pa'i sgo gsuM dang / 
292a3(mdo): tha mar 'bras bu mya ngan 'da'// / su mu y+ra gnyis mtshan sangal la// sa la dong ka/ myen rgyas bzhi de// bdag gis dge ba'i masachags pas// / ji ltar bde gshegs de bzhin shog/ ji ltar bsod nams mang mngal pa// leH
292a4(mdo): s+yad 'chags pa thug pa'i mchog/ ji ltar myi mchog dam pa bzhin/ zadag kyang bde gshegs de bzhin gyur rad// ji ltar dpe myed blo can khyod shes rab gnas la khyod gnas nas// lta bar rab tu bying ba'i
292a5(mdo): skye bo ma log/ 'god par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub reg na nyes na// de bzhin bdems rab gnas te// log pa'i lam song skye po rjes// bden pa bzhi 'i la la dgod// ji ltar khyod ni phung po myed
292a6(mdo): pra myed phung po zad par zhugs// byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams// thams cad phung po 'dod du bcud // bdag kyang phung po byed pa dang // phud myed byang chub mchog tho ba la/ phung pos bcings pa'i skye bo rnams
292a7(mdo): phu po 'dor bar rab tu dgod// ji ltar khyod kyis nyon mongs spangs// chu yis me rnams zhi ba bzhin// nyon mongs me yis 'bar ba'i// skye bo sdug bsngal tha dad bar mdzad/ bdag kyang byang chub rab reg ste/ 
292a8(mdo): khro grem 'dod me ma wi zhes// nye bar zhi ba'i lam ston pa'i// skye bo rab tu zhi bar 'god// ser sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang / phra dog kun sbyor mun pas bsgribs// / srid par chags pa mgon myed rnas/ 
292b1(mdo): yan lag brgyad kyi seM la dgod// ji ltar rang byung khyod nyid ni// stobs bcu ye shes ra la gnas te/ srid sgom sems can khrag khrig la// stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub rab reg/ 
292b2(mdo): cing // bla myed byang chub thob nas su// / srid sgom sems cam khrag khrig la// stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par bgyi// 'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po bde nas blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
292b3(mdo): pa dkon mchog dam pa de la// lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug bcu'i bar du zas ro brgya ba s+phar tsa de/ yul ka shi pa'i ni bzal gsol te/ par snang la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par
292b4(mdo): bstod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad med grangs byed/ bsam kris myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal tu byed brjod du myed pa bskyed nas/ dge ba'i che ba'i shugs des skal pa brjod du byed par nas kyang / 
292b5(mdo): seMs can dmyal bar ma skyes// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dpag shin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin kyi ros su yang ma skyes/ myi// / khom pa rnaMs su ma skyes// ris dmal bar ma skyes dbul po'i ris
292b6(mdo): sum smras so// skal ba bad du byed ba nas yang sus la chung las gyu pa'i/ 'khris pa las byungs pa'am/ yang gan las gyung de pa'i nisas byung ngo // rnams kyang dbang po mthang b.rasabyas das
292b7(mdo): kyang byin ser ba 'jigs pa'i myig dang / myig yo ba dang / bzhin lo kharas gyu rad to// nams kyang skyes bu chen po'o mtshan sum brgya ma gnyis kyis/ lus ma brgyan par ma gyur da/ rnams kyang dpe byad ba / 
292b8(mdo): tho brgyad bcu dang bral bar sa kyar nga / lha'i nang du smrar gyur tum/ bya'i nang du phyir gyur na/ rnams kyang dbang po dang / 'dag po ma byas par sa gyur nga nams kyang snod la sun su mtshogs pa dang / bras par ma gyus/ 
293a1(mdo): mang dgas ga rjenas pas byes// rnams kyang smin pa dgas byas paras gyur// darnams kyang chub khrims kyi dregs pas skyes/ rnams kyang ldan pa ma yi par ma gyung // denas gyu rnas pas dregs pa ma skyes/ 
293a2(mdo): rnams 'jugs pa rangs kyang / rnams pang 'ad pa'i 'dugapas skyes rnams kyang 'arjod pa la gyis pa brnya bangs gyur/ gyu sa par gyi myod par sa gyu
293a3(mdo): rag tu mched par gyung tu// rnamapa kyang na dngasapas kyi shes pa smos/ nams sbyang na pa ma zhes pa'i 'drugs pa sa/ su rgyam pa de sunapa dang ldan pa ti 'dzidi di byang
293a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpam yon tan 'dinam sa dang / gzham sung thu bsgrubs so// 'di rngo snyam du sems/ 'jam dpas dong che de'i dus ma/ byas po bde nas blo gros shes bya bar gyur pa des
293a5(mdo): zhig yon snyam du 'dzid dan/ de ltar gyi blta'o// de ci'i byor zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don pas cad grub pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bde gnas blo grag
293a6(mdo): zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jas dpal de lta bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyim pa'i pha rosang tu phyid pa dang ldan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba'i grags bcas par bya'o// 
293a7(mdo): dpal theg pa chen po le yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgrib pa myed pa'i rnaM par thar pa la spyod la des/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i za ba
293b1(mdo): mya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te// tshus khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'is bkrugs rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o// bam
293b2(mdo): gnyis la / 'jamed pas sngar byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ skal pa grangs byed dpag tu myed bsam gyis kyi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du byed/ 
293b3(mdo): brjod du myed pa na rgyal po drang srong tshangs pa'i lga zhes bya ba dang / mes byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste// de gnyis nags shika na 'khod de de dag dgon pa nas dgo pa// nags tshal nas nags tshal du// ka rmo nas
293b4(mdo): srong chug nams thibs po nas rags thibs po pa 'gro zhag/ bdag cag bud myed dang lhan cig gnas par gyur dan/ bdag cag 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bsla ba pa las 'gas pa
293b5(mdo): 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig 'gro gas ma yang bdag la gnod sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba'i bslab par 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa'i// yongasu bzung
293b6(mdo): ba la nye bar gyi lta ba dang / lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur nga na yang / bdag cag gti/ mug gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes de lta bul nges pa rnaMs mthong nas/ dgon pa nas dkon par/ 
293b7(mdo): nags tshal nas nags tshal// gshong nas gzhong / nags thibs po nas nags thibs por rgya'o// 'jam dpal de'i dus na rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de// de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe/ khyim ki sar+tha
293b8(mdo): mngon par byang ba rnams ma dang / gang dang stsal ma bde 'byod bu gnang ste/ rjes su la renga'i rang ngo zhes tshig 'di skad ces smras pas/ drang srong de gnyis kyang rgyal po sde mya 'phas pa'i khams na gnas so// de'i
293'a1(mdo): rgyal pa snga ma thebam pa la chos rkun no 'phrog pas gnod pa soms byas te/ thos pa dpe drang srong de dag gis thos 'amathong du// chom rkun de dag gis kyang drang srong nags kyi ning na gnas par ma 'ong na/ 
293'a2(mdo): chom rkun de dag gis thal mo sbya te 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong khyer la bdag ma/ mthong ngam zhes la zhig gis dris pa/ khyed kyis ma bstar cig/ de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i sgras drang srong mes sbyin la smras
293'a3(mdo): pa/ skyesa'o me sbyin thung ba da da krin tu dga' na ji skar bya/ gal te 'dim mthong ngo // zhes sman tshig zhan 'grus par 'gyur/ ji stem bsdus da ni ga dong pa byas par 'gyur// dod par byas rnam pa kyi
293'a4(mdo): da 'di ji ltar bya khyed smras shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang drang srong sa sa sbyin gyis// drang srong chungs pa'i yul 'di skad ces smras so// kye tshangs pa'i lha 'di la gnod par 'gyur ba/ 
293'a5(mdo): ma 'dzidang cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa'i lhag la dag na lus dang // srog a lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag no// yongasu zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis/ sems rdzi/ 
293'a6(mdo): nas 'dug go// tshangs pa'i lha dag 'di lta ste/ dper na gos snum can la rdul reg na chags par 'gyur pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ 
293'a7(mdo): mangs skye bag pa byung ba byung ba nas / sems kya zin nas 'dug gi// tshangs pa'i sa ma mdug 'acog sus dang srog la myi lta pa de dag la nas yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnaMs kyis sos
293'a8(mdo): zizhid cing 'dug par myi 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste dper ma/ gis yong su dpa pa la tshul gyis reg krung lags ma thag tu med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang dag 'a cig lus dang / 
293'b1(mdo): srog la myi lta ba de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu rdzun na gnas par myi 'gyur ro// de bas batshungs pa'i skad/ 6/ kyang sum dang srogs gyi lta bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i
