341a1(mdo): zhing yongs su skyeb pa dang / sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyim bskas pa brjod du myed pa mas pa brtson pa mkhor ro// des thabs la mkhas pas yong su yind pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
341a2(mdo): pa gyod pa na/ bskal pa brjod tu myed par rnams kyang thabs la mkhas pa dang krol ba'i sems ma skyes so// sems bskyed pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na// sangs rgyas kyi zho khrag khrig brjod du/ 
341a3(mdo): byed pa rnams yong su sbyangs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re ba yang sems can dkrigs phrag khrag khrig brjod du myed pa yongs su su rnyed par byas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sos tsam khrag khrig tshad myed pa zhes
341a4(mdo): thab mo chos kyis bzod pa la rab tu bkod do// 'jam dpal de 'i rdzi de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shings la chen pa lta bu can dan gyi stong rdo zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan 'gi yin pa snyam du 'dzin da/ 'jas
341a5(mdo): dpal khyod kyis de ltar gyi bsa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhi sa gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po sta bu tsan dan kyi snying po zhes bya/ 
341a6(mdo): par gyur da to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa'i chen pos sems kyi mtshan mas nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa la brtson par bya'o// 
341a7(mdo): bas po // 'jas dpa'i sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bstosad pa tshad kyid grangs byed/ khas kyis kyi khyab sa tshungs pa byed// gzhas du byed brjod du byed pa'i pha ra
341a8(mdo): gyi yang ces pa ro yang nag/ de bzhin gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa zhabs su ldan pa/ bde ga shegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dus pa'i la so sbyar ba/ 
341b1(mdo): bla na myed pa/ lha dang phyi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'byung nas das 'byub ga nas shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
341b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab bla ma zhes bya ba byung ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab bla mas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ ye shes 'byung gnas
341b3(mdo): de la zhus nas// sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir yul rgyu zhing song ngo // de yul/ zhi ba song nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa yongasu sbyangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re ra yang sems can bye
341b4(mdo): pa khrag khrig brjod du myed pa rnams khro na myed pa'i chos la de/ sa par sems pa'i bzod par yongs spyind par byas nas/ des smon lam de skad btab bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skyes
341b5(mdo): ba der sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam du shes par shog shig/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhi gag tu skyes pasems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje
341b6(mdo): kyi 'jig rten dang / skam yin gyi rimi da kyi pa sems cad cad par shog zhi ga shes ngas bye la ma 'a sa pa mdus rdzogs par gyur te/ 'angs dpas byang chubasams dpa' sa zlas de
341b7(mdo): dpa'i snang pa byang tsang sangs rgyas kyi zhib gang du smras pa'i thasems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas thu bar shes nang/ sems cad byas pa dang / dud 'gyu'o sbyis nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / 
341b8(mdo): kyi sa dang / rgyal ma tshu' bar gyur ga/ nga par byung nas kyang pas rgyas kyi da blar pa byung po// zla pa 'a byed / sa
342a1(mdo): chub sems dpa'i khyad pa khyod pa na/ sa 'i phyogs su rkang pa'i 'thil gyis reg pa ma gyur pa de bskam ba rjes kyi rab tu mchod rten du gyur da par shog shig/ sems can gang gis mchod rten de'i gaH
342a2(mdo): mthong yang rung thos kyang ru dang / des so pa ya ba ru pa de dag thams cad pra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur dacig/ mchod rtenag gnas de ji srid 'dug pa de'i bar dA sangs
342a3(mdo): rgyas kyi zho ba der dam pa'i chos nub par myi 'gyur bar shog shig/ mchod rten gi gnas ji srid du 'dug pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhi bden/ sems can rnaMs dam pa'i chos nyan pa rgyun myi 'chad par shog shig/ 
342a4(mdo): sems can gag bdag gi myi thos pa de dag zas cad kyang bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par gyur da cig ces byas nas/ de'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs par gyur da te// bapyod pa la/ 
342a5(mdo): zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'dra ba 'dzind cing yongasu spyad sa so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag kha co brgyad kyi smon laM ji lta bu/ ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang des bzung ngo // sangs rgyas bye ba
342a6(mdo): phrag bco brgyad kyi tshe'i tshod ji srid pa de dag thams cad kyang des yongs bzung ngo // sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi nyan thos 'dus pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa'ang des yongasu bzung
342a7(mdo): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mi snyed pa de snyed kyi byang chub seMs dpa'i tshogs kyang des yong su bsdus so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bco brgyad de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi phun
342a8(mdo): su pa tshogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang des yongasu bzung ngo // des sangs rgyas kyi zhong bye ba khrag khrig brjod du byed pa yongasu sbyangs nas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa le gas
342b1(mdo): 'byung gnas da/ la pa nga par lta sbyin dunas banan ga gas pa lags 'byung gdam yi na pa sa // gas/ 5/ rdzu 'thunas b+h+ya

342b3(mdo): 'das bdag gi mu ba de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas mnas kyang byang chub seMs dpa' da// skye bo mang po la sman par 'dugapa de lta bu'i chos bshad dugaso sod/ de skad ces gso lang pa dang / de len
342b4(mdo): gshegs pa lo zhes 'o byong gnas des byang chub sems dang la shes rab bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' ya to// da ba bram khridang gis rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyinang pa la zhugs rje
342b5(mdo): ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo gas par sangs ma rgyas kyung sangs rgyas kyi bye ba byed pa'o/ gas so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
342b6(mdo): pa ye shes 'byung gnas kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'ang snyed ces bka' ba lar to// dge slong dag / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla mas ji lta bur las byas pa la ltos// dge slong byang chu
342b7(mdo): sems dpal zhes rab thams sems cad 'a snyid su ring bar byas pa ni/ khyi ma khan nam thom pa'ad ga sleb mas bskal par yang ru / bskas pa ba rgya yang dus/ bska med pa khras thig tu
342b8(mdo): rung ste// de dag gis pa gyi bar myi rus so// 'jam dpal der byang chub sems dpa' shes rab tha ma des sems cad chad myed pa nya thos kyi mya ngan las 'ang bar yongasu mya ngan las bzlas so// 
343a1(mdo): de gnyis 'gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa rab tu bkod do// byang chub seMs dpa' de dag thams cad kyang thun myed
343a2(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshad myed pa la sems can rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzlas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de lta bur byang chub sos dang
343a3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po shes rab bla ma des sems can rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzlas so// sems can shin tu mang po byang chub la rab tu bkod do// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe
343a4(mdo): de'i dus na dge slong shes rab bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yid pasnyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpas khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i
343a5(mdo): de'i dus na// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma zhes bya bar/ gyur to// 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i gyad pa 'gyod pa
343a6(mdo): yin/ sgrib pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdo bar ba'o la la gnas pas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur to// de lta bas na 'je sa dpal byang chub seMs dpal sems dpa' chen po zhes kyis thabs
343a7(mdo): mkhas pa dang ldan par bya'o// thabs mkhas pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpalas chos thos cad la dbang dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin bshang bar bya'o// chos thams cad la dbang dang ldan pa
343a8(mdo): li ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs la bsnyen bkur
343b1(mdo): byas nas dang / kun tu snang du byu pan// 'jam dpas 'di ste ste// dpe nas sa gang nas la/ gas 'byung rgya 'bab pasasags sus sag sa ba der 'grub bo// de zhin du chos dums/ 
343b2(mdo): cad sa dbang dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzidzid la rab tuganas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dang bltas par dang dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis dra par byed de// de ltar na byang na pa mos
343b3(mdo): dpal de sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dmyags pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan chos rnam
343b4(mdo): gnyis ma mchis// chos rnams bye brag mchis ma lags// den chos kyi mtshan nyid de// chos kun mtshan nyid ma mchis dpags// nam mkha' ji ltar ni ga/ yos// dpe ba gyir rung ba
343b5(mdo): ma lags te/ chos kyi dper yang de bzhin du// rnam pa thams cad bgyir gyi rung / chos la chos kyis mthong ma mchis// chos kyis chos nas myi rig ste/ shes pa po dang chos rnams kyang / 
343b6(mdo): 'di ni yong ma mchis// sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas su// myi mkhas gang dag rnam par rig/ de dag sangs rgyas de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas rnams ni mya rig lags// sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas
343b7(mdo): shes/ de ni thos pa'i byos pa'i pyod yul ro/ sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas ni// sus kyang rtogs par rngo ma thog/ ji ster cig gis brjod pa ltar// chos 'di dag la gdags ya mchis// chos de gdags
343b8(mdo): ba ma lags te/ bdag dang 'dra bar rtogs par bgyi/ bdag ni gdags su ma mchis te/ 'on kyang bdag ces smra la bzhin// chos rjes la mi btags pa yang / bdag dang 'dra bar rtogs par bgyi// bdag ni rtag
344a1(mdo): bar ma mchis te// 'on kyang bdag ces sgra ba bzhin// chos rnams btags pa la ma chis par// mkhas 'dzas kyis rta/ tu rtogs// dza ga rnams pa so bzhin/ ma byung 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te// 
344a2(mdo): de bzhin chos rnaMs gdags pa yang // ma byung 'byung bar myi 'gyur lags// rdzas ma lags pa'i 'dogs pa yis// byi gang 'di sa 'dogs pa ni// 'dzangs pa rnams kyis kyi bsngags te// de ni mkhas pa dbya
344a3(mdo): lags// 'dogs pa de bzhin chos rnams la// myi ga pa 'di la 'dogs pa ni// 'dzangs pa nas kyis myi bsngags te// mkhas pas de ni de bya ba lags// 'gro ma mchos 'gro ba'i sgras// sangs rgyas rnaMs kyis
344a4(mdo): bstan pa ni// nam mkha'i ro mo bris pa rnaMs// de bzhin chos rnaMs rtogs par bgyi// bar snang bya rjes ji bzhin du/ 'gro de nges par ma mchis lags/ sbal ba'i spu'i lte ba ltar// de bzhin zhi ba'i chos 'di bsgra
344a5(mdo): bzhin gi gzugs parnyem me lo la// rang bzhin stong pa mkhas sa bshad// dkyis 'khor der bzhin gzugs sbyar// de bzhin / chos rjes thams cad bste// ji ltar byed// ri'i bam mchis te/ skad
344a6(mdo): phyung nas ni breg phug sgra yang krag/ brag ma de la byed pa ma mchis ltar// de bzhin chos sa byed pa su ma mchis// chos 'di dag ni rgyal bas de ltar bstan// mchis pa ma lags 'di la khyed ma mchis// rang 'byung
344a7(mdo): 'di dag rtogs nas rab bstand te// de bzhin gshegs bzhin tu ro la tsham mdzang / rgyal bas bsta dad pa'i chos nas gang rtogs pa// myi'i 'dren pa de dag po mtshar te/ myig dang ldan pas bstan nas long ba dka/ 
344a8(mdo): gzugs rjes mthong ba bzhin du ro mtshar lags// song ba gzhan zhig bstan pa'i gzugs rnaMs 9/ mthong bar gyur dan de ni ngo mtshar te// de bzhin du 'khor gyi gsung thos nas// gang dag dad par gyur pa ngo ma
344b1(mdo): mags// chos rnams bstand pa dag kyang de bzhin du// tha rad pa 'tshal bas rab tu rtogs ber bgyi// gang dag chos rnams rig par myi 'gyur pa// de dag gis mi de bzhin gshegs pa lathong // de nas
344b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu ra pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi rkyen snamatshigs su bcad pa de da/ smras hA/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso sod to// bcom ldan 'das byis pa so sa'i skye bog
344b3(mdo): thams cad jo la nyong ma mchis par bston pa dang / chos thams cad paze nyid ma mchis par sla ba de dag nini/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sdom pa dgas 'tshas lags so// deco'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshas
344b4(mdo): rnams na thog ma ras dbyigs su ma mchis na/ ngob nyid la sa sa par bstam dug la sa chis/ bcom ldan 'das chos pa/ daphyogs su ma mchis pa de dag ni keng yang bkrab sems kyis sa
344b5(mdo): de ci'i sred du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ gnyis su ma mchis ga dbyam ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
344b6(mdo): bgyi la 'din gnyis mum mtshos po sa bgra ba bgyis pa lags pa// de ci'i srid du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni nam mkha' dang rgyas te// gnyis su ma ma stu ga gnyis su dbye sa pa mi
344b7(mdo): byed dang / rnam pa gas pa 'ang gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su dbyer pa mchis lags so// de ci dris du zhed/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pan das ma' 'dapas tshungs ten bcom ldan 'das
345a1(mdo): gzugs gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa gang lags pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa gang lags pa na gnyis su ma mchis te gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lags so// 
345a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ga pa lags pa dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa dang / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa gang lags pa dang / bcom ldan 'dus ma byas
345a3(mdo): pa gang lags pa de dag ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// 'od na 'dus byas so 'di ni'i dus ma byas so zhes bgyi ba de yang bcom ldan 'das gnyis snu ma mchis pa la bgrang
345a4(mdo): ba bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i rnamang bar thard pa 'di la pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po de gnyis su myed par spyod pa zhes bgyi ste/ bcom ldan
345a5(mdo): 'das 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa kha gang lags pa dang ma 'ongs pa 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dge pa'i ma pa gang lags pa de gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshig bla
345a6(mdo): dgas lags so// 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams dang / gzugs ma mchis pa'i khas dang ldan pa gang lags pa des
345a7(mdo): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'i dbyings dang ldan pa ga lags pa 'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de da kyang gnyis sul mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas sags/ bag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i me ba gang lags gnams
345a8(mdo): dang / zag pa myed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ka pa lags pa de dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chog tha dgas lags so// nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rnam pa ga sags pa rnaMs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i
345b1(mdo): pa gang lags pa rnams 'dzag sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// dge ba'i cha ba gang lags pa dang / myi dge ba'i ma la gang / 
345b2(mdo): lags pa de yang gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// 'khor ba ga lags pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa kang lags pa de dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbye' ma mchis
345b3(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di la rdeb nur ma mchis shing the tsom gyi 'tshal ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
345b4(mdo): brgya'o// de ras 'jam dpas gzhon nur gyur da pas de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gso ya to// gang dag rgyal ba'i myi gnyis tshus rtogs pa// de dag the tsom ma mchis bde bar gshegs/ de dag gshem ma
345b5(mdo): gnas mthong ste// de dag rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa mchod/ myi/ gnyis bye brag ma mchis chos nyid du// bde bar gshegs pas/ chos kyar bstan pa mdzad/ gzhanam lags pa'i tshig 'di thob nas su
345b6(mdo): mkhas pa rnams kyi sem sa mnas 'gyung / gang dag spyod bras zhi bar ra bzhugs pa/ mtshungs pa byed par byang chub par tu bstan/ dar stond pa'i a sa rab sugs te/ dang / gdad pa'i ba
345b7(mdo): rab tu gnas// gang bdag 'di ni gzugs shes bya zhes brjod// bor ba dang ni 'du shes sems pa dag/ de ni'i dus byas rjes shes de skad ston// se dag ston pa'i bka' gnas ma lags// gang dag dge ba rab
345b8(mdo): tu bzung zhe sa// dge ba ma larnams nas ngan ces ma chi// de da// stonod pa'i bkal la myi gnas te// de dag gnyis la myod pa'i rgyo zhes bstan// khams gsum pa zhes gang dag brjod pa'i gyi// deng / thub pa'i bstan
346a1(mdo): sa brtson ma ma gyis// das pa'i don tu khams gcig ma mchis na// de la gsum chu mchis bar gal 'gyur// gang dag de bzhin 'di dag 'dus byas te// gcig shos 'dus ma byas shes rnam gnyis smra// de dag
346a2(mdo): bde gshegs bstan pa'i chos rnams la// nam tan bgyid par spro ba'i myi ma lags// 'doni myo ga nyis chos shes gang smra ba// de dag ston pa'i bka' sa myi gnas te// bde bar gshegs pas chos rnaMs gang bstan pa// 
346a3(mdo): de la gnyis dang myo gnyis chos ma mchis// gang dag bde gshegs bstan ces smra bgyid pa// stor dang de dag dmyigs su ma mchis te// gang gis bstan pa de yang son ma mchis// gapa la bshad pa de yang mchis
346a4(mdo): ma lags// gang bstand de yang dmyigs su ma mchis lags// gapa la rig bgyi de yang skye ma mchis// kun tu thams cad ci sa pa dmyigs ma mchis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de ltar rtogs par bgyid// chos gang bde
346a5(mdo): bar gshegs pas stond pa yang // de la chos de dmyigs par myi 'gyur te// stong pa stong nyid mi yang yod myi dmyigs// / mtshan mye// da mtshan ma myed pa'i chos nyid kyang // de bzhin gang du smon pa myed pa/ 
346a6(mdo): bshad// bshad pa de la smon pa myi dmyigs lags// / de bzhin grol dang grol khar bgyid myi dmyigs// bde bar gshegs pas de 'dra'i chos bstan te// bde bar gshegs pas de 'dra'i chos bstan// 
346a7(mdo): ba// gang dag de ma rtogs nas gzhan rtogs pa// de dag skye bo rtag tung ci nges nas su// srin bu brgya bskyed bzhin gzhon pa bgyid// gang zag dam pa ston pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten mgon po srog chags
346a8(mdo): pan pa'ad pas ga sngon chad dgal ba spyad pa brgya yad de// zugs rje rab tu bskyed nas kun tu byung// gang gyu 'gro ba tog ldan ma su bgyid la/ sas mchog den de yis rab tu bstan// dka' sos 'ar
346b1(mdo): gshegs mthun pa'i btul zhugs can// de dag 'a de gshegs bstan pa'i 'gro bar mchis// 'od dang 'gro bar smra yos bshad pa yang // de la 'ong ba dmyigs su yong ma mchis// bdag gis bsten pa de yang myi
346b2(mdo): dmyigs la// bde bar gshegs pas chos nyid rab tu bstand// zhi dang zhi ba kang ma'ang yong ma mchis// rab tu ma zhi de yang mchis ma lags// zhi ba ston pa'ang de bzhin ma mchis lags// zhi ba gang la
346b3(mdo): de yang yod myi dmyigs// kun nas nyon mongs gang na ma mchis te// kun nas nyon mongs gyurd pa 'ang ma mchis legs// shes ldan gang lams de yang ma mchis te// gang gis bstan pa de yang sa mchise ma lags
346b4(mdo): de la ni ni chos nyid rgyal bas shinang tu bstand// ste nod pa dang ni rba rje/ dpa'ang ma mchis te// mying du bstand pa'ang de bzhin mchis// sa lags// ji ltar rgyal ba'i chos nyid rtogs par bgyi// ston dang
346b5(mdo): bstan pa tshor dang tshor bgyid dang // 'dren dang 'dren pazhi dpan bgyid pa gnam mkha' ba ma sdang bya'i rjes 'dra ba ma/ khub pas ya bdag chos nyid rab tu bstan/ de bzhin chos nyid la yang ga rtogs pa// des
346b6(mdo): ni de bzhin gshegs pas sapa mthong ning// de'i sa myi'i gtso bo bkum bsti bgyis// sangs rgyas sal mkhas shi rnam par rtogs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'angs dpas gzho dur gyur da pa la 'di skad ce/ 
346b7(mdo): bka' saHsang to// 'jam dpal chos bshad pa'i rnams lus shes par 'gyur// gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma skyes ma 'gags pas chos bshad pa 'di nas 'ams 'ar 'gyur ro// bka' sastsasang pa
346b8(mdo): 'jam dpapa ga nyam tham sa 'gags pas zhes yar 'gyur na// jig khyod kyis thar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs parasangs rgyas nas chos bgang par 'gyur// gsos pa ba tsam
347a1(mdo): ldan 'das gal te bdag kyang gzhan la/ byang chub kyang gzhan na ni bdag byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya lags so// bkalas lang pa// 'jam dpal de skad du bshad na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams skrag par
347a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// gsol pa gal te skrag pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mchis na ni/ de la skrag par kyang 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la skrag pa ma mchis lags so// bkalas la pa// 'jam dpal
347a3(mdo): skrag ces bya ba de chos gag gi chog tha dgas yon/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skrag ces bgyi ba de ni phyo na ci log go cho ga bla dgas so// bka la sa \u0f7fsa pa/ 'jas dpal phyin gyi log ces bya ba de chos gas
347a4(mdo): gi cho ga blo dgas yino// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nad mi log ces bgyi ba de ni yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha'i chog bla dgas so// bkal sasal pa// 'jam dpal yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' ni sgeg par myi 'gyur ro// 
347a5(mdo): gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/ yang dag pa ni da kyi mtha' mi skrag par myi 'gyur te/ mya skrag pa zhes bshad pa se lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyid na/ yang
347a6(mdo): dag pa'i mtha' yang ya ba dag pa'i mthal zhes brjod lags mod kyi don dam par na yang dag pa'i mthal yang myi dmyigs// gzho nur gyuradapas de'i tshe tshigs/ bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams zas
347a7(mdo): cad myi skrag ste// myi skrag pa yang mchis ma lags// chos rnaMs brjod pa tsam brubs// yang dag mtshan nyid de ma lags// ma skyes pa'i bu la yab// bu zhes gdags par 'gyur yod kyi// de ni bum rnyed myi 'gum/ 
347a8(mdo): kun rdzob chos rnaMs 'dra lags// ji lta mo sham bu rnaMs ni// 'ching bar 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa// de bzhin kun rdzo bo chos rdos kyang // rnam pa kun tu myi dmyigs lags// kun rdzob rjes kyang kun rdzob tu/ ma byung 'byung ba
347b1(mdo): myi 'gyur te// ji sbar ba bsnang nas ma'a'as// ri ma byos pa ma mchis bzhin// kun rdzon pa mang kun rdzob ces// bya keng rjes su 'brang ba na// des byin mi so gces kyang / myig ldan rdzo bar mthong ba ste/ kun rdzob dang / 
347b2(mdo): rnadas pa 'dod// dedag gnyi ga sa ton pa// gang nam da ltar rgyartag pa// de ma ma nyid kyi rtogs pa// gab chos nyid kyirtogs pa// dedag pa sa'i byab gas sa// de nga na pa da gyisas
347b3(mdo): rnapa tu sungs/ go// de ga/ sangs rgyas bstan sa rtse// bdung shong bya ba rnams kyis kyang // de la byed par gyi thog/ gangang/ pa myed ma sa // zhab rnaM rtags pa/ 
348a1(mdo): ji ltar 'gol me 'bar ba// zhi bar kha gyid pa tshol ba bzhin// sems can kyi don slad du de dug de bzhin chos rjes tshol// 'gro la dgal bas nyid mtshan du// de dag rang 'byung shin tu chol// bskal pa bye ba/ 
348a2(mdo): stong du yang // rnams kyang brtsod 'grus mya 'dor mo// bu dang chung ma nor dang 'bya// mgo ngang de bzhin rgyal po'i myog// zhum kham mchis kun gtong zhi'i// de dag gtong ba rab tu bskems// srog chag kun kyi don slad du
348a3(mdo): de dag bya bcu pa mchog reg 'gyur// ro mchog ldan pa de dag ni// mthong zhing zos pa rnyed par dkal// de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpal thos cad zi lad kyis non pa zhes bya ba 'dug ste/ 'dug par gyur da pa
348a4(mdo): des kra bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lte ste dper bkyon// bar snang la mchi ba 'i bye rtend pa la mchos shipe/ nam mkha' la myi chags par gang dang gang du 'tshal ba de dang der
348a5(mdo): mchi ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa yang chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// myi chags par chos 'a chad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa
348a6(mdo): 'odi chos kyi dbyings la zhugs nas ji sr-id lags / de skad ces gam yang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' thas cad ma yid kyis non pa 'di skad ces bka' sa sa to// tham
348a7(mdo): zil pa kyis gnon pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu byed pa gang dag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa 'dis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyang chub tu btsud de/ 
348a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su myur rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngod par rdzogs sangs rgyas nas yong su mya ngan 'das so// rigs kyi bu ldan 'byung ba'adas pa'i dus la/ brgal dpa pag tu byed grangs kyi
348b1(mdo): bsas kyis kyi thus mtshungs paskyed pa da'i pha rol dag yi bcas pa nos dang/ de bzhidi gshegs pa du bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sengs rgyas mishes kyi dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rte du byung ngo // des pa rosod kyis sems
348b2(mdo): ros nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa segs babyung garas shes bya ba 'di ga nyer du 'gyur ro// nga'i pha ros gi yang ces pa ros dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa segs tha ma zhes bya ba 'dzi nyan du byung ngo // da'i sar sa dan pa cas pa so na / dbani
348b3(mdo): gshegs pa la shes mthong zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha la kyi yang ces la ros dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes khyod yul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi sa ces pa 'os na de bzhin
348b4(mdo): gshegs pa ye shes mdzod ces bya ba 'angag nyen du byung ngo // dpa royod kyi yang ches pa rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye/ sa dpa' bo zhes bya 'jig nyen du byung ngo // de'i la 'os dargyas
348b5(mdo): ches pha rol dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgrog pa zhes bya pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rosad kyi sang ches pha ros pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jog rten
348b6(mdo): du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rab tu 'jom pa
348b7(mdo): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha ros dkyi yang ches pa ros ngan// de bzhin gshegs pashugs 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha royod kyi sa ches pa ros dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa
348b8(mdo): dpal bregs snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi yang ches pa rolang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpas tshigs rna par 'job pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha ros dkyis
349a1(mdo): ches pha ros dan// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dkal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i phu rold kyi yang ches pha rol dan// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shugs ni wa ga non/ 
349a2(mdo): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // del pha rold kyi yang ches pha rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar myor pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // de'i pha rol kyi yang chis pha rol de// de bzhin
349a3(mdo): gshegs pa zhi pa'i 'od zer tog kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de la pha rol dkyi yang ces pa royad na// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo gros zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol
349a4(mdo): yapa ches pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'dul pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rold kyi yang ches pa rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i
349a5(mdo): pha rol dkyi yang ches pha rol de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma myed/ pa'i zhal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyis/ ches pha rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten
349a6(mdo): tu byung ngo // de'i pha royod kyi yad ches pa ro yo na/ de bzhin sa pa dri ma byed pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // del pa rol dkyi yang ches pa yod na/ de ban gshegs pa dgas pa 'ams
349a7(mdo): cad legs par 'jos pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de la pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang byed ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol dam de bzhin
349a8(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad zi yid kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de yi pha rol kyi sang nas pha rol dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol
349b1(mdo): sar ches pa ram dad/ nga bzhin gshegs pa dri mi myed pa'i stan nos bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol dkyi san ches pa yos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dris gyi zloms pa zhes bya ba lag rten du byung ngo // 
349b2(mdo): de'i par sa dkyis ma pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i phyin sa bya ba 'ag rten du byung // de'i ma kyimam pa yang// de bzhizhi gas pa ning cog rgyal pozhes rgyal / 
349b3(mdo): rten du byung ngo // de'i pa 'om kyis ces pa rlo mangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa drim ga dpas zhes rgya lag tan du byung ngo // de'i ros dkyil brnyes pa 'os nga/ de bzhizhi gshegs pa drim byed pa'i rgyal po zhes
349b4(mdo): bya ba 'jig rten du thub // ri'i la ros dkyis ches pa dan de bzhin gshegs pa zla zlas sras zhes byab 'di/ rten du pa'o// de'i pha rol dkyiyang des pa 'o sa dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
349b5(mdo): la par ya debazhi gshegs pa // khams pa 'argyas panas di rten du byung gi// nga ma mad kyis rnamam pa // de bzhi / ma mngon pa smra parnas pa
349b6(mdo): nas byaba'i me na du byung ba// de'i bar bdasang ras pa 'o ma dang / de bzhin na nyis pa nyi smrab ba 'dzi rten ma byung ba// de'i pa'i mad kyis rnas pa'os pang// de bzhin gag/ sa
349b7(mdo): tshangs pa bsgrubs gas kyi sa 'jig rten tu 'grung po// de'i la 'omau kyi rnam pa ba na/ ga pag sa sangs rgyas chu// khri 'jig nyid du byung sti dgag sog pa ni 'o byed sa / 
350a1(mdo): gni de bzhin gshegs pa klags pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i pha rol kyi yang ches pha ros dang// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi 'jig rten du phyung ste/ de dag gzhog par ni de bzhin gshes/ 
350a2(mdo): pa yar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de dag gi zi la pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ris ces bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ngo // de'i 'a ros dkyi yang ches pa ros na/ skas pa cigs sangs rgyas byeb/ 
350a3(mdo): phrag dag byung ste// de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa bde spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed pas rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i/ 
350a4(mdo): pha rold kyi yang chos pha rol ngan// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na// grags sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dpa' mkhas zhes
350a5(mdo): bya ba dang / tshangs pa'i dmyig ces bya ba dang / tsan dam zhes bya ba dang / rab mdzes shes bya ba dang / seng ge 'dzind ces bya ba dang / rkun nas mdzes shes bya ba dang / spobs pa mthal yas zhes bya ba dang / 
350a6(mdo): blo gros myi zhand ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / 'grogs na bde zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des shing 'grogs na// bde ba yon tan 'bum phrag mang pa dang ldan pa bcu gcig tshangs par
350a7(mdo): snang ba myod do// de'i tshe na yang bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bu nyims byin zhes bya ba mkhas shing / rdo ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig yod do// de nas bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bu'i bu nyims
350a8(mdo): byin/ grogs po bram ze'i rigs shi sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang / lhan cig tu rin chen ldan zhes bya ba grong khyer chen po nas phyi rol pa tu 'khyam pa'i phyir phyung nas dong ste// de dag dka' ba sna tshogs zhes
350b1(mdo): bya ba'i tshil der phyin to// de'i tshe dgal ba sna tshogs shes bya ba'i chol de ni/ byang chub sems dpal bcu gcig 'jig rten rnams kyi dos la sems/ par kham sems/ bde bar sems shing 'khod pa// bram ze'i/ 
350b2(mdo): rigs shibs la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin/ de dga' ba sna tshogs shes bya ba'i tshal der 'khyam pas/ dka' ba sna tshogs kyi tshal de na 'khod pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag des shi'i 'grogs na/ bdes kyi dkod ma
350b3(mdo): khyengs kyi ge songapa/ mu Ter gyi rgyu/ smra ba gyi mngazhing / drad pa nye bar gzhag la/ shes rab cam/ shes rab dang ldan pa gnod tu khrims par gnas pa mthong ngo // mthang nas des dge ba'i ma la bskyed cing / sun ring / 
350b4(mdo): por zhes rab yongs pa sgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la bsnyen pas skyes gradas pa ded/ 2/ sems rab tu dang gam dgyur to// de sems rab tu dang pas skyes bu das patsu / 
350b5(mdo): dag las des bras pa'i rigs gangs la chen po lta bu'i gi soganasas dang lhan cig tu dong ro// skyes bu das pa klags kyin des thab 'arigs gangasas cheran po lta bu'i bu nyims byid byung ring po nas kyi
350b6(mdo): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bu'i bu de'i 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pazhi khyod pa kun kyang tshangs par spyad pasun ring du kyang ba'i gyod sa bzhin to/ 
350b7(mdo): skyes bu dam pa 'di blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bu rgya sdong du 'gyur ro// snyam du sems so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis/ skyes bu de la bcu po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// med dang ldan pa dag 'di sri
350b8(mdo): mas byin skyes bu dam pa sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi tshul du 'gro ba/ bla na myed pa sangs rgyas kyi ngos rnaMs kyi snod du gyu rad pa 'od kyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'dis skyes bu da pa rnams kyis snying rje skyed sa// gdams pa dang / 
351a1(mdo): rjes su bstand pas ci nas kyang rigs kyi bu 'di skye bo phal po che'i don byed cing / sdang ba stond pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir legs par dgongs shog/ de nas bram ze'i 'ogs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas
351a2(mdo): byin skyes byangs pa bcu gcig po de dag gi rnang bu song nas 'di dag ni ston pa'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'o// zhes skyes gyu pa pa de dag la ston par 'du shes bskyed de// des skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rgong pa la mgo las bya/ 
351a3(mdo): 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dreng ngo // de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bya nyi mas byin de la/ kye bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po sta bu'i bu nyi mas byin khyod 'dug shi ka/ 
351a4(mdo): ces smras nas/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi ma byin skyes bu dam pa de dag la shi rid tu ri mo bskyed de// 'dug pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs kyi bu ma na ma khyos skyug gi mad+yan na 'dug pa/ bzhin skye
351a5(mdo): bu ngas pa/ de dag la ri mo skyes par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ nad pa dad kyis btab nas yun ring po nas sman pa mtho nas/ dbugs dbyung ba de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs gangs la chen po su khu'i rdzu
351a6(mdo): nyams khyin de yang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu dbugs phyung bde ra gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na gsad pa sa lug pa'i myo gsang du khrid pe don bya bar 'dod/ par bar 'dod/ bde bar 'dod pa'i phyi la la zhig byung ste/ 
351a7(mdo): des de gsad pa las tha rad par byas nas/ de myi de sa 'di yi byedag kyi skyabs/ bdag sa snying pa che bcad no// zhes byab bzo ba cher skyes pa bzhin du bram ze'i rogs shibs la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin yang skyes bu dam pa na
351a8(mdo): pa de dgas bdag go/ skabs/ bdag sa snying ba rtse ba cad do// zhes byas pa bzo ba skyes so// de nas rigs kyi bu grags byi gis bram ze'i rigs pa zhabs la cher po lta bu'i bu nyi las byin la smras pa/ nyi mas khyis de bzhin ga shes
351b1(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzas 'jig rte nang du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ ud du ma 'ab la'i me tog brgya la brgya yam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
351b2(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya sa ma ma/ 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dpa'agal ba/ zab pa mthong bar dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba// brtag tu myed pa/ 
351b3(mdo): mu stegs can/ gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i gyod pa ma yin zad/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa// rang sangs rgyas kyis myi shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'apyod yul ma yin pa'i chos stonod to// de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod
351b4(mdo): kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o// sti stang dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa la/ ni shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byams pa skye/ ye shes rab tu skye/ darig pa skye/ mngon par shes pa mngon du gyur da/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
351b5(mdo): rnams mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa'i chos ji ltar ston ce na/ nyi mas byin sa thams cad ni nem mkhalas khros pa bzhin du dngos po myed pa ste/ 
351b6(mdo): chos de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa'o// nyi ma su byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkhalas bris pa ni/ ma byung gyi 'byung ba de bzhin pu/ nyi mas byin gzugs ni nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o// cho
351b7(mdo): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha' lta bu ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o// nyi mas byin 'di ste ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes pa'o// 
351b8(mdo): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnaM bar shes pa'ang mo skyes pa'o// nyi mas byid 'di lta ste dper na// nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang ma 'gags pa'o// tshom pa dang / 
352a1(mdo): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma 'gags pa'o// nyi mas khyed 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni myi 'ong/ myi 'gro ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs myi 'ong/ myi 'gro ste/ tshor la dang / 
352a2(mdo): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang myi 'od myi 'gro ba'o// nyi mas byo 'di ste ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ma skyes la byung / de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
352a3(mdo): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'ang ma skyes ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di ste ste/ dper na// nam mkha' la bris pa ni mi 'phos ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma 'phos ma skyes te// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
352a4(mdo): 'du byed dang / rdo par shes pa'ang ma skyes so// nyi mas khyon 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la byis pa ni mi byung kun nas ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma byung // kun nas ma byung ste// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 
352a5(mdo): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'ang ma khyu pa/ kun nas ma byung ngo // nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkhal la khros pa ni me skyes shing myed pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang ma skyes shing / myed
352a6(mdo): pa ste// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'jam skyes shing myed pa'o// nyi mas khyod 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma grub mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang // 
352a7(mdo): ma grub mngon par ma grub ste// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rngam khar shes pa ma grub/ mngon par ma grub bo// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na// nam mkha' la bris pa brjod du myed cing brjod pa ma yin/ 
352a8(mdo): ba de bzhin drug gzugs kyang brjod du myed pa ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod du myed cing / brjod pa ma yin no// nyams byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'
352b1(mdo): sa khris pa btags pa myed cing / gdogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang gdags pa myed cing gdags pa ma yin te// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnaM par shes pa yang btags pa myed cing / gdags// 
352b2(mdo): pa ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na// nam mkha' sa bris pa ni tha snyad tsam ste/ nam mkhalas bris par snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma snyad tsam ste/ tha snyad las gzhan ma yis te/ cho/ 
352b3(mdo): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnaM bar shes pa yang tha snyad tsam ste/ tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob
352b4(mdo): sas nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ nyi mas byin pa/ dazugs kyang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las gzugs/ gzhan ma yin// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes/ 
352b5(mdo): pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/ kun rdzob las rnam par shes pa'i bar bya gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ mamalas bris pa'i 'di ltar myi tsam ste/ mying tsam las nas mkhalas pras
352b6(mdo): pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang mying tsam ste/ mying tsam las gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnaM bar shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar mying tsam ste/ myi nga tsam las rnaM par shes pa'i bar d+ha gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin
352b7(mdo): 'di lta ste dper ro// ni mkha' la khris pa ni 'di skar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las nam mkha' bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no
352b8(mdo): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gaganas yin no// nyims byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa la
352'a1(mdo): shaste/ btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// cor pa dang 'du shes dang / 
352'a2(mdo): 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rdo bar shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nyims byin 'di ste ste dpepan// nam mkhal la bris
352'a3(mdo): bani 'di ltar 'du shes tsam sto/ 'du shes tsamalas nam mkha'as bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes nam ste/ 'du shes las gzugs nas rnaM bar
352'a4(mdo): gas pa'i bab du gzhan sa yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dpeng na/ nam mtha' la brim pa ni bad mas ste/ 'ja tsam las nam mkha' la khris sa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnaM bar shes pa'i bar
352'a5(mdo): yang 'di ltar brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las gzugs nas rnaM par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na rgya ka gang gis nam mkha' la bris pa brjod pa'i tshig ni don dam par
352'a6(mdo): gyi dmyigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshar ba dang / 'dug so dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos dang / kyang 'das pa 'i de bzhin gshegs panas kyis kyangs dmyigs/ sa byod pa dang / 
352'a7(mdo): da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang ma dmyigs// nyi mas byin ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes sngon byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba pyod pa na/ sdug cing 'phongs pa // 
352'a8(mdo): po mas cad yang su btab yang zhus par myi 'gyur te/ ga pa'i shes 'di dag la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'jig rte rdzogs par bye blta'o// gang ye shes 'dis gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gagrangs su 'gro'o// 
352'b1(mdo): gangal zhes 'dis gnas pa de dag ni ga dgas par bya ba ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag mi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'khor ba las pastod
352'b2(mdo): ba ma yin do// gagangs gos 'di la gnas pa de dag na 'khor ba'i chos can yangs pa ni// mya ngan sas 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no// gang legs 'dis gnas pa de dka na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can
352'b3(mdo): pal danabapar bya de/ sa 'di la gnas pa dang / na par myod bams/ zhi bar myed pa yang ma mdzin/ dadas thas patshan pos pa
352'b4(mdo): byor skyes bu dpe bklags byir gyis bkang ba sa/ legs sog tu bstod nga sa su'i ring ngo // de nas yang skyes phyu das phra 'byaganyis pa de dag gse bram ze'i rishes sa pa cher pos sa
352'b5(mdo): brgya sa// shini spya pang ma gyu / ma kyim rgyab par mgyur bags sas// sa kyis kyid kyi ga 'asas par bya ba yi na pa // denas thas kyi'i sa na
352'b6(mdo): bab po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// / de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang / skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshes
353a1(mdo): ba / yem pa bdag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' mchog nas so bden mo za dang ste/ bye nas/ sa can 'das de'i zhabs la ga zos pas las te/ tshogs/ do/ 
353a2(mdo): de nas skyes grudam pa grags bye des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsos pa to// zhi ba sti byi nges sa rab zhugs tshul rnams sa/ bzlas pa 'dzin
353a3(mdo): pa rnams ni legs so legs// gang gis mya mchog shi nad tu mthong gyur pa// de ni myi rnams dam pa bstan tu gsol da/ 'jig rten mkhas pa bstan pa thos nas su// byang chub mchog la myi rjes rab tu 'atun
353a4(mdo): gang tho ba drang srong chen por gyur da pa dka// tshul de srog chags rnams la spyan slad gsungs// bder gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su// thub pa sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par bstod// rgyal pas de yid rab tu dkal/ 
353a5(mdo): zar mdzad// de dag thos nas shi nid tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyas kha bdag gis mi nam 'tshas pa rnams// 'dren pa bdag gis rmA sa rnams bshad lags te// stond pas ji ltar chos rnams kun mkhyed
353a6(mdo): pa 'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan tu gsol// des dka' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa yis// rgyas sras 'amyong ba gangs spyod pas na// mye 'i gtso bo 'dres par 'gyur ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rjes ma sus nges par bsta/ 
353a7(mdo): zas cad chos shes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig/ mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid myed pa ste// zhi ba pa byed myi g.yo yon tan myed// spros pa myed cing zhi ba 'tsho ba myed// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par bya ba stong // dngos po nyid pyod/ 
353a8(mdo): mi yang myed pa ste// 'din bstan pas ma yin ste nod pa myed// bshad pa myed cing 'chang par byed pa myed// tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang byed// shes pa ma yini shes par byed pa yang myed// su la yang ma yin gang gis kyang / 
353b1(mdo): pa la ta// 'di ga ma byas byed du 'jug pa sa gyis/ sus kyang zang ba byed pa btang pa'i byed// sus kyang bstsags pa med la zas 'ashung byed// sras kyang kyi zhes dpar shes pa'ang kyang / 'did dadas pas
353b2(mdo): mthong ba skyed// 'ang do go ba 'angam yin dgod pa'ang gyur// zhapar gyi byed zhi bar byas pa'ang byed// byed pa ma yin byed ba byed ma yin/ sems pa byed pa rtsol bar byed pa'ang byed// 'dus byas pa smi 'dus ma bya
353b3(mdo): 'ja ma la ning // 'pho pa ma yin gyi 'pho ba yang ma yin// 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba yod ma yin// 'di ni kun tu myi 'chi skye ba byed// skye ba byed cing skye ba 'ang ma yon te// 'di ni 'gags pa myed la 'gags pa 'ang myis// 'di ni bstand pa myed cing
353b4(mdo): bzhig pa'ang byed// da lta ra rgyal ba'i chos rnams la zhig pa'ang byed/ de na pa'ang myong// de lta stsal ba'i chos rnams shes par gyis// 'dre pa deng gshes su gang 'das pa// de dag gis kyang rgyas 'di rab tu d+ha// 
353b5(mdo): 'dres pa sangs rgyas ma byor 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad bar 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung sa// rgyal pa de dag tu na kyang tshul 'di ston // chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa'i// byang chub sems dpa
353b6(mdo): 'jigs par 'gyur na zhi pa'i ses par gtugs 'gyur te// mkhas pas shes par dka' ba'i rab tu bsta dang // rgyas pa'i thugs sras ji tsum shes pa da// 'gro ba gtses pa 'di la mya ngan byed// dwe snying rjem na byed pa skye// 'gro ba kur/ 
353b7(mdo): kha khyams ma zhin tu gnas// stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur dpas na// rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tsho pa byed// mtshan ma myed par gnas par 'gyur bas na// de la smonas pa 'debs pa'ang yong myed de/ chung rnams nam mkha'ang / 
353b8(mdo): sa mya 'ogs bzhin// dpal bo de yang 'gro bar gyi chags so// skal pa yang por byed par kun 'khor zhing// sems can bye ba mang la stonod par byed// kun tu kun nas nyon mongs kyi 'gyur te// de'i bying chub das pa 'chang tu nus
354a1(mdo): gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan te// de dag nyan thos las shes sman yang // ngas ni chos nyid das rtogs te// khyod ni 'dren pa myin zhes de smra'o// dri ma myed pa'i ye shes myige sbyangs te// bdag ni the tshom
354a2(mdo): ma lus rnam par khyang // stong par bdag ni gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog/ khyod ni gang zag mchog myi na phor dengos shing // de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstan pas na// gang la 'dren pa'i sras rnams gnas pas// bye ba khrag
354a3(mdo): khrig bdud kyi zhu ba dkal ste// ji ltar ri bo bskyod par myi rus bzhin// de nas bram ze'i rigs shib sa la cher po lta bu'i bu nyi mas khyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag la mchog de sas stong pa nyid dang / ldan pa/ 
354a4(mdo): 'tshogs su bcad pa de dag thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtse kha'i shugs khrob ste/ dge ba'i a pra ji lta bu thob pas// ta sa bdun srid du nam mkha yul 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu li 'jig rton ki / zhes dpag tu myed pa/ 
354a5(mdo): dkan// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag/ dpag tu/ myed pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phraHdpag tu myed pa rnams zhabs mkhas pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub
354a6(mdo): bad/ bdu bsgrub pa mang // byang chum ma / nga// myed pa rnams stan gi gnas na/ sas kyi sa sa@/ nga rnamamam na myed pa nas
354a7(mdo): su thus kyis pa ci lum gyi dus su zhugs pa yang mthod byang chub sems dpa' bye ga lag 'brus zas dpag tu med pa nas bcas nas/ shes pa bdun 'ong bar yangs mang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba than khrig dang / 
354a8(mdo): tu med pa rnas mdod par 'byung ba yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag tsug nas byang chul mngos par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang 'ayog// sangs rgyas bye ba lag yis dpag tu myed pa das sa ba rgya byin dang / 
354b1(mdo): tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khom so bskor bar gsol pa yang ma 'od/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu myed pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu myed la rnaMs spyod pa/ 
354b2(mdo): dpag tu byed pas sems rdzas 'dus pa yang ma thog// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dpag tu myed pa rnams/ byeg sa bcu'i 'dzig rten naphung po sa/ sa byed pa'i byengamasas 'das pa'i byeng du yangs su mang
354b3(mdo): 'das pas mthong ngo // de nas bram ze'i rigs gangs la chen po stu bu'i bu nyims byind par ldang sa 'dug bzhin tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa dga' mtshan des cigs su pas spangan pas bsad pa/ 
354b4(mdo): lags po sogs sa gang gnyis kun mchog// 'dres pa khyed kyis 'dag cas bstan pa// bar ldang gnas kyi kyi'i rjes bzhin du/ dngos thas sa rgyangs myed ni mi ma sags pa latshan sa ma chis dam pa'ang bris pa pan// 
354b5(mdo): khrim rtag sa ngas tu dgas pa 'byo/ gasrid pa'i rgyam gyis byer ba'i 'gro ba ga/ gnas dang skyabs dang bye nga grang sa gyur to// mams cad mi med kyi gnon pa 'di snyam bu sems// de'i mi de'i dus da/ rigs
355a1(mdo): kyi bu tshangs pa 'i dbyig ces bya bar gyur da pa de gzhan zhig yin po ltam du 'dzi dan/ de ltar mya lo lnga'o// de na'o byor zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' de pon pa bang po de'i tshe de'i dus na// rigs kyi bu Shangs/ 
355a2(mdo): pa'i myig ces bya bar gyur to// de bzhin du s+ya rad de/ gang rigs kyi bu nges pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa' myes byin no// kang de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur
355a3(mdo): ba de ni ga/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yir ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang rigs kyi bu kun tu mdzes par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpal dbang pos byin no// de'i tshe de'i dus ra/ rigs kyi bu/ 
355a4(mdo): spabs pa mthal las su gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpal chu'i sgra yin no// tham sa cho do 'i med kyis gnod pa 'di ji snyam du ma mas// de 'i che de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs zhipas ma chen po ste phur hU~M / 
355a5(mdo): mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa do gzhan zhig yom pastam du/ 'dzind na/ thams cad zil dkyis gnon pa khyod de ltar bsdu'o// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
355a6(mdo): bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bul nyams khyon zhes bya bar gyur to// thams cad ziyod kyis gnon pa de lta bas na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan go drod la myi 'jog
355a7(mdo): dang ka gzhan gyis myi bkri par 'dod pa dang // gzhan ga ngor myi lte par 'dod de/ chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i beshes gnyen rjes la bsnyen par bya// 'grogs par bya/ bsnyer bkru bya'o// 
355a8(mdo): ches zab mo nyam pa'i phyir yongasu dri ba'i nga tshul chad du bya'o// de ras 'jam dpalag ga dur gyur da pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gamomar to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ba stabs bskyed par/ 
355b1(mdo): chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thayid kyis gnom pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i mkha bskyed lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan

357a1(mdo): gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rdo yang bden shing smrang// na dang mdang re/ kyang s+ho// chos rnams ma cad dzam nyid stong / spel med de dag rol nyid kyis stong // de bzhin las skapa sas na
357a2(mdo): nyid kyis sto// bdad pa'ang bden pas de bzhin sto ba ste/ 'dis 'angs pa pasags rnams kyang bzad/ gang nas snang bar gi pa ma mchim pam// rnam ma 'a' ba sa byas rdzas dang ma rgyangs
357a3(mdo): na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa// de na rnams kyang gzhan gyi d+ha gyi 'gyur// gapa gi sos nyid rgya rnyed pa// rang bzhin de byed ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyenang // rab bzhin byed par gzhan gyis cishog skyed// rgyudes pade ba/

359b7(mdo): pa nyi shu lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten ga khams 'das pa na/ grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ki khams yod de// den pa la sems can dzas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
359b8(mdo): ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad yil kyis gnon pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sha kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa suM bcu'i tshu la phra rab kyi tshul snyed
360a1(mdo): kyi 'jig rte ni 'ams 'das par/ bde ba 'dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten go khams yang / de dang sa sems can rnaMs kyis debazhin gshegs pagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
360a2(mdo): gnas myed par gyid ces bya bar zhus so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs tshangs su rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed la sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khas 'das par/ ho/ 
360a3(mdo): kras bya zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de// de nangs sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gru bco/ pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so// 'a ma
360a4(mdo): sher gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed bsum brtsa ma brgyad kyi rjes phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi las 'das bAn/ tsam pa'i kha tog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten go khos yod de/ 
360a5(mdo): de mangs sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoMm/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa lha zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas
360a6(mdo): kyi k+ki brjod du myed pa bzhi ban rgyas phra rab kyi rdus snyed kyi'i'o// rte ga las 'das ldan// smras stsal pa zhes bya bya'i 'jig rten gi mas yod de// den pa sa sems can rnaMs kyis de bzhin gshegs/ 
360a7(mdo): paphya ga nas bya zhes bya bar shes // jam dpo gus gyigs sam sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi nong brjirjod su myong ba bzhin gyig/ gi rdul tharab kyi dris snyed kyi
360a8(mdo): da pa ni/ rab tu rtsub pa zhes bya ba'i ma na nyid gikyim yod de// den das sams can dpa kyis na gas pa ma pa la sa pa rdzog pa 'i sas rgyas
360b1(mdo): shes so// 'jas dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zho brjod du myed pa bdun myu ma gcig ka rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khos 'das pa da/ ma spang pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi
360b2(mdo): yod do// dam pa la/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa/ smar gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhob brjod du myed pa bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi
360b3(mdo): rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten ki khos 'das pa na/ kaser du snang ba zhes bya ba 'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa myi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes ma
360b4(mdo): 'jam dpas sham gyi phyogs cham gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten ka khaMs yod de// de mapa la sems can rnaMs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gso ba byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jom
360b5(mdo): dpal gar kyi phyogs charo/ gser ga gi drug ces bya ba'i 'jig ma kI khaMs yod de// de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa dri ma sbyangs shes bya bar zhes so// 'jam
360b6(mdo): dpal zhas kyi phyogs ca sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du med pa bzhi brtsam pazhi'i skyes pa rab kyi tshus skyed kyi 'jig gi khams 'das pacwa/ mangs par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig nyen gi khapa yod de// de spangs
360b7(mdo): sems ca rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rapas kyi snying po zhes bya ba mas so// lam dang mas car sna gardzam nas bya ba'i la rte sa yod de// dan pas pa rnams kyis bzhi ga
360b8(mdo): kha dpal rgyags nas sam sa kyi sa gas rgyas kya rjid myed pa tham gas bas nyid rnams gyig sa das pan/ 
361a1(mdo): gyi khams yod de// den pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa sum baH
361a2(mdo): tha lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ ka mi 'jid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de mang la sems cam rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzind ces bya bar shes so// 'jas dang
361a3(mdo): shal gyi phyogs cha ba sangs rgyas kyi zhong brjod du byed gsum cu drug gi rdus phra rab kyi tshul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa la/ tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi zhes yod de// de nang la sems can nas kyi
361a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pasum cu ma bdus kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas pan
361a5(mdo): sangs rgyas dgas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig nyen gi khabs yod de// de na / nisems can rnams kyis// de ba'i di gshegs pa blo gros rgyam po/ zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gas sa
361a6(mdo): kyi phyogs cham sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa sum cu ma brgyadakyi rjes phra rab kyi dus snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na// rin chon sgo zhes bya'i 'jig rten gi khas yod de// de na nga la sems can nas
361a7(mdo): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpas sha rad kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa sum bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
361a8(mdo): 'das pa no// rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de// de na ngal sems can rnaMs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs
361b1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhi 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhipa brjod du myed pa sum bcu'i rgyal tha rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pan/ rin cen rtog shini tu rgyal pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ni khams yod de// de dang/ 
361b2(mdo): sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar zhes so// 'jas dpal shas kyi phyogs rnamasangs rgyas kyi zhi brjod du myed pa sum bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rjes snyed kyis
361b3(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang/ shin tu mdzes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de// de na nga la sems can rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba ma shes so// 'ja
361b4(mdo): dbas na rgyu phyogs chang sangs rgyas kyi zhi brjod du myed pas/ dam bcu rtsa pa'i rdus tha rab kyi rdul snyid sa rgyas kyi zhing 'dus pa ra/ can tan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten no// 
361b5(mdo): sa yad do// de mangs sems cad sa rje bani gas pa mam la yis snang bzhes bya shes so/ @dpal gas ga phyogs pa sangs rgyas kyigi 'dis / 
361b6(mdo): rjid du byed pa bzhi bcwa dus tharab kyi nas skyed kyis sargyas kyi gang 'das pas/ med kyis kyi gnas pa zhes ma da/ ngan papa sems na pa ste
361b7(mdo): po sa nga / nga rdzog pa pa'i sangs su sa don thams cad krab pa zhes byal sa// 'dus dpas du 'i gangs su sangs rgyas kyi ni tha dad pa rnas su sangs rgyas kyi skye ba skyed pa
361b8(mdo): pas mams cad kyis kyi ya dang pagapa pa marjid du myed pa'i rnas par smras kyang // shar gyi phyoms yo mi rgyas ky-i kyis pa / sa khor gyi sa // de bzhin tu phyogs
362a1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing du/ nga la sems can rnams kyis myings myi da pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa yang brjod pa myed pa'i skalas bsdus kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhib za dang ba'i mamal ba par phyi / ko// la
362a2(mdo): dpal sems can dge ba 'i che ba chung pa rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa ltos na myos par 'gyur ro// 'jam/ dpal byang chub sems dpalagag/ theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / the
362a3(mdo): pa 'di sa yab dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang / 'jam dpal pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa thos na// the tsom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa nas dang / 
362a4(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ma smras// 'jam dpas ngas mngon par shes pa/ das pa'i dus na/ skal pa dpag tu mye grangs myed/ bas kyis rmyi/ 
362a5(mdo): khyab pa de'i pha rol pakyi yang ches pha rol ma/ yon tan rab tu pa/ skyed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ga khos na// de bzhin gshesas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'gru
362a6(mdo): mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byang ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ da ni bram ze'i bu mo bro gros mthal mas zhes bya bar gyur pa te// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mthal yas de yang byang chub sos dpa
362a7(mdo): khraka khrig brgyan cus yongs pa sa dod par gyur te// byang chub sems dpal de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po sa ya bdag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu myed pa sa yang dag par zhugs pa nas// theg
362a8(mdo): brjod du myed pa li bar la yang dag par zhugs pa la/ stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kha rtson 'grus mthal yas de'i ring kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad byed pa yong su dag pa 'chang de// pa ya ban
362b1(mdo): byeb pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mthal yas de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas ngas de 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshang myed pa
362b2(mdo): yong su dag pa thos nas/ bdag gsangs rgyas kyi da yang de bas kyang / shin tu myam pa de 'dra bgyur gyi tsas// de lta bu'i sman la btab sa// brang// gis dag pa'i na pa sta bya kyang / sangs rgyas kyi ni skyen
362b3(mdo): su dag par bya ba'i phyir sngos ste// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kha rtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhong tshad myed pa yongasu dag par lung ma
362b4(mdo): bstan mod kyi/ 'od kyang tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ dbyang chub kyi phyir// sangs rgyas kyi zhong dpag tu med pa yongs su ra// par bya ba'i phyir ba rtson 'grus la btang bar gyur nas// de skarangs
362b5(mdo): dam 'on du sangs rgyas bye ba zhag khrig tshad byed pa rnas sa bste/ bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsal bachags pas pa sangs sa kyi zhid rgya rjer yongs su da// par zan mye pa sa dag par ro/ 
362b6(mdo): kyang dubs rdzogs par sas rgyam kyi// nas ldan 'das kyis ma gisasu bcas pa 'dir/ 'a a // badzad sum gyis pa'i 'ang ba / mi kyis ba 'a
362b7(mdo): pa'i dus ka/ sangs rgyas/ zhing kyi rgya bskyed phyir// de yang ri bzod 'grus pa sdums// brtson 'grus mthal las shes grub// gang ldagasatshungs pa skyed pa byung // sems can byed pa rnam pa
362b8(mdo): 'dus pa ltar bcas 'jig rten rnams la stod// sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing // stabs rnams kyi yang pha rol pa phyin/ mya 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas// so so yang dag rigs malnga/ 
363a1(mdo): gnas dang gnas kyin dbang yang thob// las dang leshes rtogs par rig/ sas rnams yang da/ 'dzind pa dang // rnamam sbyin da la se nom byed// khams rnams dus shes pa dang / de bar 'dren pa'in tu ldan// sems/ 
363a2(mdo): can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyer // sems can rnams kyi dbang po yos// rim pa bzhin du yangab dag la khye rang // dbang po mchog dpa'as rnams// sa lus pams rab tu mabyed// bsag tan/ 
363a3(mdo): migs rnam par dang // ting nge 'dzin gi la sa kyind// skams par 'dru dang tshad byed // rkang gnyis das pagod tu bslabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting 'dzing// ngas ni phyi mkhyen du gang yang byed// thams cad sa khyed
363a4(mdo): ci mams pad gzigs// gzigs la mang smig 'gyed// de na/ gshegs 'das sa// sangs rgyas 'dzin rgyas dris te// sang sa ning kyi phyiche pa// skalang pachen po bdag sa gsungs// kun nas bye pa
363a5(mdo): rnam par bya// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyenang/ gang nas khyod kyi gyi mkhyedad pa// de 'dra'i chos mi song ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing kyi skyong rnams dang / yon tan thams cad rab tu ma khyen// sangs rgyas brtan
363a6(mdo): brgya che za// rkang gnyis gtso bro bshad zhu gsolang // sems camadzes kyi sbyin pa dang // ji ltar gyi rnams 'tshang rgya gnyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas// myi mkhas 'khor 'ang rab tu 'khor// phyi rnaMs gang gis nyon mongs pa// 
363a7(mdo): nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyend// de'i lam dpabasam pa rnams/ 'drer pa khyod kyis dzabam mkhyen / dza stam ting 'dzin pa 'byung ba dang // byung nas ji skar gnas pa dang // dza~M lta la de las ldang ba rnams// sodod pa khyod/ 
363a8(mdo): kyis rag tu mkhyed// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad byed pa// ji snyed ting nge 'dzi dzid rnams dang / zhig nas dpa 'i lhag mthong rnaMs// rnam 'a thams cad shid tu lakhyedad// ji ltar chos la dogs pa dang // gas kyis rkyed kyi/ 
363b1(mdo): than mas pa// da po spyo dpas rab sa byed te// des the co ma ma pa khyod// da kyis skal pa byed rtsod pas// ye zhes 'dri mas nges par 'gyu// stonod pas stobs kyi mthu lang brnyes// drang srong chen po stobs
363b2(mdo): dang sngon ga rnas ba stong phrag bye ba so// bdag dang pa ro yod rnams kyim yod pa dngag tum mtsham zhing / bsam kyis kyi khyab thams cad mkhyen// gang du byang chub ci 'dre ba// skye ba thams cad du ya dzug/ 
363b3(mdo): dang / masus 'dres pa yos// dza rtse sus pa rab tu mkhyed // gang dwa ci 'dri sgru ba dang / gang gas kyang ci srab// ji ltar kun tu khyad pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu ma byedang // ba ma dzes rnams kyi 'dra sa cha
363b4(mdo): dri ba kang du nye za// dra bzhini gshegs pas rab tus rkyen nga / kyi 'dra ba'i mi shes byas// ldan pad rnam pa lung ba dab/ ma ma 'du byas des thadad pa// de la macos gyimangs byed// rgyam chis / 
363b5(mdo): 'grol tha mang// de dag 'gon pos rab tu la khyend// gang du gnas ba de dag gi rkyenadu tu mchis par nges pa'ang // de yang khyod kyis pa sos ma khyend// de srad ya gnyis kyi mnga' khyod// gang gis sus kyis
363b6(mdo): sems gas/ shes// de yang khyod kyis rnam par mamyed // sems de smyan ga sa ga s+ho/ ni yang 'dren pas rab tul khyed// sngon chas gnas pa mkhyen pa ni// khyod dang 'drab yong ma ma chis// sangs rgyas bye ba ngas
363b7(mdo): dang / 'dre mi khyod na de dang 'dra// srog chags so so'i des panas// rjes su dran pas rab tu ma khyed// de srangasangs rgyas chos rnams// 'dren pa'i mi gas dbyigs phyim pa// gang dngagang gisum rtsom sa/ 
364a1(mdo): pi bu'i rgyu dang tum ci// de yang thams cad ma bye nga bas mkhyed/ daspang rgyas pas lhag sa mchis// 'dren pa chos rnams thams cadas// khyod ma com yo ma pa // sems can kun gyi khyod dus yang
364a2(mdo): sangs rgyas rgyan gyis rab tu gzugs// skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho mkhyen// khyod 'dra ba ni yang myi gda'// skar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na// thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis// zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen / 
364a3(mdo): ma lus pa yang rtogs par 'gyur // nyon mongs thams cad yongasu spongs// khyod kyis bag chag sa kyang bcom// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang // gyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen da// gang nyon mongs
364a4(mdo): spyod yul dang // nyon mongs 'di dag kar 'byung mkhyend// nyon mo sa dag la spyad pas na// bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de dag kun kyang khyod mkhyend te// de las khyod ni pha rol phyin // / 
364a5(mdo): bdag dpapha ro 'a rnams kyi yang // nyon mongs gang gis spong / ba'i// lam de rnams ni rab tu mkhyend// ba slad khyod ni sa la mkhas// 'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa// mabal
364a6(mdo): thartson 'grus de stan nas// skamang ba bye ba khrag thig mthal las par// 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas lha ris bsdus te// rtag par sna'i dbang por gyur // bye ba mtha' yas sgra rnams pa
364a7(mdo): rgyas pa'i ye shes mthong bar bstand// lha'i gnas nas shi'i phos te/ mya'o dbang po rgyal por 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstanadang // de dag pa'i chos thos
364a8(mdo): na sti stang mtshungs myed bskyed nas su// sems kyi thams cad nyem bzhag ste// dri myed sems kyis de dag nyam// sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa// byang chub mchogs nges par gyur // nga'i tshig zos rtogs pa ni
364b1(mdo): sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyurd// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas zhing kyi rgya bshad kyang // skalang pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su// rgya che bshad pa myi zad do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod pa/ 
364b2(mdo): drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin ston par bshad// de dag ma skyes myi 'gag bstanang // gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang // sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang // bde bar
364b3(mdo): gshegs pas zhing brjod pa// gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi ba bde gshegs bshad// zhi ba'i rang bzhin de myi rnyed// gang la bshad pa de'ang stog// 'di sa 'god myed 'gro ba myom/ 
364b4(mdo): de nas bram ze'i rogs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu mo zlo klos mtha' yas kyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad pa/ de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ 
364b5(mdo): bud byed kyi dbang po las gyur te/ de phyin chad bud myed kyi sus su byi skye bar gyur to// 'jas dpal de lta bas na byang tu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing rad byed
364b6(mdo): yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing // blan byed pa yang da/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa'i rngam par 'dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid sgris pa rtse/ 
364b7(mdo): zil bslab par bya'o// rjes kyi nas grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sems cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gus rab tu 'grus/ kun tu rab tu 'gus/ yos rab tu gsos/ kun tu / 
364b8(mdo): tu g.yos// ldag rab tu ldes/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ar 'ung rab tu lum 'um/ kun gyu rab tu 'ar zhum/ rem ches// rab tu chos ches/ kun tu ra
365a1(mdo): g+hatu ches che/ ka rtogs dpa // chub phyogs ma so// dub phyogs dpa'an/ phyos ma// kyang phyogs dpal // sgo phyogs pa'o// bus dpa' da mthar pa'o// mtha' dasa'ar dbus sa 'o bar gyur tu
365a2(mdo): srog chags bye ba khraka khrig phrag sum brgya ma d+haka/ lend pa byed par zag pa rnams sas sems dza la gros lo// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge pasnyed dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad myed pa phrag brgyan chos kyi
365a3(mdo): sbyin rgyas mye drim dang bral ba rnam pa rang// / byang chub sems dpa' kyi 9 wi// dpag tu byed pa ni kyi pa'i chos sa bzod pa sa zla par gyur to// grags chags stong thag dpag tu med pa rnaMs dang / 
365a4(mdo): da ma sa byung smras skyed 'a dasas / so// rgyas sa
365a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpal gyid kyi bzhi bzhi ba dang / da da / Sh+Ti da / bso ldan 'das rgyas
365a6(mdo): byal mngon par bsnyad / 'gas pa 'thung shes nas pa'i min pa'i rna pa mad rdzogs so// d+haka gyi khan pa 'dzed kyi ngang
365a7(mdo): sa 'dra ba de dang/ gyi ma pa canang lashes pas zang/ // b+h+ya/ yA / snyan dag na dkar
365a8(mdo): kyi cu la gas pa na pa gag pal ga sa pa nga/ / na sems lachu zhin/ mamaldan sas 'dzin
365b1(mdo): rgyab byed kyi chol 'god byed zas sgyid kyi kus dga' pa pa nga/ dge slong stang nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong kyi dge 'dun chen po dang // byang chub sems dpal khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom
365b2(mdo): ldan 'das smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor da cing / mdun gyis bsdus te chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa/ byang skems dpa' lnga stong dang ldan
365b3(mdo): tsi/ hU~M/ za rgya byim dang/ tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa rjes kyis yongs su bskur da cing / mdud du bdang de sbyin ma'i ldum bu 'khor gyi khyams ka la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gi lta ba der do ste/ lhags pa
365b4(mdo): dang ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la 'go bas phyagatshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la san gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chul sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
365b5(mdo): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / lhan cig tu phyogs kacig tu khod do// phyogs ka ni// tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'dasasu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsolang to// 
365b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de ltar mi rig mching rjog mdzang // bcom ldan 'das bka' sa chid de nyid kyi rjes rgyun kyi 'chad par mdzad mug sa 'o// de nas sangs kyis kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sa kyis
365b7(mdo): 'jis dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal na do ltar na nyan thos dang ldan pa'i bka' mching mdzad na 'jam dpal bdag gis khyod la bskul kyis/ byang chub sems dang / 
365b8(mdo): deng ldan pa'i bka' mching bsam par spobos par gyis// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' dang
366a1(mdo): gtam / sngon du gyur da pa ma yin na// btsun pa rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' dang sngam pa li ga tam mi dgos// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa// 'jam dpal 'dimag pa snod du gyur dpa
366a2(mdo): 'byung ba de dag khyod kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ni snod du gyur pa pa ni gang dag yi/ snod pus gyur pa dge bdag yi shes so// rab 'byor dkyis
366a3(mdo): smras pa 'jam dpal bdag ni gzhan gi ska 'i rjes su 'tham pa yin pas/ snod dang sA de ma yin pa lta rtsigs med kyi// da kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'adam rnam pa'i rgyas spobs par myos nyin// 'ja ma dpa
366a4(mdo): kyi ba sgrus pa/ btsun par ba 'byor dkang su dag spyon byed pa la zhugs pa de nga/ mams med ni sangs rgyas kyi'os rnams kyi c+doMs du ba cung ba'o// da tsun pa rab 'byod dge dan spyor byed pa sa sa rton cing sems cad rnam
366a5(mdo): rgya pa/ tha' ba dang / phyin pa pam / khams can thams sa dul btang rnams / mau yongs su blang ba// yam sa sus pa ca sa swA// 
366a6(mdo): yang srid pa mngon par grub par byed par byed pa phyi dkal ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snong du mkhyur ba'o// btsun pa rab 'byor dkang dag phyi ma'i mam la skas pa bye bar gos bgos pa// srid pa thams cad
366a7(mdo): kyis kyi 'jigs kyi sdang ba/ 'alas gsum gi spyod pa// dris gsum dang bras pa/ 'do pas skyed mos nam dang / gzhas byed khang du 'du shes pa// srid pa thams cad chags pa dang bral ba ded/ de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dmas kyi rjo/ 
366b1(mdo): yang ston pa// gti mug gis rmongs pa yang ma yin la// gti mug gyod 'phral ston pa pa/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral la/ khams gsum du yang snang ba// sems can thams cad la khyams pa// mkhengs pa/ 
366b2(mdo): zhum la// sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba/ de bzhin nyid rgya rjes su song ba/ dkon mchog gsum ki ge dung myi 'chad par bya ba 'i phyir zhugs pa// rig pa gsum dang ldan pa// rig pa mngon du gyur
366b3(mdo): pa de dag ni// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sdang du gyur pa ma rab 'byor dkyis smras pa/ langs dpal gas te chos kyi phyis kyang gci/ de bzhin nyid kyang gci// yang dag pa'i mthar
366b4(mdo): kacig no// snod dpe snod ma yin pa de ji ltar mngon// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rdza mkhar gis 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig las// sdong rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ 
366b5(mdo): snod de thams cad so ga cig tu btad da/ de la khacig na 'bru dmar dang / mar gyi snod du byu / kha chog na sdeng me dang / si kha ra'i snod du gyur // kha cig ni da pa myi gtsang ba'i snod du gyur te/ 'dzes pa'i gang
366b6(mdo): bu dang / so btang bas pa dang pa cung bad mang byed do// btsun par ba 'byu da de bu ni du chos kyi dbyings kyangs kyi// de bzhin nyid kyang gci/ yang dag pa'i yis yang gci// ji byams mdzod par 'du
367a1(mdo): pa bzhin du snod kyi khyad par bya 'gyur ro// de la spang mi nga/ li kha li sdong ji lta ba bzhin tu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la blta'o// 'bru mar dang mam gyi sdong ji lta ba de bzhin du nyan
367a2(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams ca sa bstsu'o// ram pas kyig cang pa'i snod ji lta bde bzhin tu/ byas pa so sa ma skye bo thams cadas pa/ 'o// rab 'khyod kyis smras pa// 'ang sa dpas rnam sa

367a4(mdo): da/ byud pa dang / gyu dang/ sa pa dang / nga su da/ rnam
367b1(mdo): dang / shing ges pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya la/ gang gi snod kyang ma yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thos

367b3(mdo): de bzhin du skrag pa'i zas pa pas skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / sdod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa yin pas/ rnam par skye'o// rab 'byor dkyis smras pa/ 'jam dang
